Dreader is a short mouse maze game with horror elements.

name: DRMS-04
summary: Fourth part in a series about dreams

name: Drytown
summary: Escape from the old vampire town of Drytown using your blood as the only payment for everything!

name: Dragon Ball Universe
summary: 2D Dragon Ball MMO Multiplayer Sandbox

name: Drew
summary: How many can survive a night in the house of Drew...?

name: Druonio
summary: Multiplayer browser game in active development.

name: Dreamland Solitaire: Dark Prophecy - Collector’s Edition
summary: Enter a world of magic in a stunning new solitaire adventure! Guide a kindhearted fairy, a noble knight and a powerful wizard as they pursue the evil witch, Jill, who intends to destroy the knight's realm and enslave its people.

name: Droid Game 3D
summary: 3D online TPS shooter.

name: Draw No More
summary:
Created for O2A2 Jam 2021.

A girl in the seat, the artist behind the easel. They have a conversation. The girl's heart is shattered, and the artist's wrist moves no more.

name: Dreamwhale II
summary: A RPG in a very minimalistic fashion. Takes about as long to complete as drinking a cup of coffee(recommended).

name: Dreamdisc
summary:
Dream emulator based on 5 of my dreams.

5-in-one Dream Collection, transposed into readable disc format.
Dreams dreamt by Adam Pype with sounds by Viktor Kraus.

name: Dr. Frank's Build-A-Boyfriend
summary: Build Your Ultimate Boyfriend!

name: Dragon's Playground
summary: Take control of the dragon Azron and embark on a fiery reign of terror.

name: Dr. Mario
summary: Dr. Mario is one of the two LCD game watches belonging to the Gamewatch Boy line released in 1992 by Mani Industries. It plays similarly to the original game.

name: Draughts
summary: Draughts is a simulation of the game checkers. The game features multiple skill levels, and the option to allow yourself or the computer to move first.

name: Dropboy
summary: a small movement-based puzzle game

name: Drink
summary: A 1-minute puzzle game about collecting water before a 100 year drought

name: Dreamtale
summary: Short Undertale Fan Game

name: Drop Up
summary: This is a simple game with the theme of "Beneath the Surface". The instructions are simple; you can jump between the white and the black dimension by using either "z" & "x", or the left and the right arrow keys. Pause with "p", restart a level with "r". You can also return to the title by pressing "t", when the game is paused.

name: Drag Them Out Into Space!
summary: Drag all the asteroids out into space to save the city!

name: Dr. Mario
summary:
Dr. Mario was remastered for the Super Famicom and released as a stand-alone Nintendo Power service release, only in Japan, and also for the Nintendo Gateway System. The game also received a Satellaview broadcast.

The same version was previously bundled with Tetris and released in the West as Tetris & Dr. Mario.

name: Drain
summary: Shouting birds open doors

name: DragonScriber
summary: Typing game where you kill knights as a dragon by roaring their name.

name: Draw Your Own Adventure
summary: Ludum Dare 45 game with a theme Start WIth Nothing

name: Dreamescape
summary: Dreamescape is a Bullet hell RPG game with multiple endings. Go on an amazing adventure to save the world and meet a few friends along the way.

name: Drynk: Board and Drinking Game
summary:
Drynk is the perfect drinking game to play with your friends! Just roll the dice and explore more than 40 different challenges on the board.

Offline and Online Playable

Drynk is now also an online drinking game. This makes Drynk the perfect game whether you're partying at home as a couple or with several friends, or want to meet new people online. If you feel like a night out, invite your friends over for pre-drinks with Drynk before you head over to the next club.

name: Dream Wires
summary: Dream Wires is a collaborated English Yume Nikki fangame created by sniperbob and Madoreptilian in RPG Maker 2003. The game stars Shigeru.

name: Dragon Ball Budokai AF
summary: Dragon Ball Budokai AF is a mod for Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 3 made by PGV.

name: Dragon Gate
summary: Dragon Gate is a top down platformer following a koi carp scaling the Yellow River.

name: Dreamscape Journey
summary: Explore your thoughts in an ever shifting dream world.

name: Drybreed
summary: Hidden behind the void, an ancient mystery awaits his completion.

name: Drunk Fist
summary: There’s cockroaches in the mall!

name: Dr. Emoji
summary: Encrypt the emojis and help your patients with their issues.

name: Dread Keep
summary: ​Traverse the short-lived horrors and despair of Dread Keep.

name: Drawing Evolution
summary: Draw, Guess, Evolve. This visual game will make simple phrases evolve in wacky and amusing ways. Drawing Evolution is full of confusion, awful drawings, and laughs for any group.

name: Dream Knights: The Little Hero
summary: Fall asleep in class while

name: Dragon Blaster
summary: The player controls a small character, which can move horizontally on the bottom of the screen and fire vertically. In the background, an animated castle, dragon, and house can be seen. On each stage, a man on horseback, an alligator, and 4 birds which scroll horizontally across the screen appear. These creatures fire upon the player, and the player must avoid incoming shots. If the player shoots all four creatures, the player advances to the next stage, which is identical to the previous. The player has a total of 3 lives, and when all are list, it's game over.

name: Dreamspaces
summary: An exploration of virtual dream environments

name: Dry Hazard
summary: About a millennia ahead of the game.

name: Dreamer's Web
summary: When dream and time collide

name: Driving Alone at Night
summary: A game/ story about growing up and wandering (literally and figuratively).

name: Dry Path
summary: Explore a desert without running out of water

name: Drafting Towers
summary: Tower Defense DeckBuilding Roguelite

name: Dream Labyrinth
summary: Hololive EN Fan Game

name: Dr. Panda School
summary:
Are you ready for class?

Let your imagination run wild in Dr. Panda School! Create and tell your very own stories through exploring and roleplaying with the school, students and any objects you discover along the way!

Tell your story as a teacher, student, cook or even a janitor! Choose who you would like to be by customizing the animal characters with clothes, hats, glasses and more!

Discover all the different rooms in Dr. Panda School! Make clay sculptures in the art class, grow your own crops in the playground, take care of Hambo the hamster or teach math in the classroom - there are tons of ways to play!

name: Dragon Sweeper
summary: Dragon Sweeper is a mix between mine sweeper, classic NES era JRPGs and modern twitch games. Dragon Sweeper is designed to give you the full experience of a classic RPG in a shorter play session. Your job is to rid the land of monsters and kill the dragon that lives on the island. Dragon Sweeper has several randomly generated islands filled with land to explore, towns to visit and monsters to defeat.

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers
summary: Dragon Ball: The Breakers is a 1-on-7 online asymmetrical action game in which a band of seven everyday humans tries to survive the Raider (a classic Dragon Ball rival such as Cell and Frieza) who will hunt and evolve into an unstoppable force.

name: Dreadful Tales: The Space Between - Collector's Edition
summary: The Spencers picked up an abandoned country estate for cheap, hoping to flip it and turn a profit, but when they come to check out the property, they discover it has dark secrets hidden inside its walls. A creature begins to terrorize them, rifling through their things, smashing furniture and causing a ruckus, but soon their annoyance turns into terror. Can they escape something that lives within the very walls themselves? Find out in this terrifying hidden object puzzle adventure game!

name: Dragon Kingdom
summary: Do you want to farm and have an easy life, attempt to go down in the mines to collect resources, or spend your time fishing by the river? With this game you can do all three, while also having a dragon! Take your time discovering what this game has to offer, and immerse yourself in this adventure!

name: Dragoon Drop
summary: A Collectable Card Platformer for Ludum Dare 41!

name: Driving Me Crazy
summary: A short game about dealing with yourself... in traffic.

name: Drifting Hearts
summary: Dreaming in the Sheets, Horny on the Streets.

name: Dragon Tax Return Simulator 2015
summary: you are a dragon and you need to finish your tax return quickly

name: Dreaming by day
summary: A game about memes and dreams.

name: Drunk
summary: "I wanted this"

name: Dril Simulator 2018
summary: never log off

name: Dread the Rabbit
summary: Journey across the land and reclaim your throne

name: Draculaland
summary:
A text adventure adaptation of Dracula, faithfully reimagining several characters and ignoring most of the original plot. Guide Jonathan Harker on a trip through Transylvania, interacting with vampires, mad scientists, zombies, annoying magpies, and moustachioed werewolves.

Uses a mobile-friendly clickable text interface.

name: Dragon Battle
summary: Can you defeat the Dragon King?

name: Dragon King: The Fighting Game
summary:
Dragon King: The Fighting Game was an unfinished low budget 3D fighting game, and was the first in a planned series of fighting video games. The game was developed for the Nintendo 64, where it was to make unique use of the joystick on the controller. After deciding to use Nintendo characters to give it a more proper atmosphere on the Nintendo 64, the game later became Super Smash Bros.

In 2022, Masahiro Sakurai presented in his own YouTube Channel some footage of the game, with the official title localization of "Dragon King: The Fighting Game".

name: DreadWood
summary: Submitted for Ludum Dare 35 'Shapeshift' Theme

name: Dragon Roll
summary: Family of Dragons get into a fight during dinner, get them back together!

name: Dream Hero
summary: A game jam entry inspired by loop hero, but where numbers go up faster

name: Drop Off
summary: You know the drill! Get the loot, beat the boss, be the hero!

name: Dragon Bones
summary: Dragon bones is a dungeon game where you find loot to kill skeletons and dragons

name: Drivinity
summary: The Godlike racing game.

name: Drag the Dungeon
summary: No corridors? If only you could join the rooms together somehow...

name: DragonSwings
summary: Prototype of a 2D top-down skillbased fast movement Action-Game

name: Dreamwillow
summary: Guide our mysterious necromancer protagonist through the dreamlike forest!

name: Dracula's Castle
summary: Dracula's Castle, a Castlevania/Banjo Kazooie inspired action horror game.

name: Dracula's Pizza Delivery
summary: A spooky Fast-Paced Game in 2.5D

name: Dream Hard
summary: Dream Hard is a short two-player co-op queer-themed beat 'em up game. In it, you must defend the local NYC queer performance space The Dreamhouse from hordes of fascists. The retro-style 3D graphics imagine a history of queer punk games in the late 1990s, connecting those politics of resistance to today.

name: Dreaming of You
summary: Find the girl of your dreams! Literally!

name: Dragondell
summary: Breathe fire. Get treasure. Make friends.

name: Drunk
summary: Drunk and Reckless: Unforgiving Neighborhood Kilometer

name: Draw-A-Mountain
summary: Draw a mountain and watch it come to life

name: Driver's Work Trip
summary: Online open world racing, driving game

name: Dream Dye
summary:
A 2D puzzle platformer in which you delve into dreams and mix colours to dye objects, in a world where colours are a pigment of the imagination.

Dream Dye takes place in a doctor's office in the fictional village of Renkaya, a relatively normal village with just one strange difference—the only way to “make” colour is to dream about it.

name: Draw Dreamscape
summary: Relaxing game where you draw and create everything.

name: Drink Beer, Neglect Family
summary:
You are a disillusioned father who spends most of his time drinking beer and avoiding his family. How long can you avoid them, and at what cost?

Every beer you drink increases your score, and applies a negative effect. Some beers make you unable to jump, some make you fall off of bridges, some make you throw up every few seconds, and so on. On top of that, pictures of your family pop up everywhere, and you need to avoid them, lest you are reminded of your duties as a father and a husband.

name: Drillmin
summary: A Game for Ludum Dare 48, "Deeper and Deeper."

name: Drone Showcase
summary: 'Drone Showcase' is an Action-Packed, Fast-Paced, Time-Trial Racing game used to feature the dynamic capabilities of our Physics-based drones! Smash through Rubble blocking your path, slip through Giant Ventilation fans, avoid Flammable Gas Pipes, Dodge projectiles & make it to the End!

name: Dream Fruit Farm
summary: Tom and Charlize very love fruits and want to build their own dream fruit farm. Will we help them in this fun Match3 game?

name: Draw Battle!
summary: two teams of drawers face off with a frantic final round

name: Dreams of Desire: Definitive Edition
summary:
Dreams of Desire is an interactive adult Visual Novel - A story about power, corruption and mystery.

You play as a male protagonist.
Due to unfortunate circumstances, it looks like he is forced to go to a military academy.
Our hero however, has other ideas. He never wanted to be a soldier. As things start to look inevitable, he stumbles upon an old book about the ways of the mind.
With the help of newfound knowledge he can change the course of his life. But how will he do it - and what is the price he has to pay?

name: Dragoncrest RPG: Arc 1
summary: Adventures await you in the lands of the Dragoncrest Empire. Set out in search of fame, fortune and mastery of the many adventurer skills in this Zero-to-Hero Adventure RPG series! Brought to you by a team of fellow gaming enthusiasts with a passion for the RPG Genre and playing Dungeons & Dragons. The games in this series are designed like playable volumes of a Light Novel written in the expandable story style of a D&D Campaign.

name: Dragon Star Varnir: Complete Deluxe Edition
Driving World: Italian Job
summary: Complete exciting driving challenges as you explore a beautiful Italian city! Navigate using an in-game map, deliver orders, take part in adrenaline-pumping night races!

name: Dragon Age Legends: Remix 01
summary:
Dragon Age Legends Remix 01 is a "remix" of Dragon Age Legends. It features the same graphics as the aforementioned game, but completely different gameplay. Where the original game was a turn-based RPG on social networks, the remix is an action-based hack and slash game.

The player controls the main character through a side-scrolling environment using only the mouse. The player can use mouse gestures to perform special combos, which are required to kill the many monsters that will appear from both in front of and behind the character. Killing enemies unlocks experience points which can be used to upgrade stats such as health and stamina when the player reaches a campsite.

name: Dragon Knight
summary: Dragon Knight is a innovative player-oriented NFT MMORPG on the Binance Smart Chain with a player-owned, blockchain backed economy, an exciting combat system with PvP and PvE battles and scarce tradeable NFT collectibles.

name: Drop one NPC to another
summary: This is a 2D ACT Game, and a fitness game. your target is use yourself to collide or drag one NPC to let it collide to another NPC, and it also has leisure time to let you follow our character to play jump rope or boxing and so on to fit your body.

name: Drums
summary: Turn your Nintendo Switch into a portable drum set and learn to play anywhere, anytime.

name: Drum Box
summary: The most complete drumming game on Nintendo Switch!

name: Drive Drift X
summary: Enjoy this racing game that's easy to pick up and fun for the whole family! Pass around the Joy-Con Controller and compete with up to four players! Featuring a variety of racing vehicles! Choose from cars, bikes, trucks, and even tanks! Transform a range of locations into your racecourse, from town streets to seasides! Find your perfect vehicle and go for your fastest time! Use drifts to take any turn with ease! Increase your speed by charging up boosts during drifts! Floor it and take first place!

name: Dragons Online Ultra
summary: Create your Dragon, then fly, run and shoot with players around the world! Team up to fight fantasy bosses or verse each other! Rank up and increase your stats to make your character faster and stronger! Huge amounts of customisation's and options for both the Game and your Dragon! Other features include: In-game chat, Nest claiming, NPC's, Eggs and Hatchlings, Special free Daily changing skin, photo mode button.

name: Drifty Pool
summary:
Pool and Drifting?
Yep.
Drift around a pool table and sink balls!!

name: Drawer
summary: An arcade racing game with indirect controls. Take on the role rally car co-pilot, when the pilot himself isn’t there O_O Develop your spatial thinking and fine motor skills, beat other players’ records and, most importantly, have fun!

name: Dracula's Legacy Remastered
summary: Haunted by frightening dreams about her forgotten past, Isabella - along with her fiancé - travels to an old ghost town, the only clue to her origins that she has been able to dredge from the depths of her lost memories...

name: Dream Fallen: Vila do Chaves
summary: Dream Fallen: Vila do Chaves is a psychological horror game that uses El Chavo's neighborhood as its backdrop. After a fit of rage over his son's death, Señor Barriga kills everyone in the vecindad, and now it is up to you to investigate the place while being chased by Señor Barriga and the ghosts that surround.

name: Dr. Robotnik Turns Everybody into Frogs
summary: A Sonic antifa adventure.

name: Dream Gallery
summary: Dream Gallery is a puzzle game featuring traditional Chinese aesthetics.

name: Dreamy Clover Town
summary:
Dreamy Clover Town is an anime village development simulation game by WeMade Connect.

When you were young, you lived in the beautiful village of Clover Town. But an incident resulted in you leaving. Ten years later, you return in order to restore Clover Town to its former glory!

name: DrumMania 3rdMix
summary: In DrumMania, the player must hit the drum parts when the notes reach the bottom of the screen in order to fill in missing drum parts from a song

name: Dragon Evo
summary: Dragon Evo is a fantasy themed tactical card game with over 300 different cards to collect. Combine building cards, equipment cards and hero cards with unique abilities with game-changing event cards. Play single player adventures or online in ranked or unranked modes with or without your friends.

name: Drone Simulator
summary: Pilot a wide range of drones through varied environments in this exciting and challenging simulation game.

name: Dream Storm
summary: FPS Multiplayer Team Deathmatch game.

name: Dream Loop
summary: The ambient indie adventure. An atmospheric first person lucid dreamscape by The Mad Men of Oopsy Daisy, Inc. "...a deeply emotional audio experience, with an innovative and immersive 'music looping' puzzle system."

name: DreamScapes Dimensions
summary: A free to play, first person medieval fantasy, MMORPG. Pre-Alpha | Solo Indie | Retro Look and Feel | Versatile Character Creation | Tutorial Quests | Harvesting and Crafting | Skills and Spells | Player Building | Procedurally Generated Random Adventures | Daily Gifts

name: Drone VR
summary: Do you love drones or are you thinking about buying one? Thanks to Drone VR, you will have the opportunity to fly drones in virtual reality - without the fear of smashing this expensive device. My task was to create an application for flying drones and release it at an affordable, low price.

name: Driftence
summary: In Driftence, you have to drive a racing car on several tracks. Main goal: To gain points by drifting your car.

name: Drone Crash Course
summary: Drone crash course - Being a pilot of a controlled drone is not easy. Having decided to master this profession, you sign up for training and attend classes for a whole year .. and now the day of the final exam has come!

name: Dragluttony
summary: Dear fellow wizard, get ready to enter our frantic 4-player arena party game! With your powerful (but random) spells and potions, feed your little cute Draglutton to make it so big it devours all your friends in a colorful and quirky chaos (without any dragon body shaming here)!

name: Dreamy Planet
summary: A gloomy yuri VN set in an abandoned theme park, focused on a ruinous relationship between a pair of estranged childhood friends.

name: Dream Kitchen
summary: Follow the story from different points of view and make choices to decide your future on five different routes and discover the mystery behind this magical adventure as you find love with one of the appliances of your kitchen.

name: Dreamlands: Cotton Candy Hunt
summary: Avoid Spikes and cannons, run fast, jump precisely and collect enough candies to see all levels of Dreamlands. Once you have mastered the basics new challenges are waiting for you.

name: Dracula Is Coming
summary: Dracula Is Coming is a shooter that will allow you to enjoy the blood of your enemies to your heart's content. Every step can be too dangerous. Complete all levels and be careful, aspen colas are everywhere. Using your skills and your reaction, make sure that evil finally triumphs!

name: Dreamer: Puzzle
summary: A very relaxing puzzle based on the Dreamer game. When putting together the paintings, gradually discover the story of a sick boy.

name: Draken
summary: Draken is a hardcore survival FPS rogue-like with modern weapons that need to be operated as is in real life: Insert magazine, load chamber, and check safety. Vampires abducted you for blood and left for dead in their deep dungeon. Your mission is to climb back up to the surface and escape.

name: Dream of the Hikikomori
summary: The reverse dating simulator, where you're the waifu!!! Will you escape? Or will the protagonist get you first?!

name: Dr. Kobushi's Labyrinthine Laboratory
summary: Guide the adventurous Ayla as she attempts to rescue her doggy sidekick Falafel from the vertiginous confines of Dr. Kobushi's laboratory. Over a hundred pixelated puzzles will have you avoiding killer robots as you engage with memorable characters.

name: Drowning
summary: drowning in the abyss, the hope is lost.

name: Dream Hacker
summary: With the help of the dream machine, you can invade the dreams of sleeping girls. Here you can do whatever you want, or you can help them by interpreting their dreams and then collecting the “reward” you want.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi 4
summary: The project tries to update and remodel the game Dragon Ball Z Budokai Tenkaichi 3 created by the Spike company with the new content that has appeared from Dragon Ball from 2007 to 2018, trying to be as faithful as possible to what the original creators were trying to achieve. representing the franchise in this frenetic game that simulates the most iconic fights of Anime.

name: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2022
summary: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2022, an indie football management simulator, puts you in the role of head coach for your favorite college football team. Recruit, game plan and make the right calls on the field to lead your team to the top of the ranks and the college football championship.

name: Dropdom: Jigsaw Puzzle
summary:
This is a block puzzle game.
Move the jewel horizontally, fill the jewel with a line and remove the high score.
This game is fun and strategic.
It requires the player to observe, judge, move and finally reach a line or lines.
Delete a line and score, if you delete multiple lines you will get a higher score.
If the player's jewel reaches the top, the game ends.

name: Dreaming Rainbow
summary: This is a horror game where you walk through the 3D hospital space and solve mysteries. You will experience a nurse day in the nurse's view. Mysterious phenomena occur frequently. Through the experience, the truth comes to light.

name: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2022
summary: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2022 puts you in the role of head coach of your favorite college basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from staff hiring, recruiting, scouting and all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to tournament glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Driar
summary: Driar is a free homebrew platform-game, designed for PAL (50Hz) systems (but was tested to work well on NTSC (60Hz) systems as-well). Take control of Driar and collect all the stars on each level to progress. The game features 38 levels in total.

name: Drip Drop
summary: Relive your childhood wonder...In this late 80s early 90s inspired epic 2D platformer! Jump over powerful monsters, run over crumbling bridges, and save the one you love in 5 wacky worlds!

name: Dreamvibe
summary: Dreamvibe is an interactive audiovisual experience where you use your blade to blow the fluids of music vibes as they come flying at you. Every beat has its direction you need to match.

name: Dreamers
summary: Dreamers will lead you on an emotional journey in a story about friendship, exploration, and personal growth. Join the three characters in their adventure through a 3D world with secondary storylines and mini-games, vehicles to upgrade, puzzles to solve, and collaborative split-screen experiences.

name: Dr. Professor Scientist's Weapons Testing Facility
summary: DPSWTF is a casual tower defense game with roguelike elements, where instead of placing towers, you build the best tower of them all. Combine the best projectiles with effective modifiers and push back the incoming hordes. Research them all to conquer the secrets of the Great North!

name: Dragon Ninja Byoka
summary: Dragon Ninja Byoka is a retro, Indie Game platformer akin to the classic 1980s action platformers found on classic consoles, upgraded with bloody combat and pixel-perfect platforming action.

name: Dreadful Wake
summary: Dreadful Wake is an intense cooperative first-person shooter. Diverse level design governed by procedural generation. Punishing roguelike-style gameplay, trapped within ever-changing mazes.

name: Drakula
summary: DRAKULA is an action-platformer with puzzle elements where you play as Van Helsing. Use your wooden stakes to climb obstacles and kill enemies on your war.

name: Druid: Test of faith
summary: Make a move on a fascinating journey through the fantasy world, where interesting encounters and amazing stories await you. This wonderful world is waiting for its hero. Will you have the strength to save him? Or will it all come to an end? It all depends on you!

name: Dream Busters
summary: Nostalgic and New style. A new sensation! Retro fantasy shooter

name: Drag Battle Top Fuel
summary: Drag Battle Top Fuel is a racing simulation where you race a Top Fuel dragster over a quarter mile drag strip. The action is fast pace and intense, and things can change in a split second. Reaction times will be the difference between winning, loosing and crashing.

name: Droid Escape
summary: In this adventure, help Droid 07 to overcome challenges, discover mysteries and free your friend from the miniaigas.

name: Dragon Realms: Towers 'n' Dragons
summary: Take on the roles of two ambitious strategists and defend your country against dragons and rebels in this story based tower defense game! Keep an eye out for hidden secrets and act wisely because who knows how the story might end.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Legendary Pack 2
summary: Play as Jiren (Full Power), Gogeta (DBSuper), Caulifla (Super Saiyan2), and Kale (Super Saiyan2), all from Dragon Ball Super, in Legendary Pack 2.

name: Drug Lords
summary: A strategy / tower defense where you must move from location to location, buy and sell your "merchandise". While you move you will find random encounters that will help you get more "merchandise", make you lose it, or challenge you even more, by making you defend your life for it.

name: Dr. Science quest
summary: Dr. Science quest - Even the most brilliant scientists need rest. But bad luck, you got into a nightmare of the protagonist, where all the computers from his laboratory were scattered across the distant corners of consciousness. Collect all the equipment in this unusual platformer, otherwise be in trouble!

name: Dream Meister and the Recollected Black Fairy
summary: Dream Meister and the Recollected Black Fairy, more commonly referred to as "Yumekuro", is a mobile, otome styled game described as a "dream-woven fantasy occupation RPG" which shares the same universe as GCREST’s other otome game, 100 Sleeping Princes & the Kingdom of Dreams.

name: Dragon Nest 2
summary:
Great adventurers! You have heard the whispering call of the goddess Altea, please come back and continue to write your faith and mission together!
The continent of Altea is about to collapse, and she is waiting for your return!
The goddess Altea, the creator of Dragon Valley, was poisoned by her evil sister Vestinel and fell into a deep sleep. In her sleep, the world of Archerin was born. The invading shadows devastated this continent and destroyed life in this land. Mankind became selfish and greedy and an unprecedented calamity has befallen this pure land. Until a group of adventurers came to this land, fought against the dragon, and found the power stone that helped them awaken the sleeping goddess from her slumber and save her world.
Do you remember what happened 13 years ago? Now, the Dragon Valley Continent has been attacked by giant dragons once and the land of happiness is the brink of collapse. Do you hear the goddess' voice calling out to you in your dreams? Adventurers, please come back! Come back and save this world from darkness.
Altea is waiting for you and your friends to go home and save this world and its youth from being destroyed by these vile creatures.
All four classes will provide players with plenty of options when it comes to finding the best approach. Dungeons can be tackled solo or in groups of four or eight players while World Bosses will require coordinated efforts from all players to bring down for precious rewards.

name: Dragon Master
summary: DragonMaster is the first blockchain-based Metaverse game that blends RTS, MOBA, Collection, and Play to Earn gameplay. DragonMaster now allows anyone to join the game for free! Just with 1 phone, you can enjoy the game easily!

name: Drag Clash Pro: Hot Rod Racing
summary: Experience amazing ¼ mile races, take part in legal Hot Rod tournaments, earn points and money for your places in completed events.

name: Drihoo
summary: Dunk the dwarf is a solo treasure hunter, left to his own devices after a cave-in separates him from the rest of his crew.

name: Dragons in Space
summary:
Space dragons are attacking! Destroy them all using a variety of weapons and rescue all the escape pods

(the're not really dragons)

Keyboard controls WASD or direction keys to move, space or Insert on the number pad to shoot. This allows you to play using one hand, left hand on wasd and space or right hand on the arrows on the number pad with the insert/0 key to shoot with num lock off. Controller is also supported

name: Dr. Signal's Strange Machine
summary: A short story about a dinosaur, a doctor, and her strange machine.

name: Dream Catcher
summary: A lonely guy meets a lot of strange girls in his dream. Let's solve the puzzle to see the girls more clearly.

name: Driv3r
summary: Driv3r for Game Boy Advance brings the action-packed experience of the renowned console series to handheld gaming. Step into the shoes of undercover cop Tanner as you navigate through intense missions across sprawling cities like Miami, Nice, and Istanbul. The game offers a blend of high-speed car chases, on-foot pursuits, and shootouts, all rendered in impressive graphics. With a gripping storyline, diverse missions, and a variety of vehicles to commandeer, Driv3r on GBA captures the essence of the original while delivering an engaging experience on the go.

name: Drifter's Tales
summary: This strategic card game invites you to live small stories in the universe of The First Spine. Choose a story and fight fearsome enemies! You may discover the secret that surrounds the Forgotten Valley.

name: Dragon Princess Anastasia
summary: [Black-and-White Short Comedy RPG] Tons of trouble caused by the dumb dragon princess!? Search for treasures hidden inside the cave!

name: Drunkknight
summary: Drunkknight is a 2D top-down roguelike in which you feel like a knight who decides to storm a cave full of fantasy monsters on his drunken head begins to lose his mind.

name: Drillman 6378137
summary: The game involves aiming at the goal while avoiding obstacles.

name: Dream
summary: A 2D exploration-collectathon game with dream-like qualities.

name: Dragon War
summary: A real-time combat game played by the flying dragon in the third person. At this stage, the game mode is mainly chaos. The main themes of the game are flying dragon and magic.

name: Dreamsettler
summary:
Sleepnet. It's where dreams are literally made. But sometimes dreams need a little help, and that's where you come in. They say a private eye never sleeps, but to crack these cases you'll need to be out cold.

Dreamsettler is an early '00s internet simulator in which you solve cases for an array of strange and endearing characters as a Sleepnet Private Investigator. From hunting down elusive soup recipes to unearthing global conspiracies, you'll need to explore countless pages, download apps and master minigames to close your cases and solve Sleepnet's mysteries.

You'll start small, with little more than a bare-bones Dreamsettler template page, but before long find yourself caught up in a plot that will determine the very future of Sleepnet and sleeptime computing at large.

name: Dragon Caffi
summary: Join Margo on her quest to discover the joy that food brings to others, and the memories gathered around sharing a treat with loved ones!

name: Dread X Collection 5
summary: A horror anthology in the Dread X Collection series. Featuring 12 new games from up-and-comers along with veterans, all wrapped up in an old, run down party venue that may be hiding more than it's letting on...

name: Dragon Fist 3: Age of the Warrior
summary: Dragon Fist 3 is a fighting game filled with characters that are masters of different martial arts, as well as masters of different weapon types.

name: Drömjobbet i Rosemond Valley
summary: In this business game the player plays as Josephine who is given the task to run her own mall.

name: Drones: Defenders Astartes
summary: A 2D, top-down shoot'em up with simulation elements, embedded in retro tech from the '80s. Blast your way trough space and enemies. Upgrade your space drones. Endure your mothership's AI cynical attitude and enjoy the most realistic shoot'em up ever!

name: Dreams in the Witch House
summary: Dreams in the Witch House is an open world horror adventure game, where you guide Walter Gilman, as he prepares to face the dreaded May-Eve witch ritual in the legend-haunted city of Arkham. Choose your own approach and reveal the secret of the Witch House before it's too late.

name: Dreamlined
summary: Dreamlined is a physics-based automation/destruction game about building machines and crushing dreams.

name: Draw Rider 2 Plus
summary: Welcome to Draw Rider 2 - fun arcade racing games in which both time trips and special missions are waiting for you.

name: Dream Travel Agency!
summary: You'll get to see Busan(in Korea) from a different point of view while searching for hidden jewels in Busan. Feel the excitement of a trip to Busan to be rediscovered by fun game.

name: Driftkhana
summary: Built with freedom in mind, there are no point systems, time limits, or rules simply because when it comes to cars and drifting, you should be free to do whatever you want! Driftkhana lets you drift till your heart's content, interacting with a variety of objects within the set. Moveable ramps, giant road cones and beach balls are but a few of the fun props you'll find yourself skidding around.

name: Draw Two Save: Save the man
DragonScales 7: A Heart of Dark Flames
summary: The ultimate DragonScales experience. Tile-matching puzzles, battles and a journey of revenge and redemption.

name: Dreg Cannon
summary: Rise up and help save New Vega from the Techno-mages!

name: Dragon's Blade: HoL
summary:
Explore a massive pixel art world and engage in classic turn-based RPG combat in this sequel to the hit RPG series Dragon's Blade!
Create your custom party from 9 different classes with unique abilities and set out on your adventure. You'll find challenging dungeons, unforgiving boss fights, dynamic item creation, and a deep elemental magic system that allows for virtually endless character customization and replayability.

name: Dr. Robotnik in Sonic the Hedgehog
summary:
“Eggrobo gone beserk and stole Robotnik’s ship and minions, you must stop him to took back your evil machine empire!!!”

Finally you can play as Doctor Robotnik/Eggman at the eternal classic Sonic 1 for Genesis.

name: Dr. Fad
summary: Based on a 1980's Saturday morning TV show called The Dr. Fad Show. Released in 1989.

name: Drunken Nuke'em
summary: Drunken Nuke'em is a different asymmetric multiplayer horror and humor game. One player (hunter) must kill the rest. The other members (the drunkards) must find a balance between collaboration and betrayal to survive since only one or two will be able to do so.

name: Dragon Ball: Kachinuke! Tenkaichi Budokai
summary: A handheld electronic game based on the anime series.

name: Dragon Sleuth Brittany
summary: Dragon Sleuth Brittany showcases high quality pixel art combined with a cool soundtrack, voiced dialogue and filled to the brim with lewd jokes, sex scenes and lewd mini games.

name: Dread Rune
summary: Dread Rune Is a roguelike RPG with 3d graphics and lots of variety and replayability. Every game is unique, with seven different playable characters, randomized levels and enemies, and over 120 items to collect and use. The game is simple to get into, but has lots of depth. Mastering of weapons, combos and strategic use of items will be required to win.

name: Drift'n'Drive
summary:
Follow your destiny to become the ultimate racing driver!
Drift'n'Drive is a vertically scrolling top-down racing game with lots of challenge and replayability. Progress through the career mode racing challenges, get to the top of leaderboards in time attack mode or challenge your friends to a local split screen multiplayer tournament!

name: Dr Nakamoto's Digital Eggs
summary:
Welcome to the world of Digital Eggs, an invention from the mind of the infamous Dr Nakamoto. You have found the last working prototype of the system but unfortunately it has been neglected and fallen into disrepair! You must help Dr Nakamoto resume his lost work, and finally discover if digital life forms can ever be really real!
You begin by inputting a genetic code into one of Dr Nakamoto's patented EGG delivery systems! Now care for your new pet by feeding, cleaning and taking it on walks to keep it engaged and happy. As your pet grows, it will collect toys and develop personality, earning XP until it is ready to evolve into new undiscovered lifeforms!

name: Dream Hopper
summary:
Calm your mind and enter a world of dreams.
Hop along to the groove of hypnotic rhythms to reveal technicolor dreamlike visions. Bring the true meaning of whimsical shapes into vivid focus as you discover a dazzling dreamscape of memories.
Dream Hopper is a zen-like experience of flow and discovery. Simply tap to hop from shape to shape and let your mind reveal a beautiful presence of calm.

name: Draw Mania
summary: Draw Mania is a fast & furious draw-and-guess multiplayer game that guarantees you'll be drawn in. Your goal is to draw a given word, and other players have to guess that word.

name: DragonSpear Ex
summary: DragonSphere is a traditional side-scrolling action RPG. Explore a world corrupted by 'Nightmare' and fight against powerful bosses with your friends.

name: Dragon Prana
summary: An evil king that threatened the world in the past becomes free from his seal after 120 years. The descendants of the heroes who saved the world have to stand up to fight this new evil. However, will the world overcome the suzerainty and racial pride of humans, elves and dwarves to face this threat? A fantastic retro RPG with top quality nostalgic pixel art and a game system worthy of modern times.

name: Druid Kingdom HD
summary: The creators of the My Kingdom for the Princess series, bring you The Druid Kingdom, a new popular resource management game with a fantastic new plot. Continue honing your skills in this unique genre that combines time management, simulator, and strategy, in four astonishing and colorful fairytale settings!

name: Drift Type C
summary: A multi-discipline real-physics driving game where the ghosts are actual ghosts. Drive 50+ real spec cars right from the factory on 100+ miles of track to free the God of Time. Master Drift, Time Attack, Off-road, Rally, and even a few head to head races against bad AI. Robust Creative Mode.

name: Dreamin' Her: Boku ha, Kanojo no Yume wo Miru
summary: From the creators of Seven Days and Lost:Smile, Life0 presents their third game: "Dreamin' Her". In his dreams, the ideal girlfriend appears taking the form of his childhood friend. Is she really just a dream, or is she something more?

name: Dragon Ball FighterZ: Super Edition
summary:
Dragon Ball FighterZ Super Edition includes:
• Goku (Ultra instinct)
• Kefla
• Broly (DBS)
• Gogeta (SSGSS)
• Jiren
• Zamasu (Fused)
• Vegito (SSGSS)
• Goku (SSGSS) and Vegeta (SSGSS) early unlock
• For each of these characters, you will receive 5 costume colors, a lobby avatar and Z stamp

name: Dragon Ball FighterZ: FighterZ Pass 3
summary:
The FighterZ Pass 3 will grant you 2-day early access to no less than 5 additional mighty characters that will surely enhance your FighterZ experience! Each fighter comes with their respective Z Stamp, Lobby Avatars, and set of Alternative Colors.

Contains the following fighters:
- Kefla
- Goku (Ultra Instinct)
- Master Roshi
- Super Baby 2
- Gogeta (SS4)

name: Dream Vacation Solitaire
summary: Dream Vacation Solitaire features over 30 games including: Sea Towers, Grandfather, Old Clock, Scorpion, Big Forty, Easthaven, and Blind Alleys. Making matches and combinations gives you access to power moves that let you clear the boards more easily. And if you do well enough, you'll earn medals, trophies, and even new yachts to sail to the next vacation paradise.

name: Dragon's Dogma Online: Season 2 - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Original DLC
- Artbook: The Art of Dragon’s Dogma Online Season 2

name: Dreams of Pain
summary: Dreams of Pain is a highly experimental first-person mystery horror game with elements of horror in its atmosphere. The structure of the game is mostly linear. The game incorporates ARG-like elements into its storytelling. The game's art style was inspired by retro games from the late '90s. It doesn't hold your hand and there are no traditional tutorials for the player. Some of the puzzles in the game are types of puzzles not seen in any game before.

name: Dreamscaper
summary: Dreamscaper is an English Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Natalie, a young girl who locked herself in her room. According to the developer, Dreamscaper uses American culture to contrast against the large amount of eastern/Japanese fangames out at the time. Dreamscaper plays like most fangames, focused on collecting effects and exploring Natalie's dream world.

name: Dream Genie
summary:
Dream Genie is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame Qiū Qín is the protagonist of this game. You collect Virtual Objects to gain progress, the game's version of effects.
A unique feature of this game is that Qiū Qín can be harmed by chasers in her dream, who will take off her Health Points if she is caught. Additionally, you can feed the strange pet rabbit Zabu with certain objects you can collect in the dream world to change its appearance, or release it and let it follow you through the dream world. You can also get four trophies by accessing some places in the game.

name: Drone Tinkerer
summary: Drone Tinkerer is an open-world racing game with many RPG elements. In a sci-fi world full of secrets, defeat your racing opponents with speed or weapons, modify your unique drones with hundreds of upgrades, and experience mini-games and riddles to keep getting stronger to discover the truth.

name: Dream Walk: Mortgage
summary: Dream Walk: Mortgage is a top-down arcade-style game that requires on quick maneuvering and simple multitasking. While avoiding bad-guys, petting cats, and collecting sunflower seeds, you must also remember to click the interest button. Accumulate Dream-Dollars to buy new shoes and dream-houses.

name: Dreaming Worlds
summary: Dive into the dreaming worlds of the four dream keepers and find out why they don't answer anymore. Rescue the trapped inhabitants of the dream worlds, change the dreams back to good and discover mysterious places and puzzles. But something dark will stand in your way.

name: Dream Journey
summary: Dream Journey is a Yume Nikki fangame created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam. It stars MC, a nonbinary character with no real name. It's a traditional fangame, based around exploring MC's dream world and collecting effects. As opposed to a bedroom, Dream Journey takes place on a moving train.

name: Dragons Garden: Merge 3 Game
summary: Travel to the Dragons Land, use your magic to purify poisoned lands, become friends with wondrous, fantastic Dragons and merge together your very own fantasy land in this No.1 merging and collecting game: Dragons Garden.

name: Dream Doll Dimension
summary: Dream Doll Dimension is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5. You explore a strange dimension, the goal of the game being to solve the puzzles in each room.

name: Dracula Series Part 2: The Myth of the Vampire
summary: Dracula Series Part 2: The Myth of the Vampire is an Adventure game, developed by Tetraedge and published by Anuman Interactive, which was released in Europe in 2010.

name: Dracula Series Episode 1: The Strange Case of Martha
Dracula Series Part 3: The Destruction of the Evil
summary: Dracula Series Part 3: The Destruction of the Evil is an Adventure game, developed by Tetraedge and published by Anuman Interactive, which was released in Europe in 2010.

name: Dream Day Wedding: Married in Manhattan
Dragon's Lair II: Time Warp
summary: Home ports of the game were announced for the Philips CD-i, 3DO Interactive Multiplayer, and Jaguar CD. However, only the CD-i version was actually released, though non-playable demos of the 3DO and Jaguar CD versions appear on those consoles' respective versions of Brain Dead 13.

name: Dream?
summary: Dream? is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The game features two playable characters: yuki and Aritsuki. Along with effects, Memories (思い出) can be collected that will change some areas in the dream world.

name: Dream Sequences
summary: Dream Sequences is a Yume Nikki fangame. Like other fangames, the game involves exploring the dream world and collecting effects. In this game effects are obtainable items which disappear after equipping them from the menu. In order to activate the effect again, you need to collect it again.

name: Dreams of Dead
summary: Dreams of Dead is a Russian Yume Nikki fangame. It's an exploration adventure horror game with a few puzzles. You play as a girl named Aya who wakes up in the hospital for unknown reasons.

name: Drunk As I Like: Gensokyo Chugging Contest
summary:
Compete in a frantic drinking competition against Gensokyo's residents,
try to keep your arms steady so you don't spill anything!

name: DreamDayKi
summary:
DreamDayKi is an English Yume Nikki fangame. It was made as an April Fool's joke, satirizing fangames that are essential re-skins of Yume Nikki.

DreamDayKi plays exactly like Yume Nikki, but with recolored graphics, different music playing in different locations, several new areas and an additional ending.

name: Dry
summary:
Dry is a Yume Nikki fangame. The dream gameplay involves exploration and collecting effects, called "Tracks" in this game. The main part of the game also has some dialogue, but is not the main focus. Dry is drawn in mostly grey shades, making it look somewhat depressing.

Dry is about an alcoholic deer named Dry, who had recently graduated from college and is about to enter university. The game begins with him sitting in a pub and asking the bartender for another drink, but he talks him out of it and tells him to go home.

The problem is Dry is far away from home right now, as his father gave him a CD that should help him to overcome his addiction. His father said that Dry should be far away from home for it to work, so he took a tent and traveled to the place where the game starts.

name: Drainus
summary: This is a side-scrolling shooting game in which you take control of the "Drainus", the Kharlal Empire's most cutting-edge fighter with the ability to absorb energy bullets, and take down the enemy ships zipping through space.

name: DreamWorks Dragons: Legends of the Nine Realms
summary: Unleash your inner dragon and fly beyond the Hidden World, on a fiery adventure to rescue Thunder’s family and save the dragon kingdoms!

name: Drunk or Dead 2
summary: Immerse yourself in the virtual nightmare of Drunk or Dead 2, a post-apocalyptic VR world where you and your crew fight to survive against a nearly endless zombie horde with the help of a little booze and a whole truckload of high-powered guns.

name: Drums Rock
summary: Drums Rock is an arcade drums game for VR, follow the rhythm of rock with your drums and smash the demons. Live a unique campaign: with different levels, challenges, songs and worlds. Drums Rock is an ideal game to feel like a rock hero, while destroying hordes of demons to the rhythm of rock!

name: Dreadful Hours
summary: Dreadful Hours is a fast paced time managing survival horror game where multiple creatures are trying to attack you at every point. You must watch the cameras and then decide your next moves while using as little power as possible.

name: Drop: System Breach
summary: Welcome to Drop, a fast-paced action-strategy hacking simulator. Ready to hack your way to fame and fortune while avoiding getting caught? Use stealth and cunning to maneuver between the ongoing power struggle of corporations and factions to control the fragmented networks in the city.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Team Training
summary: Dragon Ball Z: Team Training is a Pokémon Fire Red mod that makes your game all the Dragon Ball epicness you could ever want. Basically, if you wanted to have a pet Goku to fight your enemies with in Pokémon, this is all of that and more. There are currently 180 Dragon Ball "fighters" (Pokémon) in the game, and the locations reflect places in the DB world.

name: Drifting Kings
summary: Drifting Kings is Stylized Arcade offline/online Drifting/Touge/Gymkhana racing game with a colorful and stylized environments. fun to play ,hard to master.

name: Drunken Fist 2: Zombie Hangover
summary: The inebriated antics of Drunken Fist are back with brutal vengeance as you take the role of a hungover rocker in Drunken Fist 2: Zombie Hangover! Waking up in a city full of undead hordes, it’s your job to stumble through the streets pummeling zombie op…

name: Dress Cake
summary: Dress Cake cordially invites you to the Candy Kingdom Ball! Coralina has been waiting all her life for this event. When her Fairy Godmother answers the call, she reveals her wand has been broken. But Coralina won't be swayed! Take destiny into your own hands on a fantastical trip through Candy Kingdom to find the perfect, exquisite candy dress. Mouth-watering fashion awaits in Dress Cake!

name: Dragon Quest X: Nemureru Yuusha to Michibiki no Meiyuu Online
summary: The first expansion for Dragon Quest X Online, known as Version 2.

name: Dragon Quest X: Inishie no Ryuu no Denshou Online
summary: The second expansion for Dragon Quest X Online, known as Version 3.

name: Dream Catcher VR
summary: Dream Catcher VR is a relaxing puzzle adventure in the soulful world of Nappia – the land of dreams. Meet characters from varied backgrounds and shape their dreams – search for hidden parts, mend fractured memories, clear your path, and bring colors to the surroundings.

name: Dr. Rin ni Kiitemite! Koi no Happy Four Season
summary: A dating sim where you get put in the shoes of Meirin and can go for four different boys.

name: Drago Noka
summary: The surface has become overrun with giant beasts and destructive vermin, leaving an uninhabitable world in their quake. Humans had to get creative and now… they live on the backs of dragons! Gather various materials, create new items, and develop your very own village in Drago Noka!

name: Drunk Games
summary: "Drunk Games" is a 2D top down shooter with Battle Royal elements. The player, surrounded by other characters, must collect as many bottles as possible, knocking them out of other drunkards!

name: Dragon Hunt Adventure
summary: An adventure set in a classic rpg fantasy world.

name: DreadHaunt
summary: Join the hunts as 5 agents in this multiplayer Co-op & PVP about horror and deception. One of you will be possessed then become a ghost, and the others must survive the haunting!

name: Dragon Up
summary:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Hatch and collect rare dragons — then help them revive their magic in this colorful and beautifully animated idle adventure game.

Save the kingdom by discovering each dragon's unique design and personality. Some dragons — like the Pug Dragon, the Queen Dragon and the Robo Dragon — offer better rewards and moneymaking abilities.

Expand your idle kingdom by unlocking more lands and exotic habitats. Upgrade your dragons and nests, and they'll produce more coins. Collect cards and magic potions, then level up your favorite dragons to increase their abilities.

The best way to make money is to eat money. Feed gold to your pet dragon Billy at the end of each day, and you'll unlock amazing treasures, new dragons, and new nests. Rebuild your nests, bring back your dragons, expand your kingdom and create your own dragon utopia.

Ramp up the fun with time-limited events. Win rare dragons, gems and potions to help advance your main quest.

name: Dream Well
summary: What price would you pay to keep nightmares at bay?

name: Dragon Warrior
summary:
All is darkness. The Dragonlord has captured the Princess and stolen Erdrick's powerful ball of light. You are Erdrick's heir. To you has fallen the most dangerous task— to rescue the King's daughter and recover the mystical ball of light. Your mission is deadly, but it is your fate. Prophets have foretold your coming.

Three keepers await your journey, each ready to aid you with a mystic item of great power. Gather the three objects. Scribes will record your deeds. Use cunning and wisdom to choose your commands. Gain experience, weapons and armor as you battle your way through the world. Rest if you must.

Search out the Dragonlord's lair and face your destiny. In this role-playing adventure, you are the Dragon Warrior!

name: Dragon Warrior I & II
summary:
Dragon Warrior I & II is an enhanced remake of the first two Dragon Warrior games.

It has a few modifications to gameplay, but the interface and graphics have been enhanced to be on a par with the 1998 Dragon Quest Monsters: Terry's Wonderland.

name: Dragon Warrior III
summary:
Dragon Warrior III is a top-down role-playing game where you travel around the overworld, caves, castles, cities and other locations while battling random encounters, buying equipment, and talking to people.

You and your party members receive experience when they beat up monsters and level up with enough experience, increasing their stats.

The game features a day/night cycle - as you travel, day slowly changes to night and vice versa; shops are typically closed at night.

You begin with control of just the main character but can quickly recruit three more members to your party. During the game you can choose to drop your current characters and recruit others at any time. The recruitable characters are divided into six classes: soldier, fighter, merchant, goof-off, pilgrim and wizard.

The game has a unique job system, giving you the ability to switch your hired characters' classes after they have achieved at least level 20 in their base class. Characters can switch to the other beginning classes, as well as the sage class, which is not available at the beginning. When a character switches classes, they lose all earned experience points, and half of their stats, but retain all the abilities of the previous class. In this way, you can create powerful combination characters that are able to cast spells and fight effectively.

name: Dragon Warrior II
summary:
Dragon Warrior II is an early top-down RPG that expands and improves on its predecessor. Unlike the first game, Dragon Warrior II allows the player to join forces with two other characters, a magic-using princess and a wizard-warrior prince.

Also including expanded monster battles involving up to 6 creatures and a much larger world, Dragon Warrior II is an important step in the evolution of the Dragon Warrior series.

name: Dragon Quest V: Tenkuu no Hanayome
summary: Dragon Quest V: Tenkuu no Hanayome is a role-playing video game and the fifth installment in the Dragon Quest video game series, second of the Zenithian Trilogy. Originally developed by Chunsoft and published by Enix Corporation, Dragon Quest V was the first title in the series to be released for the Super Famicom video game console in Japan in September 1992. Dragon Quest V was the first game in the series to not be released outside Japan due to programming issues at the time.

name: Dragon Warrior III
summary: Dragon Quest III: Soshite Densetsu e... is a remake of the third Dragon Quest for the Game Boy Color.

name: Dr. Doe's Chemistry Quiz
summary: The adorable science deer Dr. Doe is here to test your knowledge of chemistry! Answer correctly, she strips. Answer all perfectly and.. well you can imagine what your reward will be!

name: Dragon Quest VIII: Journey of the Cursed King
summary: Experience one of the most critically acclaimed Dragon Quest game in full 3D!

name: Draw Saber
summary:
Draw your sword's trajectory, cut your enemy!
Watch out for your opponent's attack.

name: Dream Life
summary: Dream Life is a dedicated console life simulation game targeted at girls between the ages of 8 and 14 created by Hasbro and released in 2005. Dream Life is a game where players create a girl character, ranging from hair to clothes. They can also determine how smart, funny, athletic, creative or outgoing the girl character is.

name: Dreamward
summary: Dreamward started as a student pitch project at Carnegie Mellon University, Entertainment Technology Center. We created a puzzle-solving game experience combining novel gameplay with amazing art and music inspired by Tang and Tubo cultures.

name: Dream Magic Will
summary: In a magical forest, animals began to occupy the territory of other animals for unknown reasons. In order to find out the truth, a team guarding the forest was born!Build a guard force to prevent enemy invasion and explore the truth of the forest!

name: Dreamland
summary: Boy and Suicide Day and Dream Universe

name: DreamIsland
summary: This game is an action exploration game where you complete various missions and collect 51 cards. The map is an open world, and you'll have to solve people's problems and unravel the mysteries of the world from a vast map!

name: Dreadful River
summary: The realm is under attack. The king and his most loyal guards are trying to save the Eternal Crown. Floating down a vast river on a simple raft, you have to fight enemies, improve your gear, find allies and explore mysteries along the shores. Can you turn the tide?

name: DracoFighter
summary: DracoFighter is a solo-developed 2D fighting game with a focus on accessibility and local multiplayer, with movesets that are easy to learn but harder to master. Explore the stories of these hand-animated characters in a futuristic world led by dragons!

name: Dreams with Furry
summary: Dreams with Furry - Cleopatra, Mulan and Joan of Arc are now furry girls! Relaxing gameplay and cute atmosphere.

name: Dragon's Dilemma
summary: Journey forth from your cave in this satirical visual novel starring a grumpy dragon! Encounter all sorts of people, obtain companions, and go on dates as you try to clear your (relatively) good name. Includes branching dialog, mini-games, and much more.

name: Droned
summary: Droned is a small, passion project that brings friends together for some good old fashion action. In that spirit, get your friends online and hop straight in some top-down combat.

name: Dr. Chatelet: Faith
summary: Amputations, bloodletting, alchemy - all of which seem unthinkable today - were the treatment options that medieval doctors revered. You must face challenges one after another and experience gains and losses in the course of your constant adventures

name: Dr. Mario
summary: Dr. Mario is a falling block tile-matching video game, in which Mario assumes the role of a doctor, dropping two-colored medical capsules into a medicine bottle representing the playing field.

name: Dreamland: Village Life
summary: A Reimagined Open-World Game Inspired by Classics. Farming, Fishing, RPG Adventures, Weapons Manufacturing, Mining, Diving, World Exploration, and Making Friends with Cute Villagers!

name: Dragon Blaze
summary: Dragon Blaze is a vertical-scrolling shooter game that first appeared in arcades in 2000. The heroes are the four dragon riders. Attack using normal shots, bombs, magic shots, and powerful close-range dragon shots.

name: Dream Girlfriend
summary: Create your very own fully-customizable anime girl! Change her clothes, personality and even her voice! Chat, go on dates, join events, and so much more!

name: Dream Dancer
summary: Dream Dancer puts you in front and center in a competition to determine if you're the next pop music icon. Every aspect of your pop performance is customizable, so create the total superstar package! Mix songs to create a top radio hit, design trendy outfits for your performances, choreograph unique dance moves, record your performance and share your music video with friends via local wireless connection.

name: Dream Day: Wedding
summary:
A romantic seek-and-find adventure featuring beautiful graphics and unique puzzle games. Visit the florist, gown shop, bakery, and other shops to make Jenny's wedding day a dream! But be warned! The challenging Wedding Crisis levels are sure to throw you for a loop! Can you make Jenny's Dream Day Wedding happen?
12 levels.
9 mini-games.
Ever-changing gameplay.

name: Dribble
summary:
Dribble is a mobile game about a super ball bashing business bots to bits!

With revoluntary swipe-based controls, you can kiss on-screen buttons goodbye! Just swipe to toss the ball! It's that simple! Not to mention that you'll tackle crazy platforming challenges in bizarre and over-the-top worlds like a jungle where it rains paint or a castle made out of pillows!

name: Dreambound
summary: Mysterious deaths. Friends, both old and new. Dreams that are reality, and reality that is a dream. Will Noah be able to move forward and solve the mystery⁠—or will he give in to the demons of his past? A story-rich BL mystery visual novel.

name: Driving Quest
summary: In Driving Quest you will rediscover the joy of driving! Explore a breathtaking environment and accomplish a variety of challenging & exciting missions!

name: Draughts
summary: A game of draughts (a.k.a. checkers) written for the Ferranti Mark 1 computer by Christopher Strachey at the University of Manchester between 1951 and 1952. In the summer of 1952, the program was able to "play a complete game of Draughts at a reasonable speed".

name: Driven
summary: Driven is an F1 racing game that combines realistic aspects of the sport with some outrageous elements inspired by the film. In the game's Story Mode, you take on the alternating roles of Joe Tanto and Jimmy Bly with the goal of completing 12 objectives taken from the movie.

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers - Special Edition
summary:
The Special Edition includes:
- The game
- Special Edition content:
Features a set of cosmetic items that will make your survivor stand out on the battlefield! Show off your style with a complete outfit, celebrate your wins with a victory pose, and escape with character using a fun vehicle skin!
- Customizable Costume items: Souvenir Jacket (Midnight Black), Skinny Jeans (Black), Slip-On Shoes (Gray), Casual Watch (Black)
- Victory Pose "Two Handed-Good"
- Vehicle Skin "Dragon (Yellow)"

name: Dragon's Curse
summary: A port of Wonder Boy III: The Dragon's Trap developed by Hudson Soft for the PC-Engine. It was released in Japan under the title of Adventure Island, shouldn't be confused with the Adventure Island series, also by Hudson Soft.

name: Dreams of a Lifetime
summary: Dreams of a Lifetime is an action-adventure game played from both a third-person and first-person perspective. The Player must complete missions and micro-missions to progress through the game's story. In addition to missions, players can explore the game open world, among other things. The game consists of 14 levels, 2 of which are extra levels. New levels are unlocked as the player progresses through the story and correctly completes missions and micro-missions.

name: Dr.Pumpkin
summary: There an experiment middle of nowhere and The Monster is now wandering around the world! No one is safe can you save the entire world??

name: Dragon Ball Z: Super Butouden 2
summary:
Dragon Ball Z: Super Butouden 2 is a port of the SNES game of the same name, made by Hummer Team sometime during the 90s.

This is one of many pirated fighting games on the Famicom to use the Street Fighter II Engine. Unlike most Hummer Team games, it is in full Japanese as opposed to English. The story was completely removed from this version. However, the Arcade, Versus and CPU vs CPU modes are present. The characters are fought in a random order, and are always fought on certain stages.

The graphics and music are taken from the original game and simplified, with some characters sharing stages. Many of the stages themselves use multi-layered scrolling. The forest stage's theme, which is Bojack's theme from the original game, was reused in Tekken 2, another game by Hummer Team. The ending is taken from the original game, albeit without the credits.

name: Drain Runner
summary: Survive the ever-evolving hazards of The Drain as you rail grind, magnetize, blast and ground pound your way through this fast-paced action roguelike!

name: Droid Warfare
summary: An exoplanet named Pumara is a highly resourceful world & is civilized by cybernetic androids. An army of Alien- based Androids launches an international invasion in attempt to take control of the planet. The citizens of Pumara formed an alliance to fight the alien forces & to protect their planet.

name: Dragon Mine
summary: Go through the numerous mazes and try to get to the cave full of gold waiting at the end, but remember - the journey won't be easy. Think fast and move precisely to get to the exit - any delay may result in the escape portal to be covered with mysterious water, blocking your way out.

name: DraeAscaria
summary: DraeAscaria is a cozy, magical adventure RPG with farm sim elements. Experience a compelling story, rich cast of characters and original music.

name: Driftmaster
summary: A fixed-angle, top-down, arcade drift racer. Race through different cities and gymkhanas throughout Canada to develop mastery over your drift. Your mightiest opponent...is yourself

name: DreamCell: Lost in Nightmares
summary: DreamCell: Lost in Nightmares is a randomly generated action with rogue-like elements. Conquer your nightmares and find a way out of your dark dreams in single player or co-op mode!

name: Dream Tactics
summary: Choose your party, build your decks and battle with cards in Dream Tactics, a turn-based strategy RPG where character customization is key! Lead Neru and friends on an adventure to unravel the mystery of the Dream World and wake its inhabitants from eternal sleep.

name: Drift Go
summary: Drift Go is Multiplayer and Singleplayer Drift Simulation and Driving Game.

name: Draconis Volatus
summary: SHMUP with more tactics and some RPG Elements. Flying dragons and advance a quest to save the world.

name: Dream Date
summary: Dream Date is a relaxed and leisure AVG Galgame. Date, communicate, enhance feelings and record good memories with girls!

name: Drill Dash
summary: Inspired by old school arcade shooters, mixed with roguelike elements, Drill Dash is set in a post-apocalyptic world where mech-equipped drillers are launched from railgun platforms into a vast environment full of destructive raiders, haywire robots and mutated locals.

name: Drug Lord Simulator
summary: Production, dealing, and most importantly, raking in the big money. Drug Lord Simulator puts you in the front-row seat to a drug deal gone bad. With everything lost, you now have to make your way back to the top, starting with virtually nothing. That is, of course, if you survive the climb.

name: Dragon Friends: The Secret of Green Witch
Dransik
summary: Dransik is a retro fantasy MMORPG that offers a variety of different ways to develop your character as you explore the world of Dransik.

name: Dragon Ball Super TCG
summary: Dragon Ball Super Card Game is a card game with characters from not just Dragon Ball Super, but countless other Dragon Ball series!

name: Dream vs. Dream
summary: Dream vs. Dream is a community-developed fighting game based off the characters and locations found in Yume Nikki and its various spin-offs and fangames.

name: Dream Hearts Dream
summary: A fake dating sim version of the Yume Nikki fighting fangame Dream vs. Dream released on April Fools Day 2014.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Ultra Pack 2
summary:
Play as Android 21 from Dragon Ball FighterZ, and Majuub from Dragon Ball GT with Ultra Pack 2.
• 2 New characters: Android 21, Majuub
• 5 New Parallel Quests
• 8 Additional Skills
• 5 Costumes/Accessories
• 8 Super Souls

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Extra DLC Pack 3
summary:
This Extra DLC Pack 3 is the perfect content to enhance your experience with a lot of new elements:
• 2 New Powerful Characters: Kefla and Super Baby 2
• 5 New Parallel Quests
• 4 New Costumes
• 8 New Skills
• 2 New Super Souls

name: Dreamcharger
summary: Rogue-lite game about fights with random bosses and a full-fledged story campaign. Fight, craft, and become more powerful, to solve the main riddle.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse - GT Pack 1
summary: Extend your experience in the unique universe of Dragon Ball Xenoverse with this DLC GT Pack 1.

name: Droid Trivia
summary: Droid Trivia is fun for everyone! Challenge your friends or family to over 800 questions spread over 15 categories! Go head to head in local couch multiplayer or play against the AI. Choose to Play 4 or 8 rounds or just the individual rounds you like.

name: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2023
summary: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2023 puts you in the role of head coach for your favorite college football team. Recruit, gameplan and make the right calls on the field to lead your team to the top of the ranks and the college football championship.

name: Dream Logic
summary: Dream Logic is a story driven first-person atmospheric horror game which takes place in liminal spaces. Explore various nostalgic, dreamlike, uncanny environments while avoiding entities that are attempting to murder you.

name: Draw Rider Remake
summary: Draw Rider - a classic racing game, made in 2D.

name: Drag Journey
summary: Join this Drag Journey thorough the desert in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Dragon Man: Reignited
summary: Dragon Man: Reignited is a fangame in the Mega Man universe taking a new spin on the refined, classic NES style, starring the titular Dragon Man, a long-forgotten fangame character brought back in polished pixel art glory. 8 all new Robot Masters are yours to take on in a mysterious tournament, with secrets at every turn! Will you be up to the challenge of taking home the glimmering trophy?

name: Droneboi 2
summary: Welcome to the sequel of the open-world sandbox space drone constructor and combat game for mobile, Droneboi 2!

name: Drunk: Relapsed
summary: Drunk: Relapsed is a challenging and comedic 3D adventure. You will need to stumble and hop through the treacherous streets and alleys to reach the safety of your house. On your journey you'll be able to collect drinks to unlock new outfits.

name: Dream Walk: Stolen Color
summary: Retrieve the stolen mysterious color as you fight your way through hordes of nightmares and other bizarre denizens of the dream world.

name: Dream of Light
summary: This is a walking simulator developed by Unreal 4. The scene contains a certain amount of fragmented dialogue content. It tells the story of a young girl who left her hometown to venture into the outside world. .......

name: Dragon Must Die
summary: In the age of dragons, the most sexy and beautiful girls in the world are guarded by dragons, and they determine the fate of mankind. For the most noble freedom, for the highest quality genes, is it killing and plundering or heroism and redemption?

name: Drift Station: Real Driving - Open World Car Game
Dragon Quest IV: Chapters of the Chosen
summary: The English iOS/Android version of Dragon Quest IV brings back the Party Chat feature which was absent from the English DS version.

name: Dreamer's Road
summary: Help make the world a better place while carrying the weight of your studies and 3 jobs on your shoulders! Experience the reality of thousands of young immigrants in the United States, seeking to improve themselves and help the growth of this great nation.

name: Dragon's Heaven
summary: Dragon's Heaven is an incomplete and cancelled fighting game for the Neo-Geo. The game was being developed by Kengo Asai, who had previously worked on Voltage Fighter Gowcaizer and The Last Blade.

name: Dreamed Away
summary: Dreamed Away is an emotional action-adventure RPG with psychological horror elements. Play as Théo, a boy lost in a dark, mysterious world. Explore a unique reality, duel against darkness in a unique, fast paced combat system and mind your choices.

name: Dreamables
summary: First-person survival horror You may encounter unrealistic monsters and be intrigued with luck.There is a small chance that you will die from anything that damages you. Be careful out there.

name: Dream Fight Will
summary: This is an exciting and interesting action clearance game. You control all the enemies you defeat to fight. The game can be a single player, a duel with two people, a team of five people, a 10v10 battle, a melee with 25 people, and so on!

name: Dreadfire
summary: Dreadfire is a thrilling ultraviolent FPS game. Shred your enemies with a large destructive arsenal. Destroy them until none remain. They won't stop until you're dead.

name: Drowned
summary: Jump your way through a flooded land in Drowned, a 2D side-scrolling platform adventure with atmospheric environments and an immersive world to explore. Join the adventure now!

name: Dreamout
summary: Explore a surreal world filled with the strangest and most incredible events! You will never know what awaits you around the corner!

name: Drug Dealer Manager
summary: Build your drug empire in an isometric crime tycoon game. Hire dealers and create supply chains. Avoid or bribe the officials. Spy and fight your competition to take over city districts. Command in real-time with active pause. Be the cartel king!

name: Dreamed
summary: Dreamed is an experimental, surreal first-person puzzle game with non-puzzle elements in-between.

name: Drake
summary: Drake is a narrative driven Action RPG. Build your character. Meet factions controlling the distant desert planet called Drake. Face alien fauna. Uncover the mystery hidden under the surface. Explore this harsh Space Western World.

name: Dragon Island
summary: Henry Heimlich, a shark dragon lifesaver suddenly received a ticket to Dragon Island, the famous resort. Follow Henry to the island, and create some unique memory on the long shore with 6 other dragons!

name: Drug Grower Simulator
summary: A co-op crime story about the struggle for power in the city with detailed cannabis production mechanics, in which you have to decide the outcome of the gang war and the fate of cannabis legalization. Whether you cooperate with the FBI or supply gangs with dope, you have to produce the best!

name: Dry School
summary: You have managed to put together a school on top of this wastelands, now it's your turn to defend your students by strategically rearranging their desks and wetting the evil fish that want to prevent them from having a nice education <3

name: DragKnockFight
summary: Colorful puzzle game with time sensitive levels.

name: Dragon Spirit
summary: A port of Dragon Spirit for Namco handheld device.

name: Dragon Run Classic
summary: Dragon Run Classic is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels of as you complete your epic run as a dragon.

name: Driverio
summary: Driverio learns to drive better and improves his experience. Help Driverio get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: Drag Journey: Nitro
summary: Join this Drag Journey thorough the drag racing in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Drift Horizon: Racing, Driving & Parking Trial Simulator Games
summary: Become a legendary drifter! Tune and upgrade your car, install parts and boost performance!

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii
summary: Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the pre-made templates or create your own illustrations.

name: Dragon Quest Treasures: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes Dragon Quest Treasures, three monster allies, and some consumable items for your journey:

- Main Game "Dragon Quest Treasures"
- Great Sabrecat (x1)
- Ruby Golem (x1)
- Icy Dragling (x1)
- Bestest Buddy Bullet (x25)
- Omniheal Bomb (x25)

name: Draco
summary: Draco is a pixelart-style 2D platform game in which you control Draco, a small dragon who tries to save the kingdom of Mugen from the suffering caused by the new king.

name: Dragonfield
summary: Fight in epic medieval fantasy sandbox battles! Use swords, shields, bows, magic spells, ballistas, catapults and more. Ride armored horses and fly giant dragons. Or just watch armies of bots battle it out with ragdoll physics and destructible environments!

name: Drift racing car
