summary: This is a racing game that can drift flexibly. You can make your own game vehicles, vehicle hubs and friction smoke. Multi vehicle viewing angle, arbitrary switching

name: Droid Death VR
summary: Droid Death VR is a Multiplayer Shooter in Virtual Reality set in a sci fi universe where maps are designed around specific planets to have fun shooting your friends and other players.

name: Dragon Ball Z
summary:
Plug & Play from Jakks Pacific released in 2005. There are 3 main modes available:

• Buto-Retsuden: Arcade Mode in which you have to compete in 1v1 matches. The sprites look similar to the SNES DBZ games
• Kamehameha Assault: Try to conquer all 7 Dragon Balls in a kind of "pong" clone
• Pinball: Search for secret triggers and collects as much points as possible: you'll unlock a boss fight and if you win, you'll get a Dragon Ball. Conquer all 7 and a wish of yours will come true

name: Dreamworks Animation
summary: Dreamworks Animation is a Plug It In & Play TV Game system with 5 games based off Dreamworks' Shrek and Over The Hedge movies released by Jakks Pacific and developed by Handheld Games, LLC in 2006.

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2023
summary: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2023 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite football team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents right down to creating and calling your own plays to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Draw a Line Adventure
summary: Draw a line adventure is a ridiculous and fresh touch classic platform game. Featuring 36 levels of non-stop fun with easy to learn gameplay. But it's not gonna be easy, levels are harder and harder. Try to grab all coins with limited time and length of your path.

name: Dreamed Away
summary: A walking simulator in which you control a mentally ill hero. You must escape the "something'' you encounter and return to the original world as you know it. Explore the map while running away from "something" and find a way to escape.

name: Dream Football Club
summary: Is the foreign soccer hand tour too tiring? And domestic cannot control too boring? "Football Dream Team"-Easy Control Strategy Competition! Realize the dream of football fans for many years!

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot + A New Power Awakens Set - Ultimate Edition
Dreadhunter
summary: Plough through hordes of deadly monsters and defeat vicious bosses in an intense fast paced shooter RPG where all items are “legendary”, levels are ever-changing and combat is razor-sharp.

name: Dragonspire
summary: Embark on an epic journey into the anime world of Asteria. Bring your friends along and delve into endlessly different scenarios in this action-packed cooperative roguelike.

name: Dream Swing
summary: Grapple and air-strafe your way to the top of the Leaderboard in this fast-paced movement-based time trial. Collect as many candies as possible within 5 minutes as you dip and weave around the ruins in the sky. Can you handle the speed?

name: Dragon Quest Monsters: Terry's Wonderland Retro
DreamWorks Dragons
summary: DreamWorks Dragons, based on the How to Train Your Dragon franchise is a Plug & Play Hero Portal game developed by HotGen and published by Jakks Pacific in 2014. Similar to Skylanders, you place a figure on the Hero Portal base to play the game.

name: Dragon Fun Classic
summary: Dragon Fun Classic is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Dreadful Tales: The Fire Within - Collector's Edition
summary: When Jill and Josh Weaver take their daughter on a relaxing hike, they’re hoping for photo opportunities and family bonding, but they get more excitement than they bargained for as disturbing messages and menacing pranks escalate into physical threats. Soon Jill is all alone, stalked by a terrifying figure wielding a flamethrower. With the fog closing in and her family still missing, it becomes clear that her nightmare has only just begun! Can you reunite Jill’s family and uncover the secret of Coldfell Forest’s dark past? Find out in this thrilling hidden object puzzle adventure!

name: Dreamspace
summary: DREAMSPACE is a turn-based RPG with low poly graphics along with pixel art reminiscent of a PSX game! Battles happen from a front-view perspective, with a timed attack system similar to a rhythm game!

name: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Cobi's Journey
summary: This version is included in the Dragon Quest Monsters 1+2 and features updated graphics and a new interface.

name: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Tara's Adventure
summary: This version is included in the Dragon Quest Monsters 1+2 and features updated graphics and a new interface.

name: Dragon Quest X: All In One Package - Versions 1-6
summary: A new all-in-one package featuring versions 1 to 6 of Dragon Quest X Online.

name: Dream Girl Premier
summary: Dream Girl Premier is a Simulation game developed and published by Alchemist for the Nintendo 3DS. It was released exclusively in Japan on November 19, 2015. Become a model production rookie model and aim to become the supermodel of your dreams while working for magazines and TV. In addition to various coordination items, hairstyles, and makeup, there are many things that girls aspire to, such as romance with boyfriends and interaction with fellow models. A fulfilling girl’s life awaits you.

name: Druin Faust
summary:
The Universe has just enough power to bring a being to life, one final time.
You are the last hope all of creation has left for survival.

name: Dreamwild
summary: Dreamwild is a fast paced, Arcade-Styled FPS set in a multitude of unique and bizarre psychedelic worlds! Slice through the endless horde with your accursed sword, discover the secrets that the DreamWilds have to offer, and get to the bottom of the dark plague spreading through all Mindspace!

name: Driverio 2
summary: Driverio learns to drive better and improves his experience. Help Driverio get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Conton City Vote Pack
summary:
・3 New Characters: Goku (Ultra Instinct -Sign-), Dyspo, Vegeta (GT)
・2 Extra Missions
・4 New Parallel Quests
・10 Additional Moves
・4 Costumes/Accessories
・5 Super Souls
・15 Illustrations

name: Dreamfall Chapters: Book One - Reborn
summary:
Book One: Reborn is the first part of Dreamfall Chapters, released on October 21st, 2014.

Expanding on the saga of The Longest Journey and Dreamfall, Dreamfall Chapters is an episodic adventure game about choice and consequence, about dreams and reality, magic and science, chaos and order, and about the people whose actions may change the course of history in all worlds.

name: Dreamfall Chapters: Book Two - Rebels
summary:
Book Two: Rebels is the second part of Dreamfall Chapters. It was released on March 12th, 2015.

Expanding on the saga of The Longest Journey and Dreamfall, Dreamfall Chapters is an episodic adventure game about choice and consequence, about dreams and reality, magic and science, chaos and order, and about the people whose actions may change the course of history in all worlds.

name: Dreamfall Chapters: Book Three - Realms
summary:
Book Three: Realms is the third part of Dreamfall Chapters. Although the episode was widely expected to be available in early June, RTG postponed the release until after E3. Eventually, a release date of June 25th, 2015 was announced.

Expanding on the saga of The Longest Journey and Dreamfall, Dreamfall Chapters is an episodic adventure game about choice and consequence, about dreams and reality, magic and science, chaos and order, and about the people whose actions may change the course of history in all worlds.

name: Dreamfall Chapters: Book Four - Revelations
summary:
Book Four: Revelations is the fourth part of Dreamfall Chapters. Between Books 3 and 4, RTG ported the game to Unity 5.2 – a prerequisite for the impending PS4 version and a necessity to profit from further Unity patches. It was released on December 3rd, 2015.

Expanding on the saga of The Longest Journey and Dreamfall, Dreamfall Chapters is an episodic adventure game about choice and consequence, about dreams and reality, magic and science, chaos and order, and about the people whose actions may change the course of history in all worlds.

name: Dreamfall Chapters: Book Five - Redux
summary:
Book Five: Redux is the fifth, concluding part of Dreamfall Chapters. It was released on June 17th, 2016.

Expanding on the saga of The Longest Journey and Dreamfall, Dreamfall Chapters is an episodic adventure game about choice and consequence, about dreams and reality, magic and science, chaos and order, and about the people whose actions may change the course of history in all worlds.

name: Dreamland
summary: Welcome to Dreamland! A town which hosts the wildest college spring break activities filled with hot girls, parties and sex. However, if you look close enough, you'll discover that Dreamland also hides a dark and horrifying mystery which haunts you and your friends...

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Legendary Pack Set
summary:
The Legendary Pack Set bundles both Legendary Pack 1 and 2!
In addition to Pikkon and Toppo (God of Destruction) in Legendary Pack 1, you are on board for a lot of new content including additional Characters, Parallel Quests, Super Souls, Costumes and a lot more!

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Legend Patrol Pack
summary: This pack lets you personally experience the main Time Patrol story from DRAGON BALL Xenoverse. This giant-sized pack also contains content from “GT Arc”.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse - GT Pack 2 + Mira and Towa
summary:
Extend your experience in the unique universe of Dragon Ball Xenoverse with this DLC GT Pack 2 :
- 4 Playable characters (Eis Shenron, Nuova Shenron, Mira, Towa)
- Episodes and Quests
- Masters and Masters Quests
- Skills, Costumes and accessories
- Z-souls

name: Dragon Princess is Hungry
summary: Eva, the half-dragon, half-human princess. Pfuel, the steward, who serves Eva. They visit a mysterious isolated island infested with monster girls, and Pfuel collects food for Eva on the island. However, there is a secret hidden on the island.

name: DragonScales 1-7 Bundle
summary: All seven parts of the famous tile-matching and strategy game! Connect tiles of one color to vaporize rows. Use powerful spells and receive bonuses, fight evil bosses and enjoy all seven parts of the "DragonScales" serial with over 900 levels!

name: Dreamcutter
summary: The Dreamcutter, a mysterious scythe with an ulterior motive, promises sexy rewards and a chance at escape. What strange dangers and exotic encounters will you find inside your own mind?

name: Drag n Merge Hexagons
summary:
Drag n merge is a cool mix of hexa puzzle, number merge, math and match-3 games. You will fall in love with this innovative puzzle game immediately. It is a relaxing and brain training hexa math game.

Just place the bottom number to a number on the board to be added or subtracted to match 3 or more same adjacent numbers, then they will be merged into the next higher number.

name: Dragon Age: Origins - A Tale of Orzammar
summary: A Tale of Orzammar is a promotional module for Dragon Age: Origins that was created by BioWare and released as a bonus with the December 2009 edition of PC Gamer. It is an unvoiced storyline that serves as a prologue to the Dwarf Noble Origin and was created in collaboration with the magazine as an example of what could be made with the modding toolset. The module is also included with the GOG release of Dragon Age: Origins via an update patch.

name: Drive West Coast
summary: Drive from the dense forests to the city streets to the coastline. Unlock and collect 19 unique vehicles by finding hidden keys and beating high scores.

name: Drug Dealer Simulator 2
summary: What turns a person into a drug dealer? A drug dealer into a drug lord? Find out in DDS2, a first-person sim set in a dynamic open world. Make contacts, cook drugs, and manage your cartel on Isla Sombra, where power is the only law.

name: Dracula Defense!
summary: Dracula Defense is a top down 2D tower defense game where the player will need to act strategically to survive an onslaught of enemies trying to attack a base.

name: DrugRunner
summary: Drug Runner is a 3D game in which you have to run along the road and dodge obstacles, on the way collecting bonuses and coins that give you points. If you can jump over the barrier by pressing the "space bar".

name: Dr Livesey Rom and Death Edition
summary: Gentlemen, from now on, rom and death means the same thing for you.

name: Drift: Space Survival
summary: Drift is a co-op survival adventure set in a mysterious asteroid field. Craft, build and explore alone or with friends to rebuild the technology you lost when your research ship crashed.

name: Dragon Ball Z Taisen-gata Search Battle
summary: Based on the Dragon Ball Z series, Search Battle allows you to draw or use stamps to create a fighter to battle characters from the popular series. The game appears to generate battle stats for your drawing seemingly at random. Other design/manga carts can be mounted and used for additional stamps in addition to those included with this cartridge. The package also contains very simple animation and drawing programs that you can mess around with if you insert the cartridge by itself with no addons.

name: Dream Escaper
summary:
Dream Escaper is a non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame centered around exploration. This game has a unique feature in which players can warp to different worlds (known as "layers" in-game). It features various chasers among these layers that will send the player to a game over sequence when caught. The game also includes the ability to talk to most NPCs and save from the menu.

The goal of the game is to explore, collect Items which will grant the player new abilities and achieve one of the game's three endings. As the game goes on, players can unlock various features from the title screen including a minigame, a music player and a Memories section which logs certain accomplishments the player has fulfilled.

name: Dropship Commander
summary: Land your dropship on settlements across the galaxy to bring much needed supplies to colonists and miners. Your job is to navigate through some of the harshest environments and successfully land on drop pads spread throughout each location. Each landing earns you points with the more difficult the drop, the more points you earn to take your spot on the leaderboards. You'll start off with some easy landings on the moon and then progress through the caves of Mars, the meteor zone of Mercury, the volcanic wasteland of Venus, the ice caves of Pluto and then on to the hazardous asteroid cluster GC-12.

name: Drinking Tea (with the Trans Boy You Secretly Have a Crush On)
summary:
You are Milo Poppydash, student at the prestigious Halfmoon Academy for Witches. Your best friend is Atlas Galecrown, fellow student at the Academy. You have a crush on him.

Atlas finally asked you out! Only problem is you immediately embarrassed yourself and now you can never face him again or die of shame.

Your only option? Steal the Time Acorn, go back in time, and relive the day until Atlas asks you out again!

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Hero of Justice: Pack 2
summary: Play as characters from the Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero movie! Gohan (Beast), Orange Piccolo, and Piccolo (Power Awakening) are available in addition to Parallel Quests, Additional Moves, Costumes, Extra Missions featuring characters from the Hero of Justice Pack Set, and more!

name: Dream Quest: Knight and Princess
summary:
Everything was wonderful- Gwyn the knight and Isela the princess were living out their lives in peace and harmony. However, things went wrong, as they often do. The Dark Lord Leirwrex appeared and took Princess Isela away to his castle in the world of dreams.

Gwyn follows them into this strange world, intent on finding Leirwrex's Nightmare Castle and rescuing her one true love!

name: Drom
summary: Described by the developer: "A short, pointless game about a dream I once had."

name: Dream Team
summary:
Do you ever hear different voices in your head when you're half-asleep?

Help Triangle, Circle and Square navigate through your dreams. Where will they go? What will they become? Will it be a pleasant dream or a dreadful one?

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Hero of Justice Pack Set
summary: The Hero of Justice Pack Set bundles together both Packs 1 and 2!

name: Drag and Drop
summary: Remember how you dragged the little man into google maps? Try something like this in the game Drag and Drop!

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Ultimate Edition
Dream Clovers
summary: Welcome to VR job experience!'Dream Clovers' is an educative game application supporting VR-based job experience contents.Recently there are two contents, firefighter and astronaut. More contents will be registered soon.

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2023
summary: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2023 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Hero of Justice Pack 1
summary: Play as characters from the Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero movie! Gamma 1, Gamma 2, and Gohan (DBS Super Hero) are available in addition to new movie-related Parallel Quests, Additional Moves, Costumes, and much more!

name: Dragonheir: Silent Gods
summary:
Authentic Dungeon Adventurous RPG Strategy Game

Dragonheir: Silent Gods is an open-world RPG that puts you in control of over 200 heroes. In this game, you'll experience strategic combat like never before, where every move counts and every decision could be the difference between victory and defeat. The multiverse concept allows you to travel through different worlds, exploring endless wonders and surprises.

name: Dragon & Archer
summary: Hunt animals, slay monsters, recruit dwarves, organize defenses, and adventure with your dragon in this crumbling land. Guard your base before being swallowed by evil creatures and find a way to teleport to a new world.

name: Dragonium Adventure
summary: Fight and make your way through the world of Akinori in this strategic turn-based RPG! Defeat powerful enemies, complete the intriguing story mode, upgrade your character, unlock new skills and join the fray in online multiplayer mode!

name: Dragon Inn
summary: Dragon Inn is a visualization tool for roleplaying games online. You can create your own room, invite people with code and create your own character. You can track your stats, equipments, spells, features and status effects easily with Dragon Inn.

name: Drunkle Ted's Wet and Wreckless
summary: Play as Drunkle Ted. He needs to get some quick cash together and get back on his feet. Luckily he found his missing foot and is literally back on his feet! Try to complete as many tasks as you can before time runs out. It's like drunk walking THPS

name: Dragon Age II: DLC Bundle
summary: Claim three expansions (The Exiled Prince, Legacy, & Mark of the Assassin), exclusive armor sets, unique weapons and more in your fight for the fate of Kirkwall.

name: Dream Hunter Toys: Evil Dolls
summary: Defend your dreams from evil toys, with a machine gun in your hands!

name: Drone Race Simulator Pilot Flight School Airplane Games Jet 2023
summary: Realistic and hardcore drone simulator will give you emotions and control experience. In the game you will be able to improve your skills in aerobatics, which you have to show by passing difficult routes for a limited time, which is becoming more and mor…

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Bardock: Alone Against Fate
summary: Experience the story of Goku's father, Bardock, who fought alone against his fate in this New Story. This is the story of one who stood alone against the scum of the universe. Bardock, warrior of Saiyan race, spent his days invading planets with his fellow soldiers. But an incident on Planet Kanassa would bring to his attention a calamity set to befall his home, Planet Vegeta.

name: Drone Race Simulator
summary: Realistic and hardcore drone simulator will give you emotions and control experience.

name: Driverio 3
summary: Driverio learns to drive better and improves his experience. Help Driverio get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: DragonHill VR
summary: This is an action-adventure game built for virtual reality. You play as an adventurer, freely roam and explore in a medieval open world. Complete a series of quests to unlock skills and upgrade equipment, and finally defeat the dragon in the hill cave.

name: Dragon Quest Monsters
summary: This version is included in the Dragon Quest Monsters 1+2 and features updated graphics and a new interface.

name: DreamWorks Movie Night
summary: Dreamworks Movie Night is a compilation of games based on several Dreamworks movies.

name: Dream Team Basketball
summary: Dream Team Basketball combines traditional CCG gameplay with innovative mechanics inspired from the game of basketball.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Final Bout
summary: Dragon Ball Z: Final Bout is an unlicensed port of the Sony PlayStation game, Dragon Ball GT: Final Bout made for the Super Nintendo.

name: Dragoon's Journey
summary:
The Evil Knight is attacking Fluffyton!

The only help to these poor blighted souls comes from the seriously under equipped Sir Tain the Dragoon, who must explore the nearby dungeon for the items needed to defeat the Evil Knight, but his journey will have him deal with giant toads, drunken gnomes and much more!

name: Dream Arena
summary: Dream Arena is non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame in the arena fighter genre created for the 2017 Dream Diary Jam.

name: Dr. Bon Bon Puzzle
summary: It's not easy being a candy scientist! Dr. Bon Bon needs your help. Match three or more bonbons to clear them and four or more to morph into a bonus star. When the test tubes are full, click two to unleash Dr. Bon Bon's patented bonbon-melding technology!

name: Dream Kombat
summary: Dream Kombat is a Japanese 2D fighting game, featuring characters from Yume Nikki and its fangames. The concept (and some visuals) are based off the Mortal Kombat fighting game series.

name: Dreamgame
summary: Dreamgame is a non-traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The goal of the game is to explore the game's world and reach the ending. The player can interact with the environment by moving around onto objects.

name: Dream RPG
summary: Dream RPG is a unique Yume Nikki fangame, containing dialogue and RPG-style battles. The game is divided into routes accessed through the Nexus that branch out into paths to Nightmares, the boss battles for the game.

name: Dream Data
summary:
Today you start your new job doing data entry for Data Portal Inc. It's not the most exciting job, but it pays the bills. Each night, you go home, go to sleep, and have vivid dreams that let you escape your mundane life. However, sometimes the line between dreams and real life start to get a bit blurred. Will you work hard and keep your job, or will you get out of touch with reality?

The game was heavily inspired by Yume Nikki, and it was created for Dream Diary Jam 4. So like Yume Nikki, the game is mostly just about walking around and exploring dreams. However, there are a few significant changes in how this plays compared to Yume Nikki and most fan games.

name: Dream Vacation
summary:
Dream Vacation is a short Yume Nikki parody fangame.

You play as a young man named Sheru, who refuses to leave his apartment for reasons unknown. You must explore his dreamscape and find 3 effects and 3 []s in order to escape.

name: Dreaming Bad
summary: A Breaking Good inspired parody Yume Nikki fangame thats actually about Walt losing his steam account.

name: Dream of Life
summary:
You play as a boy named Enil.

Enil always fantasized about being able to lucid dream, unfortunately, he has no experience on it, so you will have to make him improve.

Play in a half accurate simulation of lucid dreaming, released for the Yume Nikki Dream Diary Jam 5.

name: Dream Records
summary: Dream Records is a game where you explore Hizashi's dreams and you can collect hairstyles. A YNFG for DDJ6.

name: Dream of a Sunflower
summary: Touhou meets Dark Souls. Also Yuuka wanders into someone's dream and decides to cause trouble. What could go wrong?

name: Driving Home
summary: Driving Home is a short indie horror game, where you drive home after working late and you realize you forgot to refuel your car.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Atsumare! Goku's World
summary: An interactive movie/game for the Terebikko in the Dragon Ball franchise.

name: Dreamer Series: Zoo Keeper
summary: A dream come true: you get a job at the zoo as caretaker of the baby animals. Exciting!

name: Dr. Limpeza
summary: Puzzle game included in the Sega Master System Evolution. You control the titular character and collect dust while avoiding green enemies.

name: Dragon Fury
summary: 1v1 Fighting. Ninjas, Pirates, Robots, Aliens and more.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Extended Edition
summary: Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the premade templates or create YOUR OWN kawaii illustrations.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Special Edition
summary: Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the pre-made templates or create your own kawaii illustrations.

name: Drawing From Memory
summary: Drawing from Memory is an online party game where you and 2-4 friends try to figure out what your most and least favorite characters look like by Drawing them from Memory.

name: Drift & Drive
summary: Drift & Drive lets you take control of a massive collection of cool cars, a pickup truck, motorhome and towing caravan to show off all your driving skills in one place!

name: Dribble Skillz
summary: Dribble Skillz is an online Flash game originally published on the official Mario Hoops 3-on-3 website. It was also listed and playable in the Nintendo Arcade, a section on nintendo.com, among other promotional web games.

name: Dr. Mario: Vitamin Toss
summary: Dr. Mario: Vitamin Toss was an online Flash advergame published by Nintendo to promote Dr. Mario & Puzzle League for the Game Boy Advance. It was available to play on the game's official website, as well as in the Nintendo Arcade section of nintendo.com. The game departs from the puzzle-driven gameplay of the Dr. Mario series, but nevertheless still has in view defeating viruses using capsules.

name: Dreamland coffee
summary: Du Qing, the heroine, opened a cafe in a foreign country alone after the adventure of Wonderland Lovers. A new story began when she took in a little boy who lingered outside her door on opening day...

name: Drift Shape
summary: Drift your way to success in this exciting game! Take control of your car and maneuver through a variety of shapes and obstacles. Show off your drifting dexterity as you earn points and race against your opponents. Put the pedal to the metal and take your drifting game to a whole new level!

name: Drum Beat Jump
summary:
Do you have the reflexes to be a percussion master?
Find out now!
Drum Beat Jump is a music game, where you are rewarded for keeping
a steady beat.

name: Dr. Dino -Doctor & Dentist games for boys girls
summary:
Play with Dino Hospital, be a doctor! Kids can do: Fill teeth, Check Vision & Colorblind, Injection, X-rays and joint broken bones, Check-up, and etc. Dr. Dino includes 8 department: Trauma & Emergency, Orthopedics, Dentistry, Ophthalmology, Otolaryngology, Gastroenterology, Physical Examination and Ward. Every department contains several fun puzzles and mini-games. There are 28 puzzles & mini-games supply for your choice.
Hurry up, Doctor! Dino Hospital needs you! It's so fun and fantastic!

name: Driving Speed HD
summary:
Race in high powered V8 muscle cars from classic era to modern day. Highly realistic physics, audio, car handling and performance set this game apart.
Compete in career mode where you can experience a real racing career. Start off with a small amount of money to purchase a car and enter into organized series events. Winnings from the races will allow purchase of more cars, repairs and performance upgrades. Build your way up to compete in elite series events.
Modify your car by purchasing upgrades for performance and see exactly how each type of upgrade specifically improves the power and torque of the engine on a dyno chart. Purchase upgraded transmissions for faster gear shifts. Purchase better tyres for increased grip and road handling. Purchase weight reduction for better handling. Purchase suspension setups that lower the car and improve the handling from a lower center of gravity.

name: Dracula City Master: Idle Army
summary: Welcome to Dracula City Master - the ultimate idle horror tower defense game! Lead your own vampire army on a quest to conquer the world, expand your army with the tap of your finger and unleash hordes of hungry vampires into the world, with one goal - total domination!

name: Draconic Evolution
summary: Draconic Evolution is a mod for Minecraft that introduces high-powered and efficient weapons, tools, armor, machinery, storage units, rituals, research, and more.

name: Drive Time Radio
summary: Drive Time Radio is a 20 minute narrative game.

name: Droid Wars: Duel
summary: Sci-Fi Arcade Old-Style PvP ! No multiplayer, matchmaking, lobby waiting...just pure fun with your friends. Choose your nicks, gender, equip and head on to excitement. Sure, there is lot more to it, you'll find out eventually...welcome !

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot + A New Power Awakens Set - Legendary Edition
summary:
Play through iconic Dragon Ball Z battles on a scale unlike any other. Fight across vast battlefields with destructible environments and experience epic boss battles against the most iconic foes (Raditz, Frieza, Cell, etc.). Increase your power level through RPG mechanics and rise to the challenge!

Go beyond the history of Dragon Ball Z and experience 2 additional boss battles, with the New Power Awakens set! Master the power of the gods to challenge Lord Beerus and go even beyond to fight Golden Frieza with the power of Super Saiyan Blue!

name: Dragon Scroll
summary: A true warrior is the one who is capable to understand the quests of life in every situation. Find the warrior within yourself. Inspired from pool, Dragon Scroll gives you a striker marble and your aim is to collect all the target marbles on the screen. There will be obstacles, some you must avoid and some you may use.

name: Driftwood
summary: A game about downhill longboarding and a sloth named Eddy. Ride as fast as you can and watch out that you don't fly out of a curve!

name: Dragon Ball Z: A Batalha dos Deuses
summary: Official game for PC developed by brazilian studios Aiyra and Duckbill for the release on the country of the movie Dragon Ball Z: A Batalha dos Deuses.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Special Edition
Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Ultimate Special Edition
Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Deluxe Special Edition
Dragon Defender: Castle Kingdom Quest
summary: Dragons are invading! They are destroying the village and threaten your castle! Defend it with your magic bow! Watch out for ogres and villagers running for help! Will your kingdom survive?

name: Dragon Forest
summary: Combining the Rogue-like with puzzles resulted in an attractive deck building game. Build your own deck and defeat the dragon ruling the forest. See if you're the chosen hero to defeat the dragon!

name: Drift Experience Japan
summary: Go full send Drifting in the streets of japan in 2 different sprint circuits and customize your car!

name: Dragon Fist 2
summary: Martial Arts game based on kung fu movies.

name: Dragon Abyss
summary: Dragon Abyss is an exciting game in which you have to ride a dragon to conquer huge distances, dangerous enemies will stand in your way... The game is perfect for relaxing and having great fun.

name: Drag Racing: Bike Edition
summary:
The long-awaited extension of the most popular mobile racing game in the world is finally here!
Diversify your racing experience with 17 extremely fast sport bikes in a new game from the creators of the original Nitro Nation Drag Racing.

name: Draw In Maze 2
summary:
Draw the way with your fingertip for your character to follow to escape the Maze.
Avoid Monsters. The monster destroy your Ice.
A Monster changes to a Coin every few seconds, and seconds later the Coin changes back to the Monster.
If your character eats a Coin, one block of tail is added to your character (and Game Money too)!
Don't spend too much time, as more Monsters will appear as time goes on!

name: Drift City Underground
summary: Drift City Underground is a car drifting game with 8 initial cars that can be unlocked in the Early Access in a open world map with car deep customization and skining. Briliant mechanics will make this game enjoyable and stunning graphics will settle for a AAA Indie game.

name: Dreaming Isles
summary: A colorful sandbox action RPG and life sim that combines sword and sorcery, high seas adventure, farming, and relationship building. Unite the clans of the Dreaming Isles, farm the land, start a family, and find your purpose.

name: Druidwalker
summary: You are a druid preparing the forest for winter. Traverse the paths at your own pace, meet the animals, enjoy the music, all wrapped in a peaceful roguelike experience.

name: Dryft City Kyngs
summary: Work, race, explore, chill, repeat. Become the ultimate Dryft Racer in a colourful 2D punk-cartoon world based on a very near-future Melbourne!

name: Dragon Kingdoms: A Legend's Beginning
summary: Dragon Kingdoms: A Legend's Beginning is an RPG that seeks to recapture a long-gone era when games were more than just graphics and FMV cutscenes. It takes place on a world that has been nearly torn apart by a war that happened long ago, between thirteen races, of which only a few remain.

name: Dropoff Dealer
summary: Escape the police and cause endless destruction!!

name: Drag the Dead
summary: A mind virus has taken hold of the population! Assume the role of drag-queen--zombie-slayer extraordinaire Zane Dmaaj and battle your way through mobs of NPZees, Fatties, SoiBois and more in the high octane, pearl clutching shooter Drag the Dead!

name: Dragon's Treasure
summary: Dragon's Treasure is a Roguelike action game, thousands of characters in a variety of weapons to choose from, free collocation with lighter, combination relic system affect , independent equipment upgrades and synthesis, the dice game events system randomly generated as a result,

name: Drift With Your Pals
summary: Drift With Your Pals is a casual car drifting game with online multiplayer lobbies.

name: Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine
summary: 8-bit port of Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine.

name: Dreadstone Keep
summary: Dreadstone Keep is a roguelike, strategy turn-based game where you must defeat the two powerful entities that rule the ancient castle. Acquire upgrades, use your wits and battle powerful pixel art enemies!

name: Dr Smart Space Adventure
summary: Set out on an epic adventure through the Solar System. A journey of a lifetime alongside Dr Smart, and his reliable Cosmic Encyclopedia.

name: Drive Jump: Offroad Insanity
summary:
Drive Jump is an offroad driving game with shooting capabilities to go through each challenge along the way. This driving game is derived from real physics, so do not fall from moving platforms, pitfalls, trampolines, ramps, and many others. There are also hidden worlds where you can collect coins from. Push through obstacles to fill holes and resolve challenges.
It's challenging and puzzling at some instances, but it has insanely addictive gameplay with 4 different worlds to choose from. Become a legendary offload driver, race hard or go home. Jump over ramps and fly over variety of obstacles to take to the next level.

name: Dream Catcher
summary: Find over 70 unique monsters to battle, collect and raise. Your monsters will go through a branching path of evolutions to help you explore a dream-like open world. Let your dreams become a reality or look for a way out.

name: Dream Bright
summary: Dream Bright is an unique story-driven game that blends exploration, platforming and stealth into a short journey. Dive into the imagination of Lucy while she creates her own adventure.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Deluxe Edition
summary: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Deluxe Edition is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! More tasty drawings await you in the Confectionery DLC !

name: Dragon Audit: Deluxe Edition
summary: Deluxe Edition includes the base Dragon Audit game as well as the Hoard of Bonus Content.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot + A New Power Awakens Set - Deluxe Edition
Drone Delivery
summary: Are you tired of waiting for your order for hours? It is said that if you want to change the world, it starts with you!

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Premium Edition
summary:
Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the premade templates or create YOUR OWN kawaii illustrations.

Pick one of over a dozen drawings and make it your own. Choose one of the available settings and play around with these adorable characters.

name: Dreamy Days in West Tokyo
summary:
Dreamy Days in West Tokyo is an otome game by Voltage Inc.

Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Dragon Survivors
summary: Valkathien has returned! Choose a mighty warrior to play as, and fight through hordes of enemies in a pulse pounding action game. Gather power ups, increase your strength, and see if you have the skill to last long enough to challenge the Dragon. Battle against fate. Prove yourself a Dragon Survivor!

name: Dreamscape Runners
summary: Chaotic fast-paced racing game that can be played solo or with a friend locally! Use various power ups to reach (or open up!) other paths - or use them to mess with your friend.

name: Dragon Dodge Valley
summary: An intense, bullet hell, arcade style game with old school mechanics and art. Fast action, dodging fireballs and waves of enemies while aiming accurately. Can you survive dragon dodge valley?

name: Dr. Robotnik's Ring Racers
summary:
Dr. Robotnik's Ring Racers is a kart racing video game originally based on the 3D Sonic the Hedgehog fan-game "Sonic Robo Blast 2", which itself is based on a modified version of Doom Legacy. It is the sequel to Sonic Robo Blast 2 Kart.

Hang up your sneakers, because Dr. Robotnik and his ex-enemies are going go-karting! Use the untapped potential of rings to super-charge your vehicle across more than 200 crazy courses. With over 20 unique items and some of the hottest moves on this side of the Floating Island, this is Racing at the Next Level!

name: Drop Dead: The Cabin
summary:
The Cabin is an intense and challenging game. Are you among the few that will survive? Gather supplies, arm up, and fight off waves of the walking dead that have escaped from an evil lab experiment. We expect you to die - a lot, each time you fall, you will earn XP to upgrade your character and weapons, making you stronger and bringing you one step closer to beating the game. Whether you play co-op or brave the horrors of hell solo - Fight with a blade, bat or a variety of guns, power up and become a pro monster slayer.

Can you hold off the horde before they breach the Cabin? Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Dredge: Deluxe Edition
summary: The ultimate pack for your impending voyage. The Dredge Deluxe Edition includes everything you’ll need to weather the seas and trawl the deep for sinister secrets.

name: Dragon Warrior I
summary:
Game Boy Color port of Dragon Warrior, released alongside its sequel in the Dragons Warrior I.II compilation.

In this version, the US localization has a whole new translation with names closer to the original, letting go of the Old-English-like language used in the original. The games have been tweaked to make it slightly easier and allow the player to progress faste

name: Dragon Warrior II
summary:
Game Boy Color port of Dragon Warrior II, released alongside its prequel.

In this version, the US localization has a whole new translation with names closer to the original, letting go of the Old-English-like language used in the original. The games have been tweaked to make it slightly easier and allow the player to progress faster.

name: Dragon Quest
summary:
Remake of Dragon Warrior released for the Super Famicom in the Dragon Quest I.II compilation.

This remake includes updated graphics that retain the original look, sound of higher quality, and some changes in the gameplay and in the game world: certain locations are larger, some menu commands (such as "Stairs") are omitted, and there is a larger variety of items.

name: Dragon Quest II
summary:
Remake of Dragon Warrior II released for the Super Famicom in the Dragon Quest I.II compilation.

This remake includes updated graphics that retain the original look, sound of higher quality, and some changes in the gameplay and in the game world: certain locations are larger, some menu commands (such as "Stairs") are omitted, and there is a larger variety of items.

name: Drug Prince & Narcotic Girl
summary: Mobile otome game by Coly.

name: Dragonlance Prudence Skin & Feat Pack
summary: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

name: Dragonlance Corazón Skin & Feat Pack
summary: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

name: Dragonlance Egbert Skin & Feat Pack
summary: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

name: Dragonlance Dob Skin & Feat Pack
summary: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

name: Dragonlance Merilwen Skin & Feat Pack
summary: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

name: Dragonlance Rust Skin & Feat Pack
summary: This Idle Champions Skin & Feat pack contains a Champion unlock, 7 gold Champion Chests, and an exclusive skin & feat for that Champion! Take your game to the next level!

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Definitive Edition
summary: This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

name: Dragons Heart
summary: You've been given the power to peer into people's inner hearts. It's now up to you to empathize and understand each person by helping them with their trauma. Saving the world one relationship at a time! Beware there are some who only seek misery it'll be up to you to determine their fate.

name: Dreamwalker
summary: A visual novel about a man who discovers the existence of another dimension hidden in dreams. Explore and learn the rules of a new reality, meet fellow dreamwalkers and solve the mystery of a disaster in the past. Make decisions, build relationships and strive to reach the best ending!

name: Dramatic Road: The Origin of Wind
summary: A full-fledged simulation RPG set in modern Japan! A variety of characters unique to modern times, such as riders, magicians, and baseball players, have appeared. Command them, nurture them, and use their skills to protect the peace of the school!

name: Drift Experience Japan: Supporter Edition
summary: Get the Supporter Edition of Drift Experience Japan and enhance your experience with new maps and extra content!

name: Driver Mini
summary:
Are you a new learner-driver? Do you eager to enhance your driving skills? And do you like casual game or challenge yourself? If YES, I think you should like this game.
Driver Mini has a good simulation for real driving\parking, use driving steering and pedal to control you car, like real world the acceleration and deceleration are simulated too, notice that any jerk can smash your car, so be careful.

name: Drawn to Life: The Next Chapter
summary: Drawn to Life: The Next Chapter is a platform game developed by Planet Moon Studios and published by THQ for the Wii. Despite having the same title, it has a different plot compared to the DS version.

name: Dredge: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: The ultimate pack for your impending voyage. The Dredge Deluxe Edition includes everything you’ll need to weather the seas and trawl the deep for sinister secrets.

name: Dragonyhm
summary:
Experience an epic tale set in a vivid fantasy world.

For a number of years after the age-old conflict with dragons came to a head, the people of Archend have enjoyed an era of peace.

All was well until the esteemed Yhmszindr, Kurtis, went missing, and the sealed dragons began to awaken.

​Explore, solve, and battle your way through this heroic adventure, meeting memorable characters while uncovering the rich history of the land of Archend.

Step into this world as Kris, son of the Yhmszindr, embarking on a quest to find him. Along the way, put a stop to the plot that threatens the kingdom!​

name: Dreamscape 64
summary: Mario catches Princess Peach walking through a peculiar portal right under the full moon. He follows her, just to find himself in the surreal world only known as Dreamscape. There he comes face to face with his greatest nightmare. Do you have what it takes to overcome the challenge and find out what Peach is up to?

name: Dr. Janggi
summary: An application to play Korean Chess or Jang-gi offline or against real opponents.

name: Draft: In the Woods
summary: Draft - In the woods is a casual, relaxing and challenging puzzle game. Solve the levels by removing all the nodes using neatly drawn line cuts.

name: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2023
summary: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2023 puts you in the role of head coach of your favorite college basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from staff hiring, recruiting, scouting and all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to tournament glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Drift Draft Destroy
summary: Drift Draft Destroy is a dynamic arcade racing survival game. No leveling, no breaks, no health. Choose your car, drift to turn, draft to catch up, shoot to destroy and win the race. Improve your strategy and use devious tactics to destroy all your opponents and sabotage the race.

name: Dr. Smart Space Adventure: In the Space
summary: Set out on an epic adventure through the Solar System. A journey of a lifetime alongside Dr Smart, and his reliable Cosmic Encyclopedia.

name: Dragon Mania
summary: Meet the fiercest dragons. Raise them, breed them, and complete your collection to attract more visitors to your island. Train them in battles against friends! Fight alone or with the help of your friends' dragons to defeat evil Viking Kings in raids.

name: Dracula Twins
summary:
Dracula Twins is a 16-bit style platformer with super-snappy controls, starring vampiretwins Drac and Dragana.
The twins’ best friend, Franislav, has been mistakenly captured by the wicked Doctor Lifelust, a zombie-loving vampire hunter who wants to create an elixir of life using vampire blood, so that he can live forever. Furthermore, the doctor’s undead army have invaded Transylvania and taken control over Castle Moonskull, the Dracula family’s age-old residence.

name: Dream Fire
summary: Dream Fire offers a unique and captivating experience, which will keep you in suspense and delight you both with its unique story and graphics, as well as with the fact that you will always have something to do to develop yourself more and more!

name: Dr Smart Space Encyclopedia
summary: Set out on an epic adventure through the Solar System. A journey of a lifetime alongside Dr Smart, and his reliable Cosmic Encyclopedia.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Complete Edition
summary:
Draw and Color: Kawaii is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! Use different drawing tools and have some tasty fun!
Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the premade templates or create your own illustrations.

name: Dr. Fetus' Mean Meat Machine
summary: Help Dr. Fetus create the perfect Meat Boy clone in a unique new twist on the tile-matching puzzle genre. In classic Meat Boy fashion, an endless cavalcade of devious and deadly traps stand between you and victory in this hardcore puzzle game that will push your skills to the limit.

name: Dragon Ball Z 5
summary: Dragon Ball Z 5 is an unlicensed Beat 'em up for the Famicom, based on the Dragon Ball Z anime. It was released around 1995.

name: Dream Swim
summary:
An action game that relies on precision skills to get you into a breathtaking journey to outer space and beyond.
Forget imprecise motion-sensing stuff, clumsy controls or a screen cluttered with buttons – like the annoying virtual pad on touch-based devices. Really, just use your thumbs on the screen to move back and forth and enjoy the awesome ride.
Simple gestures give you total control to bounce the fish around: Choose the way you want to go and take advantage of precise landings to gain impulse and progress into this psychedelic journey.

name: Dream Ploy Will
summary: This is a 1V1 game, including round system, war chess, and strategy play. You can freely match your deck, command heroes, summon monsters, and release spells! Compete with game friends or strangers!

name: Draggexath's Dominion
summary:
"You are a young warrior returning from a long quest. When you return home to sleep something strange happens. You begin a new quest in search of the legendary demon god to get out of the now strange world that you once knew..."

Draggexath's Dominion is a Adventure RPG where you play as a young warrior trapped in Draggexath's Realm of Darkness. Your quest is to find him and end his tyranny once and for all.

name: Dragon Vita
summary: How about adopting a dragon? Play Dragon Vita to hatch, raise and breed awesome 3D dragons and build the ultimate Dragon Park to brag about!

name: Drink and Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Drag Boat Speed Racing
summary:
Build your engine the way you want to! Drag Boat Speed Racing features 100's of different part types resulting in unlimited combinations of ways to make your boat faster!
Drive your boat the way you want to! Weather, wind direction, and chop will affect how straight your hull flies.
Race against opponents across the USA in over 20+ unique locations! Compete for prizes and trophies to claim the title of "World Champion"

name: Drift Island
summary: Rise as a drift master and missile car mechanic! DRIFT ISLAND is an open-world drift build-and-drive game. Create unique 'missile cars,' tune them, shred sideways, and test your skills! Earn cash, upgrade parts, and become a true drifting legend!

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Legendary Edition
summary:
This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

Key features:
- 5 different themes of drawings
- 8 tools with 24 color variations

name: Drifto
summary:
Throw your car sideways into the corners and prove your drifting skills. Work your way up, unlocking new cars and locations.
The longer, faster, and more extreme your drift, the more you score. Careful though, crash and you lose it all!

name: Dr. Emmerson's Nocturnes
summary: Dive into the worlds of the best classic weird fiction and cosmic horror writers. Try out our original approach to bringing literature into the interactive medium. Relax and let Dr. Emmerson guide you through all colors of dread.

name: Drilbert
summary: Help Drilbert the drill boy recover his stolen gold! Drilbert is a puzzle game with a unique digging mechanic, made by a solo developer.

name: Dragon Courier
summary: Explore a vast world filled with monsters where deliveries are to be made!

name: Dream of Tiny Snow
summary:
Love and death are the everlasting themes for human beings. If a catalyst called "science" is added, what will happen?

This is a trilogy of short science fiction visual novels in the anti-utopian genre, consisting of "Dream Ending", "Epiphyllum in Love" and "Tiny Snow".

name: DreamStream
summary: A hybrid shooter/puzzle game developed by Mark Judge in 1995. The game never saw an official release due to the demise of the Amiga, but in 2005 Judge released the game online as freeware.

name: Dream 64
summary: Dream 64 is a cancelled Nintendo 64 game developed by Rare that was later reworked into the game Banjo-Kazooie.

name: Dreamer Adventure
summary: An adventure platformer created with pulp for dreamers !

name: Driving School Classics 2019
summary:
Driving School Classics is the latest driving simulator that will allow you to drive many classic cars, including muscle cars, supercars, SUVs, Buses, Trucks and many more. Driving School Classics has tons of levels across many environments: cities, mountains, deserts, etc...
Drive a manual transmission with clutch and stick shift or take it easy with the automatic gearbox. Intuitive controls will make this the best driving simulator, use a virtual steering wheel, buttons or tilt your device.

name: Dr. Maria
summary:
Dr. Mary is a classic minigame, in which you are playing as a doctor to kill the bacteria with different capsules.
Match four or more colors either horizontally or vertically to delete them. Each level is completed when all of the bacterias have been defeated.

name: Drift Reign
summary: Get ready to reign supreme in the ultimate drifting simulator - Drift Reign! Start as a street drifter, choose your car from USA, Japan, or Germany, and work your way up to the top. With realistic physics and deep customization options, this game will make you feel like a real pro-drifter.

name: Drone Master Racing
summary: This drone simulator is an exciting experience for up to 5 players to play, perfect for fans of racing and competition.

name: Dragon Money
summary: Dragon Money is a board game up to 4 players in which the player can choose 1 of 6 different characters and play the board.

name: Dragon
summary: A platforming game somewhat similar to Rainbow Islands. To reach certain platforms and/or defeat enemies, the player must launch a "dragon" which can be walked across momentarily.

name: Dream Bubble
summary: Same as the VT3xx-based game. A Tetris clone similar to Magic Diamond, though it is seemingly coded differently. The game features a "special mode" which merely turns the screen upside down.

name: Dr Wan
summary: It is a game that clears the dungeon by avoiding numerous monsters using the main character's skills. It's a 3D quarter view game. Let's use gas, punch, uppercut, rolling, defense, running, throwing, etc. well. Let's solve the dungeon puzzle well. Let's make good use of the dungeon traps.

name: Dream House Days
summary: Dream House Days is an apartment management game, where you furnish apartments, and slowly grow your building into a place anyone would be happy to live in! You must furnish each apartment to your tenants' needs and be a good landlord, as well as making a profit.

name: Drift Long Racing: CyberCity
summary: Drift Long Racing CyberCity,new RaceTrack.

name: Drift Long Racing: JapaneseNightCity
summary: Drift Long Racing JapaneseNightCity,new RaceTrack.

name: Drift Long Racing: SovietCity
summary: Drift Long Racing SovietCity,new RaceTrack.

name: Drift Long Racing: JapaneseCity
summary: Drift Long Racing JapaneseCity,new RaceTrack.

name: Drift Long Racing: JapaneseStreet
summary: Drift Long Racing JapaneseStreet,new RaceTrack.

name: DR2 Night Janki
summary: DR² Night Janki is a mahjong game with adult scenes. The game has two modes: "Story" and "Regular". The story mode is set in a medieval castle, which is said to be ancient grounds for sorcery, but is currently controlled by the mysterious Rumira, who runs a mahjong club. The hero, a man named Ryuuji, decides to investigate the castle, and therefore has to defeat its inhabitants in mahjong matches.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Platinum Edition
summary: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Platinum Edition is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! Use different drawing tools and have some tasty fun!

name: Dreieck
summary: Play as a lowly triangle in this fast-paced top-down shooter on a dystopian polygon-based universe. Defeat your oppressors, claim glory!

name: Drake's Dungeon
summary: An adult, survival game where hunky men battle hordes of lusty monsters! The more monsters you kill, the more sticky, sweaty, muscle-packed story you'll unlock. Better start whackin'.

name: Dreamkeeper
summary: You play as Marshmallow, the cute little pet of a girl named Ava who wants to become a heroine and save her village from the Nightmares. To protect her you use magical bullets, tarot-cards and try to find your very own playstyle to unlock the story and get the highest score!

name: Dragon Uprising Online
summary: An action game mainly focused on boss rushing in coop!

name: Dreamy Trail
summary: Welcome to Dreamy Trail, a captivating walking simulator that takes you on a peaceful journey through a mystical forest. Immerse yourself in the serene atmosphere as you explore the forest, collect items, and uncover hidden secrets.

name: Drone Operator
summary: Drone Operator is a game where you will use civilian drones to conduct military operations against an overwhelming occupying force. Use your technical skills to turn harmless flying toys into deadly weapons, and outsmart your enemy. But remember - stay vigilant.

name: Dream Undercity
summary:
Legend has it that mysterious treasures are buried deep underground. Are they priceless? Are they magical weapons of extraordinary power? Archaeologists have been working hard on excavating the area to uncover the truth. In attempts to unearth buried treasure, many have built underground cities, revived dinosaurs from their extinction, and trained them to do their bidding. Cities are forming underground, one after another.
However, this new world is incomplete without you. Your subjects and dinosaurs are calling out for a wise master who will guide them through the creation of this underground kingdom.

name: Dream of Echo
summary: In Dream of Echo your first goal is to find the only real portal that will allow Echo to wake up and get out of his dream. Be careful, however your shadow will not let you any respite

name: Drone Delivery Despair
summary:
An apocalypse has occurred in the world, because of which people are forced to stay in their homes forever. The only way to receive and send resources between houses is cargo drones. You are a cargo drone whose task is to deliver packages from one point to another. Travel through a gigantic city filled with Soviet buildings in various weathers.

The game is made in a gloomy monochrome style with a gloomy atmosphere. Explore the city and deliver packages calmly, there are no screamers, monsters and so on in the game.

name: Dreampunk
summary:
With EnsureLife's new DR-34MM headset, you will never want to go back. Featuring bleeding edge graphics, crazy action and ear-destroying sound, the unreal world has never felt so real before.

Dreampunk: Virtual Unreality is a small cyberpunk-themed wave shooter spinoff to the MAKE ME REAL series, originally made for Phone Jam #13.

name: Drive Thru Tycoon
summary:
Let's take a check with the drive-through and return to a calm and happy world.
Test the best safe system drive-through simulation.

name: Dreamverse
summary: Journey through beautiful, dangerous dimensions as you explore the Dreamverse. Glide through tunnels and leap over chasms as entire worlds form and crumble around you. How long will you survive in the Dreamverse?

name: Drunken FC
summary: Ever wanted to get drunk, play football (soccer), and not worry about the medical bill later? Do you hate animation and love physics? Then here's some physics-based sports action for you and your friends. Play locally or remotely. Move your feet, but don't break the sticks on your controller.

name: Dracula’s Vengeance
summary: Simple and refreshing casual action game!

name: DriftCE
summary:
DriftCE is the definitive drifting simulation videogame.

Take the car to your garage, where you can make major modifications to it. Customising the car, swapping various parts and performing crucial changes tangibly affects car’s performances and behaviours on the track. Replace engine, suspension and exhaust parts yourself to achieve the right performance for your driving style! Create a one of a kind car with visual tuning - change body kits, paint color and decals.

A simulative experience, carefully recreated to deliver the same feeling real drifters get. A fully immersive drifting simulation - with real licensed cars and tracks - featuring different drifting styles: power drift, handbrake and clutch kick.

name: Dread Weight
summary: You are being hunted by the ancient witch Baba Yaga. Can you make the right decisions to survive? Or will spirits overtake the mansion?

name: Dream League Soccer
summary: Soccer as we know it has changed! Dream League Soccer is YOUR chance to build THE best team on the planet. Recruit new Players, upgrade your Stadium, and train your team as you march towards glory, on your road to Soccer Super Stardom!

name: Drill and Collect
summary: Drill and Collect is a simulation game where players manage a mining operation. The core gameplay involves drilling to find resources like gold and gems. It incorporates idle mechanics, allowing for progress even when offline, and features a system for upgrading equipment to improve mining efficiency. The game is presented in a casual, management-style format.

name: Dream Job: Delivery Simulator
summary: Delivery simulator in pre-solar punk world.

name: DragonShift
summary: Embark on an epic adventure with DragonShift, a unique turn-based Fantasy-Adventure-RPG with hundreds of dungeons to explore, lots of puzzles, decision-driven campaigns and fun online modes that let you measure your skills with players from around the world.

name: Drift Horizon: Car Driving & Tuning
summary: Become a legendary drifter! Tune and upgrade your car, install parts and boost performance! With a dozen of cars to choose from, get them on the track and test them out!

name: Dream League Soccer 2023
summary: Dream League Soccer 2023 puts you in the heart of the action with a fresh look and brand new features! Build your dream team from over 4,000 FIFPRO licensed players and take to the field against the world’s best soccer clubs! Rise through 8 divisions whilst enjoying full 3D motion-captured player moves, immersive in-game commentary, team customisations and much more. The beautiful game has never been so good!

name: Dread Dawn
summary: This is an open world Zombie Survival game, The location of the game is set in the city. You are forced to stay in the city because you can't catch up with the evacuation team. You need to defend the camp with other survivors who stay in the city and survive.

name: Droptic
summary:
Select column, drop block and see what happen.

Fill bars above to explode rocks.

Get the highest score you can.

name: Dream Channel Zero
summary: Dive into a glitched-out game world! Explore synthwave skylines, fight freaky phantoms, and meet a whole host of quirky characters in this hysterically surreal adventure!

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Director's Cut
summary: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Director's Cut is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! Use different drawing tools and have some tasty fun!

name: Dreams of Valhalla
summary: Dreams of Valhalla is an action rogue where you battle through the 9 realms in order to obtain eternally glory in Valhalla.

name: Draikai
summary: Help Bianca in Draikai, save her dragon. Face an evil scientist, discover secrets, defeat bosses, explore a pixel art world, and an amazing soundtrack. Overcome internal and external challenges in this unforgettable adventure.

name: Dreamio: AI-Powered Adventures
summary: Dreamio: AI-Powered Adventures is a "choose your own adventure" game where content gets generated by AI on the fly. Story gets generated by ChatGPT, illustrations get generated by Stable Diffusion, and it uses speech synthesis for narration.

name: Dragon Lair Depths
summary: A board tactics game with a light roguelike twist. Bring heroes of different races, break into the dragon's lair full of monsters, improve heroes and use strategies, defeat evil dragons time and time again, and get dragon scales that prove your strength...

name: Drill Deal: Oil Tycoon
summary: Drill Deal is a fun oil business simulator. Start from a single tiny rig and expand it to a large complex of connected platforms. Optimize & grow your business. Look out for threats like weather, terrorists, fire, and others. Take care of your working crews.

name: Drifty
summary:
Master the art of the drift!
Burn rubber on the city streets, kick up the dust in the desert and slide sideways through the Asian landscape. Make your way through the career or drift to the top of the leaderboards while earning many new cars, wheels and attributes.

name: Drainscape
summary: Drainscape is a vertical action adventure with roguelite elements, where you must survive your fall through a drain filled with obstacles and enemies with only an umbrella to save you.

name: Drifty Chase
summary: Imagine that you just robbed a bank and the police is on your tail. Jump into a car and try to shake off the pursuit! This game is not about racing, it’s about drifting with a trunk full of cash through an insanely crowded city! You are being chased by the police that wants to get back each cent from the stolen money bag. Don’t let them take it back from you! Test your skills, drift across the city and find out if you can be faster than them. Let the drifty chase begin!

name: Drift Car Driving Simulator
summary:
Take control of some amazing drift cars (speed car, SUV and 4x4) in a huge driving environment ready to explore, with a big city, forests, canyons, hills and mountains : more than 16 km² of area and 30 km of roads !
Drive fast and drift hard on 8 amazing different tracks.

name: Dropsol
summary: Dropsol is a retro-style arcade game where, equipped only with a parasol that reduces your speed, you have to dodge obstacles and take special items to increase your chances of getting a big score.

name: Dread Descent
summary: A precision platformer where you have been tasked with infiltrating an ancient spacecraft buried deep beneath the surface of an alien planet. To reach the vessel, you will need to dodge traps, risk harrowing jumps, and descend into a deadly world.

name: Dragot
summary: Dragot is a fast paced bullet hell dungeon crawler in which you live or die by the mysterious items you find hidden in each room; Fizzle out early or snowball your newly acquired powers to fight through all six areas and finally defeat the dragon that pursues you.

name: Dr. Carlos' Personality Exam
summary: It's a nice sunny day in Dubai, and you decide to wander into the shady clinic of Dr. Carlos PhD. Once inside, you are tasked with answering questions that will reveal your true nature...

name: Dragon Quest X: Nemureru Yuusha to Michibiki no Meiyuu Offline
summary: The V2 expansion from Dragon Quest X Online remade as DLC for Dragon Quest X Offline
developers: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Drive.RS
summary:
Welcome to the Drive.RS public beta!

Huge, fun, without limits - the biggest, best, most realistic open world racing game on mobile.

name: Dreamwater
summary: A short, fragmented experience created in RPG maker for Domino Club's Dream Gallery Jam. Dreamwater provides the player with snippets of thoughts on the theme of liquid.

name: Dream Town Island
summary:
Give free reign to your creativity in this inventive town sim!
Unlock new stores and facilities, help your residents find love, or cash in on the stock market!
If you founded a new town on an uninhabited island, what would you build there? Restaurants? Convenience Stores? Movie theaters? Make your choices and create a town that everyone will want to move to!

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers - Season 1
summary:
Caught in by an unexpected temporal phenomenon, seven ordinary citizens find themselves stranded in a Temporal Seam: they share their imprisonment with the Raider, a menacing enemy from another timeline with an overwhelming power.

Their only hope for survival is to break out from the Temporal Seam with the Super Time Machine, but the Raider is on their tracks and becomes stronger minute-by-minute. In a race against time the cunning of Survivors clashes with the power of the Raider, to break free or be broken...

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers - Season 2
summary:
Caught in by an unexpected temporal phenomenon, seven ordinary citizens find themselves stranded in a Temporal Seam: they share their imprisonment with the Raider, a menacing enemy from another timeline with an overwhelming power.

As a new Raider is reported roaming the Temporal Seams, 2 capsules can be seen in the sky, landing with a crash. A group of Saibamen roams the fields, ready to ambush the survivors. After some time escaping these green creatures, a powerful Saiyan takes the lead in the chase.

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers - Season 3
summary:
Caught in by an unexpected temporal phenomenon, seven ordinary citizens find themselves stranded in a Temporal Seam: they share their imprisonment with the Raider, a menacing enemy from another timeline with an overwhelming power.

5 spaceships plummet from the sky, landing with a crash: Guldo, Jeice, Burter, Reecom and Ginyu are preparing for their mission. The Ginyu Force readies their overwhelming tactics based on teamwork and prepares to take off!

name: Dread Pilots
summary: Dread Pilots is a space survival game where you explore a mysterious and hostile pocket universe called the Dread. Scavenge resources, upgrade your ship, make friends, and fight monsters as you try to carve out a little piece of the Dread for yourself.

name: Dragon Arise
summary: Dragon Arise is an RPG game with a fantasy dragon-collecting theme. Developed by Ocean Games, it incorporates several traditional RPG elements that will surely please genre enthusiasts. As the chosen "Savior" of the world, your role involves leading a group of Dragons on a series of adventures to combat the invasion of the Cursed Dragons. The game offers various activities, such as competing for Dragon Souls in the Dragon Lairs, undertaking challenges in the Tower of Infinity, collecting diverse Dragoneggs, and developing your own island. Additionally, Dragon Arise provides exhilarating PvP battles in the arena, ensuring a continuous sense of excitement.

name: Drag Her!
summary: Drag Her! is a fast, frenetic, and fundamentally fabulous fighting game featuring drag royalty. With a cast of iconic characters from the Drag Race & Dragula universes, Drag Her! gives you the core fighting game fantasy, with an experience that is equal parts stupid and fun.

name: Drums Rock: Undertale DLC
summary: Drums Rock is an arcade drum game for VR, follow the rock rhythm with your drums and crush the demons. Each note is represented by an enemy, and they will be defeated by playing the drums.

name: Dream Gym
summary: Build your own gym from scratch and get an enjoyable experience of making it grow into a huge fitness hall full of happy customers. Be your own boss, trainer, manager and decor stylist. Give your clients the right work-out and get paid for that. Watch your characters' body shape change advancing level by level.

name: Dream Mini Golf: Putt Star
summary:
Welcome to one of the craziest game of golf you've ever played. Play your way through some of the most whackiest courses. Get mesmerised in this beautiful work of art.
Each level you come across will be very unique and different from the previous level you played, discover the best way to get a Hole in One. The game features a very simple and easy to play gameplay. All you have to do is Aim and power up your shot and shoot for an eagle, but you will also make sure that you complete each level within the given time. Do you think your game to face the challenge head on beat it. Compete against your friends in our online leaderboards, show the world your the best. The game does not feature any in-app purchases you just need to play smart and unlock all the 5 unique themes

name: Drill Keeper
summary: Drill Keeper combines roguelite deckbuilding and tower defense into a strategic battle for survival. Dig through completely destructible worlds to strip them of their riches and build an impenetrable fortress of mining.

name: Drugz: 2D Drug Empire Simulator
summary: Become a true Drug Lord in Drugz, an idle strategy game. Buy cheap, sell high, invest money in facilities and dodge police operations and rival gangs to expand your empire. Become the greatest Drug Lord in history and become a legend.

name: Dreamcore
summary: Step into the surreal with Dreamcore, a body-cam styled psychological horror game that plunges you into the eerie beauty of "liminal spaces." Unravel the mysteries of Dreamcore’s non-linear worlds and uncover its hidden secrets. Can you discover what lies beyond the edge of reality?

name: Dreaming Diorama
summary: A unique casual puzzle game where you create a variety of dioramas. Explore and assemble dioramas in a 3D environment. Enjoy relaxing gameplay that allows you to create dioramas at your own pace with no time restraints.

name: Dragon's Doom: A Skyhopper Tale
summary: Start as a hatchling dragon, you have one goal: To Survive. The best way to survive? Is to fight, burn and eat your way into growing to a full fledge dragon. Burn the villages to the ground!

name: Drug Lord Tycoon
summary: Start from nothing and rise to the top as you expand your criminal empire in Drug Lord Tycoon.

name: Drive Me to Hell
summary: As the night darkens and you set out for home, an unsettling occurrence takes place on the road. Will this lead you to hell? Unveil the truth in a bone-chilling driving horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

name: Dr. Virus
summary: Dr. Virus is a captivating puzzle game where players must strategically arrange colored viruses to create chains and eliminate them from the board. With challenging levels and addictive gameplay, it offers a thrilling experience of virus-busting fun.

name: Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince
summary:
Journey into a fantastical world on a quest for revenge in DRAGON QUEST MONSTERS: The Dark Prince.

Psaro is cursed and is unable to harm anything with monster blood. Now, he must become a Monster Wrangler to create an army for battle.

The hunt for high-ranked monsters takes Psaro through the ever-changing seasons of Nadiria and its unique environments, with rivers of bubbling lava, mysterious ancient ruins, and soaring towers of cake. Along the way, Psaro meets the kind-hearted elf, Rose, who joins his adventure to seek out ever-stronger monsters.

The key to Psaro's success lies with synthesis: the ability to combine two monsters and create a stronger offspring. Each new creation brings Psaro one step closer to his goal of becoming the Master of Monsterkind.

name: Drag the Rope
summary: A puzzle game that requires you to drag rope in various directions without retracing your steps.

name: Draftycar
summary: DRAFTYCAR is a fast-paced racing game simulating the art of professional stockcar drafting. Tweak the physics to your liking and immerse yourself in pursuit of victory. Strategically place your car to gain speed, disrupt your competition and navigate a high-speed drag race to the finish.

name: Drop Wizard Tower
summary: Drop Wizard Tower is a follow up to Neutronized's previous release, Drop Wizard. The player controls one of a group of wizards that must ascend the tower to defeat the Shadow Order.

name: Drinlan Yellow
summary: A short adventure of five dreams, each different from the rest. Explore them to face your past and your nightmares. Accept the ritual and open your eyes.

name: Dragonstone: Kingdoms
summary: Will you send your heroes on new quests or raise armies to march against your friends or will you lead your Guild to ultimate victory over the millions of other players online? In the world of Dragonstone your options are endless!

name: Dream Sketcher
summary: Dream Sketcher is a 1-4 player investigative adventure game. As an investigator of the special agency Dreamland Security, you will form a team and enter the weirdest dreams to conduct brain-diving investigation. Danger is imminent, investigate, make choices, roll the dice, and fight!

name: Drive Cars: Avoid Traffic
summary:
A new gameplay just launched!
Drive your favorite car and avoid traffic!
Get your best distance and share with your friends !
A great isometric city build for you!

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - GOTY Edition
summary: Draw and Color: Kawaii - GOTY Edition is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! Use different drawing tools and have some tasty fun!

name: Dream Of a Square
summary: Dream Of A Square, Start Your Square Adventure Get to the final stage with countless falling squares If you make a mistake, you'll regret it endlessly

name: Driving Strikers
summary: Driving Strikers is a 2.5D car football extravaganza in a 90s-style! Play 4-player matches across 5 different stadiums with wildly different and beautiful environments!

name: Draconiano
summary: Deliver justice viscerally, in a frenetic 3d fps old school style where every bullet counts, slide, cover and shoot don't leave anyone alive, you're judge jury and executioner

name: Droids: The White Witch
summary: Almost no information on this game can be found online, but this is a Star Wars game for the MSX featuring top-down arcade shooting gameplay. It is based off of the Droids TV show from the 1980's, the player controls the ship featured in the show.

name: Drug Prince & Narcotic Girl for Nintendo Switch
summary:
A Nintendo Switch version of Drug Prince and Narcotic Girl that includes the Main Story, from the first encounter with the main characters all the way up to the fake marriage chapter.

In addition to the newly written story from the boyfriend’s point of view, the Switch version also includes a new opening movie, newly drawn illustrations, and a new sensitivity feature. Also, the Side Story, which is available as an additional purchase, includes a “newlywed” themed story that was previously only available in the fan book.

name: Drevepsina
summary: Combat focused minimalist RTS

name: DriftHub
