summary: Enter the world of DRIFTHUB: Enjoy driving and simulation. Have a pleasant time with your friends.

name: Drunk Trucker Joe 3D Truck Driving Race
summary:
Alcohol, Trucks, Fat Trucker and a highway are simply things that do not go well together except in racing game.
Meet Joe, he can drive just about any truck you throw at him. From huge cranes, cement truck, Farm tractors and the regular “small” sized road truck. He can drive but can he do that well?

name: Dream City: Metropolis
summary: As mayor of Dream City: Metropolis, you’ll build a city of your dreams and explore a beautiful 3D world alongside a cast of colorful characters!

name: Drylands
summary: In a ravaged world, where the "juice" is the only nutrient and most valuable resource, a prisoner teams up with the people of Serenity and so begins an adventure that will change the wastelands' fate...

name: Dragonfist Limitless
summary: Undertake brutal martial arts training to raise your Power Level and begin your quest for revenge on Emperor Axemetal; the man who attacked your isolated mountain farm completely unprovoked, depriving you of your doting flock of llamas...

name: Droidmals: Lavanlier Town
summary: A classic JRPG with a horror setting and collectible creatures. Delve into abandoned buildings, shady woods and secret laboratories to recover all the creatures before it's too late!

name: Dream's Deep
summary: Explore someone's dream worlds. There are 3 Effects to collect.

name: Dreamland Discover the Secrets of the Girl
summary: This is a game that combines "beautiful girls" and "finding differences" gameplay.

name: Dream Seed
summary:
Dream Seed is a Madoka Magica Yume Nikki fangame for the Yume Nikki Dream Diary Jam 7. No knowledge of either series is needed to enjoy this game.

Explore the world from Homura's room and discover your purpose.

name: Dream Chaser
summary:
"When the moon rises in the sky, dreams awaken"

Daria is a teenager who is suddenly involved in dream hunting, unusual people who are dedicated to finding and eliminating nightmares that threaten people's lives. That trade is a family tradition that is imposed by her mother, and for this reason she would not like to leave it even knowing how exhausted she is deep down. Today, like another day, she is preparing to chase another nightmare.

Get into the hunt for dreams in mini-game battles, no more just watching characters do things; dodge and attack using your own ability It's all based on your strategy and skill!

Manage a system of moods that affect the course of the battle. Don't be surprised if a character flinches or gets angry if he sees one of his allies fall in combat!

Explore a world inspired by concepts and characters from Yume Nikki and other fangames. Solve the mysterious past of other characters and hunt down the nightmares that engulf the entire world.

name: Dreamcatcher Apparatus
summary: Dreamcatcher Apparatus is a short megawad for Doom 2. It is designed for limit removing source ports and made by various members of Doomer Boards led by 40oz.

name: Droidscape: Basilica
summary: Droidscape: Basilica is a unique puzzle-arcade game set in the grim electropunk future. A power-hungry Ecclesiarchy has plunged humanity into a new Dark Ages. The last remaining Chronomancer has been taken hostage on the gargantuan Basilica space station, and if he dies, an already dark world will get a lot darker. Only a small, unarmed droid named Bishop 7 can save him-and only with your help.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Happy Edition
summary: Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the premade templates or create your own illustrations.

name: Dragster Mayhem: Top Fuel Sim
summary:
Experience the thrill of piloting a nitro-methane guzzling Top Fuel drag car producing over 9000 bhp on the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!
Wait for the three yellows and throttle down in the blink of an eye as you cover 1000 ft in less than 5 seconds.
Race on 4 different race tracks with increasing prize money. Win races and earn money to improve your dragsters chassis, engine and tires.

name: Draken's Shrine
summary: A metroidvania action platformer set in an epic fantasy world where a barbarian woman raised in the wild, pushed by her mother stories about her father decides to look for his final resting place.

name: Draw
summary: Welcome to the world of Draw, a 2D sidescroller and visual novel! Armed with nothing but a pencil, play as "Stickman" as you explore a brand-new world. Solve puzzles by drawing into the game, meet new friends while dodging scribble monsters, and make memories that’ll never be erased!

name: Dreaming Chicken
summary: Explore and climb high and wide in the mysterious adventure of a chicken who wants to fly and fulfill his dreams.

name: Dracomaton
summary: Dracomaton is a top-down roguelike bullet hell about Eclipse, a small robot who awakens in an abandoned factory filled with corrupted training bots and the secrets of cosmic dragons. Fight your way to the top of the tower by transforming your robot body, changing your entire arsenal on the fly!

name: Drone Strike: Engineer Simulator
summary: Immerse yourself in an adrenaline-fueled adventure where revenge, engineering prowess, and a race against time intertwine to create an unforgettable gaming experience. Join forces with our resilient hero and conquer the path to redemption!

name: Dreadwinter
summary: Dreadwinter is a single-player, fantasy coffee shop RPG, where the game's story and experience is centered around how you play. Whether you want to run a thriving business, explore the world, or just make good coffee, how you run Dreadwinter is up to you!

name: Dreamscape Abyss
summary: Dreamscape Abyss is a game where you explore the ever-changing and surreal worlds inside of your dreams. Collect items to help you discover even more obscure areas as you delve deeper into your dream world.

name: DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing
summary:
Twenty of the most iconic DreamWorks Animation characters take the wheel in the fast-paced world of kart racing in DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing!

Shift, drift and jump at high speeds across a variety of fantastical tracks inspired by DreamWorks Animation’s many fan-favorite films. Blaze past the competition in fun and hilarious action for players of all ages with solo as well as online and local split-screen multiplayer modes.

name: Dream Pinball 3D
summary:
Dream Pinball 3D is a port of the PC pinball game Dream Pinball 3D. It includes all six tables: Knight Tournament, Monsters, Dino Wars, Aquatic, Spinning Rotors and Amber Moon.

As well as the original score based mode from the main game, this port also includes a Mission Mode exclusive to the Nintendo DS.

name: Drift City
summary: Drift City is a retro arcade racing game that lets the player race around a slalom track in a sports car. Test different cars and collect power ups to set faster times each lap.

name: Dragabox
summary: Use your intellect to clear a pathway to the door. Push and pull boxes out of your way, and deactivate electrical barriers. Over 200 levels of brain-busting challenges. Give it a try. See if you can complete them all!

name: Dragonscale Monastery
summary: Tame the mountain peak and create a dragon sanctuary. Carefully expand your monastery and discover the secrets of dragon breeding. Survive harsh winters, limited resources, hunger, cold, and many other adversities. Experience unique survival city-builder in the world of Dragonscale Monastery.

name: Dragon Quest X: Mirai he no Tobira to Madoromi no Shoujo Online
summary: This is the sixth major expansion for Dragon Quest X, known as Version 7, which will feature a new story, new characters, a new area called Zenias, and the new master vocation Dragon Mage.

name: DreadFall
summary: Embark on a chilling odyssey in Dreadfall, a horror platformer where you descend into your own nightmare. Fight monsters, solve puzzles, and upgrade your abilities as you journey through a haunting dream world.

name: Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince - Master Edition
Drought
summary: 3 short, Boom compatible maps built with @Noiser's excellent D4V mod and using @ukiro's wonderful OTEX texture pack. Each map is originally a ~1 hour speedmap that has received tweaks and refinement over the last month since their initial version.

name: Drum Roll
summary: Have you ever wanted to roll an oil drum? Roll the drum as far as you want with Drum Roll!

name: Drongo's Festive Adventures
summary: Hop the seasons. Collect pickups, conquer themed levels inspired by Christmas, Halloween, Zen Garden, and Easter, and enjoy breathtaking graphics with ray tracing. Unlock each level as you progress, compete on leaderboards, and experience the joy of platforming in this immersive holiday-themed game!

name: Driving Speed Pro
summary:
Race in high powered V8 muscle cars from classic era to modern day. Highly realistic physics, graphics, sound, car handling and performance set this game apart.
Compete in career mode where you can experience a real racing career. Start off with a small amount of virtual credits and purchase a car to enter into organized series events. Win virtual credits from races that can be used to purchase more cars, pay for repairs and performance upgrades. Build your way up to compete in elite series events.
Modify your car by purchasing upgrades for performance and see exactly how each type of upgrade specifically improves the power and torque of the engine on a dyno chart. Purchase upgraded transmissions for faster gear shifts. Purchase better tyres for increased grip and road handling. Purchase weight reduction for better handling. Purchase suspension setups that lower the car and improve the handling from a lower center of gravity.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - 23rd World Tournament
summary: Experience the story that leads to the main plot of Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot and the 23rd World Tournament, where many upheavals took place! The title of Tenkaichi begins now! Goku and Ma Junior battle for the fate of the world.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Amazing Edition
summary: This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot + A New Power Awakens Set Season Pass 2
summary: Be the hope of the universe. Deepen your Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot experience by grabbing Season Pass 2 which includes 3 additional story arcs!

name: Drip Feed
summary: A GSTONE fortress, a red glowing sky, silhouetted bodies writhe on spikes in the distance, fortelling your fate.

name: Dracula Cha Cha
summary: Inspired by Konami's Tomena Sanner, Dracula Cha Cha tells the festive adventures of everyone's favorite non-reflective aristocrat. Help the Count as he karate kicks snowmen, dances with Grinch Girls, plays rock-paper-scissors with reindeer, and much more!

name: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2024
summary: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2023=4 puts you in the role of head coach for your favorite college football team. Recruit, gameplan and make the right calls on the field to lead your team to the top of the ranks and the college football championship.

name: Dreaming in the Mountains
summary: A dream and a question The game tells the story of a climber who enters a dream The player, as an abstract subject in the dream, experiences various dream slices hope you get something out of this

name: Dragonhold
summary: Dragonhold is a multiplayer dragon and melee extraction game. Soar through the air or charge into the melee with a growing lineup of dragons and warriors. Compete head-to-horn with other dragon riders from around the world.

name: Drip
summary: The fifth link in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. anthology is a lovecraftian arcade platformer under the water.

name: Dream Aether
summary:
Dive deeper and deeper into dreams in this short musical experience.

This is link 6 in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N..

name: Drill to the Stars
summary: In "Drill to the Stars," you build your OWN base! Guide enemies with walls into traps and eliminate them before they destroy your drill. Strategically adapt to the environment and place the towers cleverly for maximum attack speed in this roguelite tower defense game.

name: Dragon Wings
summary: Embark on an epic journey of self discovery! Set out on a thrilling adventure through treacherous landscapes and overcome exciting challenges. Will you be able to find your way home?

name: Dragon Fantasy
summary: A turn based RPG game! Players will use the traditional RPG game mode to play two major scripts and three additional content. Players will follow the plot to encounter various events, defeat various bosses, explore different worlds, and welcome friends who love traditional RPGs to play!

name: DreamWorks Kids Bundle
summary: An Outright Games bundle in support of UNICEF. Featuring a collection of family fun games, available to purchase for a limited time.

name: Drift86: Map Pack
summary: This DLC allows you to unlock 5 new unique maps!

name: Dragon Ball FighterZ: Android 21 - Lab Coat
summary:
Android 21, an original character from DRAGON BALL FighterZ, now joins the fight in her appearance before transformation!

This content includes:
• Android 21 (Lab Coat) as a new playable character
• 5 alternative colors for her outfit
• Android 21 (Lab Coat) Lobby Avatar
• Android 21 (Lab Coat) Z Stamp

name: Dr. Driving
summary:
Dr. Driving drives you crazy!

Burn up the street with the fastest and most visually stunning driving game.

name: Drift Mine Satellite
summary:
A maintenance text adventure about a person living underground in a limestone mine and their work maintaining the local communication network that has sprung up there.

Stemming from a (real!) visit to a decommissioned limestone mine that is now used to house RVs and boats over the winter (and a subsequent phone notification, under several hundred feet of rock, that the space station was visible overhead), Drift Mine Satellite imagines what a post-apocalyptic community life might look like among sleeping vacation vehicles. It is a utopian apocalypse fantasy, a forever-camping world narrowed to linear miles of RVs parked under a mountain, the people who live in them, and the systems that interconnect them, both social and material.

The game was commissioned for Solar Protocol, a network of solar powered servers that connects from whatever server is in the most sunshine. It is programmed for the browser, with low-energy use and computational power front of mind. The entire story is told via spatialized text - no images, no libraries, just divs and textboxes and basic javascript.

name: Drakantos
summary: Drakantos is a free-to-play MMORPG with a nostalgic pixel art style, combined with exciting, fast-paced action combat and more than 20 unique playable heroes.

name: Drift Cars Zombie Crusher
summary: Join the gripping battle against the zombie invasion with Drift Cars Zombie Crusher! A breathtaking experience awaits for car enthusiasts and action lovers. Use your drift skills to crush the zombies and survive.

name: Dreamscape Puzzles
summary: The beauties are magically sealed in the picture and need warriors to rescue them. Warriors come and rescue the beauties and bring them home!!

name: Dream Adventure
summary: An idle RPG that takes place when you sleep.

name: Dragon's Heaven
summary: Dragon’s Heaven is a cancelled JRPG that was in development by Digitalware in the late ’90s, planned to be published for the Super Famicom and later on the Sega Saturn by Data East.

name: Dr. Lunatic Supreme With Steam
summary: Smash monsters, collect brains, and so much more as you attempt to stop Dr. Lunatic's evil scheme. 1,200 levels and hundreds of hidden bonuses in Bouapha's greatest adventure! Now enhanced for Steam!

name: Dreams of a Geisha
summary: Journey through the wonderful world of Geisha. Help Ichisumi to reopen the temples and restore a world of beauty and passion.

name: Dream #46
summary: Chill exploration, contemplative ride game with a boat.

name: Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Tetris
summary: Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Tetris is a fan game where, after causing a dimensional rift and giving rise to an evil double of himself, the Badniks hold an enigmatic "Mean Bean Tetris" contest. Only the original Dr. Robotnik, with his cunning and skills, will be able to prove that he is the real one.

name: DropingBalls
summary: This is a simple casual game for avoiding falling balls. You can move the protagonist through AWSD to exercise your reaction and planning abilities while resting. It comes with a maximum survival time recording mechanism.

name: Drift Abyss
summary: Drift Abyss is a VR experience where you can fly with your arms, climb with your fists, and discover unique landscapes in this procedurally generated planet.

name: Draco and the Seven Scales
summary: Discover the mysteries of the great ocean in Draco and The Seven Scales! Explore dungeons, collect items, and fight scallywags on land and on the seven seas.

name: Dracula's Castle
summary: Dracula's Castle is an aftermarket action game for the Sega Game Gear and Sega Mega Drive.

name: Draculesti
summary: Draculesti is a villain-focused reimagining of the classic novel Dracula that shines a light on the shadowy figures of Renfield, Dracula's Brides, and Dracula himself. Be enthralled by the residents of Castle Dracula, and thrill at a dark narrative with strong LGBTQI+ themes.

name: Dressed to Kill Sherlock Holmes for Playdate & C64!
summary: playdate and c64 double feature!

name: Dreamsweeper
summary:
The floor isn’t lava, it’s Minesweeper!
A Dungeon Crawler x Minesweeper Roguelike and a lo-fi musical experience like no other game before.
Navigate worlds by solving Minesweeper rooms and fight your anxieties with the power of lo-fi music. This is the story of a girl who goes to sleep listening to music every night, and awakens in a dream world to face her nightmarish anxieties.

name: Drift Vector
summary: Drift Vector is a minimalist, glowing neon synthwave-inspired, indie, retro arcade asteroids-like game for 1-4 players with an unconventional control scheme that encourages ballet-like manoeuvres to line up the perfect shot while collecting powerups and avoiding rockets, opponents & other obstacles.

name: Drift Legends 2
summary:
Experience the ultimate drift and driving sensation in Drift Legends 2, an incredibly realistic 3D car drifting and street racing game. Compete with other racers while playing drifting games or play your car driving games offline. Become the in-game drift king as Keiichi Tsuchiya in real racing! Make your best car drifts in this extremely engaging racing simulator!

Take control of highly-detailed legendary drift cars and conquer various tracks as you strive to break records, both yours and of other racers that play this drifting car game. Engage in both offline and online drift racing events, progressing from a novice to a professional drift driver. Test your skills in a multiplayer game mode, if you think you are tough enough to win the title of the Drift King. Challenge other drivers and ascend to the pinnacle of the cross-platform online leaderboard.

name: Dragon Village Collection
summary: Dragon Village Collection (Korean: 드래곤빌리지 컬렉션) is a mobile game developed by highbrow as a part of the Dragon Village IP, and first released on Android and iOS on May 3rd, 2023 in Korea. It consists of collecting and raising hundreds of different dragon species, exploring the vast world of Alitia, and meeting various colorful characters and monsters along the way.

name: Dreams: Unlimited links
summary: 《Dreams: Unlimited links》 is a third-person shooter competitive game that features a variety of unique heroes, exciting gameplay modes, and rich scene maps and battlegrounds. Players can venture alone or team up for thrilling multiplayer battles, challenging other teams.

name: Dreadnought
summary: Mow down the alien hordes, scout for resources and survive. Dreadnought is a mix of Action Tower Defense Survival and Shoot 'Em Up Bullet Hell where you control the ships turrets & defend against waves of enemies. Choose your weapons, upgrade your ship & brace yourself, the horde is coming.

name: Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game: Fan Favorites
summary:
POLKA WILL NEVER DIE!
… and neither will you, with help from the new heroes in this expansion for the Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game! This expansion adds two new character decks—Thomas Raith and Waldo Butters—and two new book decks—BLOOD RITES and DEAD BEAT.

name: Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game: Winter Schemes
summary:
FEELING WINTER'S BITE?
Warm up with this expansion for the Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game! Includes two alternative character decks — WINTER KNIGHT HARRY and WINTER LADY MOLLY — and two new book decks — COLD DAYS and SKIN GAME.

name: Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game: Mouse & Variants
summary: Bring Harry's faithful companion Mouse (with a dash of Mister) into the game with this character deck packet. Also includes 2 variant cards for Harry's deck and 3 variant cards for Susan's deck to add a little variety to your play.

name: Drift Survivor
summary: Paying Tribute to Classic Arcade Shooting Games. Drift Survivor is an addictive and fast-paced arcade shooting game that combines "drifting" with a "bullet hell" gameplay style!

name: Drunken Way to Home
summary: You've drunk too much... Let's go home while being aware of the dangerous around you! Drunken movements are fully simulated with physical calculation. Enjoy your drunkenness.

name: Drive Up
summary: Embark on a thrilling journey in 'Drive Up.' Scale the floating objects on a mysterious island in the ocean. There are no saves; one fall, and you're back to square one. How high can you climb?

name: Dragon Tower
summary: Dragon Tower is a light rogue game set in a different world, where players take on the role of a brave adventurer exploring inside the Dragon Tower. They will assemble their own team to create unique strategies and defeat the monsters within the Dragon Tower.

name: Drumblox
summary:
Drumblox music rhythm game is an innovative, unique and fun drum rhythm game where you learn how to play drums to original music in different genres.
Your goal is to hit the beat - small cubes - as they are coming at your drum pads.
In this game you are the drummer. You play the drums - for real!
This music game develops your rhythmical sense and gives you a better understanding of how the different rhythm patterns affects the music.
New original music & levels added each week. Join the music drum rhythm game revolution!

name: Dreaming with You
summary: Dreaming with You is an immersive third-person adventure set within the shared dream of Michael and Sarah. In this enigmatic dream, they find themselves kidnapped, forced to collaborate for their escape. The twist: as they work together, they might fall in love with eachother in a rom-com fashion.

name: Dropkick Navvy
summary: Dropkick Navvy is a physics-based crafting/survival sim. Scurry, gather, and build, to help your pal the World Tree reassemble a broken cosmos. Which broke all on its own, totally at random, and no one in particular was responsible.

name: Drinkrime
summary: Jin, a talking liquor bottle with supernatural powers, has given you a mission. Face DRINKRIME's cast of unique characters and force them to confess their crimes. Interrogate them together and make those wrongdoers come to terms with their guilt!

name: Drift.Wav
summary: Drift.Wav is a casual drifting game with a synthwave inspired aesthetic. This game is not meant to replicate / simulate actual drift mechanics, but more serve as a fun & relaxing game where you can slide in a synthwave inspired world. See if you can drift your way to the top of the leaderboard!

name: Drift Boss
summary: Drift Boss is a game included in the Singapore Airlines in-flight entertainment.

name: Drunkoff V.
summary: "Drunkoff V." is a narrative game with elements of horror, telling the dramatic story of the main character. You will have to come face to face with skeletons in the closet along with him. The events unfold in the post-Soviet era.

name: Drop Doll
summary: "Drop Doll" is a casual puzzle game. In this game, players earn points by combining balls of the same type.

name: DroneZ XL
summary: DroneZ XL transports you to a hostile future that, because of neglect and pollution, has forced people to live immersed in feedback units. These units, which are connected to the V-Space network, are dominated by Artificial Intelligences who forbid people to disconnect.

name: Dragon's Ruler
summary: This is a single-player, turn-based strategy war game set in a fantasy world. With over 130 different units, strategize to maintain a balance between governance and military strength as you aim for territorial expansion!

name: Dr. Mary
summary:
Viruses Fighter is a classic minigame, in which you are playing as a doctor to kill the bacteria with different capsules.
Match four or more colors either horizontally or vertically to delete them. Each level is completed when all of the bacterias have been defeated.

name: Dr. Chess
summary: You can enjoy real-time online Chess all over the world.

name: Dragon Quest Monster: The Dark Prince - Digital Deluxe Edition
Draw and Color: Kawaii - Magnificent Edition
Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince - Treasure Trunks
Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince - Coach Joe's Dungeon Gym
Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince - The Mole Hole
Dragon's Dream
summary: Dragon's Dream (ドラゴンズドリーム) is a Sega Saturn Online RPG released exclusively in Japan. It was distributed in very low numbers for free in order to promote the Saturn's online capabilities in Japan. Sega had planned a PC version, but this never materialised. For a short time, there were also mentions of the XBAND version.

name: Druid: Yamie no Tsuisekisha
summary: The world of Navan has many islands, and four of them are reigned by the powerful Druid brothers: Lawson, Curak, Havnar, and Astor. They worship different deities and try to maintain the harmony of nature on their islands. But one day, Lawson mysteriously disappears. Unable to solve the mystery, the brothers seek out you, a grandson of a once powerful Druid, to search for Lawson in the entire world of Navan. The gameplay of Druid is somewhat similar to that of Ultima VIII: Pagan. It is an action RPG with simple point-and-click interface and action-oriented combat. You can execute two different types of physical attacks (high and low) and cast a variety of spells. You don't have a party in the game.

name: Dr. Chaos: Shadows of Mars
summary: Mickey Chaos has his hands full once again. His brother Dr. Chaos has taken their sister Didi on an expedition to ancient Mars, back when the planet was teeming with life. Unfortunately the martian locals stole the Flux Accelerator’s five “time batteries”, stranding Didi on an alien planet with no way back home. With only enough juice left for a one-way trip, Mickey now must collect the batteries, repair the Accelerator, and bring Didi back to earth before Mom has a heart attack.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse - Resurrection F Pack
summary:
Brand new content coming from the movie Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection "F". Get 3 new characters: Golden Frieza, SSGSS Vegeta and SSGSS Goku. The first character ever created by Akira Toriyama is also included in this pack: Jaco. More content included:

- 5 Parallel Quests
- 2 Masters
- 8 masters Quests
- 14 Moves
- 1 Accessory
- 7 Z-Souls

And Turtle Hermit costume set.

name: Dragon Kings
summary: Dragon Kings is a top down action rogue-lite shooter. Power up weapons and drones and annihilate hoards of dragons and dinosaurs.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse - Season Pass
summary:
Extend your experience in the unique universe of Dragon Ball Xenoverse with the Season Pass!
More playable characters and many more exclusive elements included in the DLC packs:

- Episodes and Quests
- Masters and Masters Quests
- Stages
- Skills, Costumes and accessories
- Z-souls

The Season Pass gives you access to the content of every Dragon Ball Xenoverse DLC pack sold separately, get it for more customization options and and an extended journey to fix the history of Dragon Ball!

name: Drive Zone Online
summary:
Multiplayer car simulator. Racing & Driving game with a big open-world online!

Drive Zone Online is a car driving simulator. Burn your tires on the asphalt and explore "Grand Car Parking City" and the world around it. You can participate in street racing, drift racing, drag racing or invite a friend and drive around the city together.

name: Dreadnoughts of Caelus
summary: Dreadnoughts of Caelus is a first-person 3D action flight sim. Pilot small, agile fighters to destroy a huge, fully-destructible dreadnought from space before it reaches your city, floating in the blue-green mist of a distant sky planet.

name: Drive!
summary:
You are an explorer from the year 2350. Much of the world's rainforests have been logged, leading to the discovery of a large temple constructed by ancient civilizations eons ago. You are among the first to be allowed to explore it.

The entrance to this temple is across a long stone bridge, which you have chosen to drive across. Inside the temple you find a golden idol on a stone pedestal. Although you have been instructed to leave everything you find, your greed gets the better of you and you remove the idol from where it has sat for thousands of years.

Suddenly, the ground begins to shake. Bricks fall from the ceiling. Maybe this wasn't such a good idea! You run outside just as the entrance caves in. As you get in your car and drive away, you realize that the bridge's supports have dislodged and it's all collapsing behind you! There's no time to think — just drive!

name: Dr. Bowow's Eco-Extraction
summary: Puzzle with the master mogul in Dr. Bowow’s Eco-Extraction! Build Factories, Laboratories, and Mines to gather resources – nevermind the environmental hazards. Keep it clean, keep it orderly, and above all, keep it profitable!

name: Dragon Dance
summary: Dragon Dance is a Puzzle game, developed by Always Neat and published by Success, which was released in Japan in 2009.

name: Dragon Hunters
summary: Dragon Hunters is a fun platform action game, based on the stunning world featured in the successful Dragon Hunters TV series and the animated movie coming spring 2008. Dragon Hunters combines platform gameplay with many challenging puzzle and action elements. Use the 3 characters of the game according to their individual abilities, and make your way through a detailed fantasy world consisting of landmasses and planetoids floating mid-air.

name: Dragoon X Omega I: Gold Edition - Amnethen Apocalypse
Dragoon X Omega II: Easy Mode
Dracula's Prey: A Nightmare in Rome
summary: In this gloomy and mystifying first-person 2D horror game, help Sherlock Holmes chase down the murderous Count Dracula in the city of Rome! Over 7 nights, survive the unfolding nightmare in this world of creepy hand-drawn animations!

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2024
summary: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 2024 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite football team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents right down to creating and calling your own plays to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Dreaminal
summary: Dreaminal is a 1-4 players surreal backrooms experience. Traverse through immersive and unique backrooms levels, experience anomalies, interact and solve puzzles while hiding from unknown entities in order to escape from the mysterious world of The Backrooms .

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Superb Edition
summary:
Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the premade templates or create YOUR OWN illustrations.

Pick one of over a dozen drawings and make it your own. Chose one of the available settings and play around with these adorable characters.

This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

name: Dredge: The Pale Reach
summary:
The Pale Reach is the first official expansion for Dredge - a cosmic horror fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. This content adds a brand new, ice-themed biome that can be experienced at any stage in your playthrough.

In The Pale Reach, you’ll navigate the treacherous ice fields to discover a mystery frozen under the ice. Retrace the steps of the last crew that came before you and unearth a story of bitter betrayal. Find some familiar faces and develop new equipment to navigate the area and profit from its inhabitants.

name: Dr. Psycho: Hospital Escape 2
summary: Experience your deepest fears within the frightening walls of Dr. Psycho's Hospital. Is this gloomy asylum the result of your own tormented mind? Go through blood-chilling challenges, find hidden items and face terrifying psychopaths. Will you escape this nightmare or become its eternal prisoner?

name: Dracula Awakens
summary: Kill monsters using your camera and solve puzzles as you try to survive Dracula himself in his castle in this retro-style survival horror game.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Hyper Dimension
summary: The European port of Dragon Ball Z: Hyper Dimension lacks the story mode, present in the Japanese version.

name: Dr.Roland
summary:
The patient is suffering a terrible virus infection, and your role as Dr.Roland is to get rid of those ugly and funky viruses, throwing them colored vitamin capsules.

If four elements of the same color get together, all of them will disappear, and you will be one step closer to cure the infection.

Dr.Roland is a tetrislike game that you can enjoy alone with your Amstrad CPC, or in a fun battle with a friend side to side.

name: Dream Cafe
summary: Step into a dreamy world of macarons and cafe management! Craft colorful delights, satisfy whimsical customers, and become the Macaron Maestro in Dream Cafe. Ready to run your dream factory?

name: Dreamwalker
summary:
This game was made as a part of the Tirana Game Jam Edition 1.0, where the theme was "Dreams".

This game is a blend of "The Lemmings" and "Monument Valley". You are in control of the sleepwalkers and you must get them to bed safely and securely. You do so by giving them traits with which they can traverse the environment.

name: Dragon Quest IV: Michibikareshi Mono-tachi
summary:
Embark on a journey to explore the land, seas and skies of the Dragon Quest universe in this grand entry from the Zenithia Trilogy. Soon to follow are Dragon Quest V: Hand of the Heavenly Bride and Dragon Quest VI: Realms of Reverie.

Indulge in the colorful Dragon Quest world created by Yuji Horii, combined with the charming characters and monsters designed by Akira Toriyama and memorable soundtrack from famed composer Koichi Sugiyama to create an unforgettable gaming experience.

Experience the world of Dragon Quest through the perspectives of multiple characters with a unique, chapter-driven storyline while you journey through a beautifully rendered 3D world, with dynamic dual screen presentation and newly animated monsters.

The original Japanese version has all of the original content not present in the localizations.

name: Dragon of Saiyu
summary: Dragon of Saiyu retells the classic tale of Journey To The West in Retro 2D platformer style . Play as the young aspiring monk, Sanzang, and defeat strong foes in his quest of attaining the legendary scrolls from the Buddha of far west.

name: Dream Slayer
summary: first-person arcade action set in your subconscious

name: Dry Sorrow
summary: Small medieval outpost with a unique texture theme and horde-based combat. A touched-up version of an old deathmatch map converted for SP mode. Comes with a custom skybox.

name: Dreary Disposition
summary: Large Wizard-themed medieval castle/dungeon level. The map source is included.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2: Special Edition
summary:
The Special Edition includes:
• Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2
• Super Pass
- Super Pack 1
- Super Pack 2
- Super Pack 3
- Super Pack 4
- Super Pass Bonus: Early access to the character Future Trunks from DRAGON BALL SUPER.
• HERO OF JUSTICE Pack Set
- HERO OF JUSTICE Pack 1
- HERO OF JUSTICE Pack 2

name: Dream Girlfriend: Doomer Girl
summary: Dream Girlfriend: Doomer Girl is an adult-only visual novel, that will tell the story of Doomer's journey to find happiness

name: Dragon's Lair
summary: The Japanese version of NES Dragon's Lair had a major overhaul in quality, being the fastest version of the game. It also has changes in level design to make the bosses less easier to be cheated.

name: Dragon's Lair
summary:
The PAL version of Dragon's Lair expands upon the Japanese version, still having a good speed, but adding new enemy types and cutscenes in-between levels.

Contrary to other multiregional games at the time, the PAL version is a lot faster than the original NTSC version, despite the refresh rate being lower.

name: DreadMoon
summary: Jump into DreadMoon, a stylized arena FPS blending fast-paced action with stylized visuals. Experience a co-op campaign and a fun multiplayer shootout, all while a captivating soundtrack amplifies every moment. Where echoes of the past meet the thrill of today.

name: Dragon Hop
summary: Put your jumping skills to the test in this beautiful 3D platformer, playing as a dragon! Explore unique areas to find hidden treasures, collect crystals and trade them for skills to help you on your journey. Can you get to the top?

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Complete Edition +
Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Super Deluxe Edition
Dreaming Dead Dance
summary: Survive as long as possible from an onslaught of hundreds hiding in the dark in this rogue-lite survival game. Augment your spells together to create waves of destruction through the horde in the dark.

name: Dragon Blaze
summary:
Welcome to the epic world of Dragon Blaze, one of the best legends in the role-playing game genre! With its emphasis on raid battles, strategic combat, immersive story, and a shadow conspiracy that will keep you hooked, it is a must-play for fans of the RPG games.

In Dragon Blaze, you'll enter a shadow realm filled with deadly enemies, memorable characters, and exciting battles of skill and strategy. Through raid battles, you can obtain powerful items that can be used to enhance your abilities and strengthen your character, making them the ultimate RPG hero that's perfect for your playstyle.

With the special character classes and abilities, you'll have the freedom to create a unique character that reflects your style and strengths. Whether you're battling fierce bosses, exploring the world of DB, or growing your character to your heart's content, there's never a dull moment in this legends RPG game.

name: Dread Delusion: Rise of the Skeletons
summary: A new update has been brewed for this especially wicked season. A new isle has appeared! Are you ready to explore and uncover its secrets? We've also added a bevy of combat tweaks, sound, and other general adjustments.

name: Dragon Bobby: The Story of a Life
summary: A uniquely beautiful game with third-person exploration and puzzles that tells the story of a man's life from birth. You control a dragon who is an analogy of this man in the story. A true reflection on life.

name: Dragon Eclipse
summary: Choose your Tamer and fight dangerous creatures with the help of your companions - powerful Mystlings! Travel the mysterious world of Dragon Eclipse. Catch and train Mystlings to create your own team! Build a strong card deck and make efficient synergies of three Mystlings to fight your enemies.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Ultra Deluxe
DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing: Rally Edition
summary: DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing Rally Edition is the ultimate kart racing experience for DreamWorks Animation fans young and young at heart by bundling the full game together with the DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing Rally Pack's exclusive characters and content in one action-packed offering.

name: DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing: Rally Pack
summary: The DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing Rally Pack exclusively includes Kung Fu Panda's Master Oogway and Puss in Boots: The Last Wish's Wolf as playable characters, unique karts inspired by the characters plus spoilers, wheels, engines and different chassis designs to completely customize their karts.

name: Dracoslayer
summary: Dracoslayer is a fighting game title with a heavy emphasis on elemental abilities and PvE action.

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2024
summary: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2024 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Drone Flight Simulator Online
summary: Enjoy freedom with Drone Flight Simulator Online. Unlimited flight experience awaits you in the sky.

name: DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue Deluxe Edition
summary: DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue Deluxe Edition bundles the full game together with the DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue Deluxe Character Pack's 2 exclusive playable characters and 3 brand-new costumes into one rockin' offering.

name: Dreamers: A Nostalgic Adventure
summary: Dreamers will lead you on an emotional journey in a story about friendship, exploration, and personal growth. Join the three characters in their adventure through a 3D world with secondary storylines and mini-games, vehicles to upgrade, puzzles to solve, and collaborative split-screen experiences.

name: Dream Celestial Body
summary: Astronauts want to go home, begin fantasy adventure.

name: Dreamland
summary: Dreamland is a world full of imagination and adventure, waiting for you to explore and discover. Join us and embark on your adventure!

name: Drink Human Beans
summary: You will pay $99.99 to be psychologically tortured by a sentient job application. You will learn to live, laugh, love until the walls bleed. You will become a succulent beverage.

name: DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue: Deluxe Character Pack
summary: The DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue: Deluxe Character Pack is loaded with exclusive characters and content for the most rockin' DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue experience!

name: Dragonero
summary: Dragonero is an immersive turn-based combat RPG set in a vast and savage fantasy world. Guide the heroes through trap-strewn dungeons, dozens of enemies and embark on your journeys with strategy. Protect the Erondár and defeat the Necromancer!

name: DragonBasic Space Invaders
summary: Developed by fjsantos in 2003, this is a Space Invaders clone developed using DragonBasic.

name: Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room
summary: Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room is a community run experimental story game. With the end of the world fast approaching, Dr. Gumphrey Finklestein announces his plans for a groundbreaking scientific experiment. What will it entail? Does even he know?

name: Drag Racing Car Simulator
summary: Are you ready to prove your skills and become the ultimate racing champion?

name: #Drive Rally
summary: Drive Rally lets you relive the 90s in the most exciting era in motorsport history, where dust, mud, and snow are badges of honor. Unleash the raw power of legendary rally beasts, admire every second of the stunning landscapes, and remember: the faster you go, the better!

name: Drop the Dice
summary: Drop the Dice is a “Side Game” whose goal is to score as many points as possible by placing your dice on the board! Optimize the positioning to obtain similar totals on your rows and columns, increase your score, use bonuses and cross the different levels!

name: Dragon Quest +
summary:
All is darkness. The Dragon Lord has captured the Princess and stolen The Legendary Hero's Ball of Light!
You are the Legendary Hero's heir. You have been assigned a most dangerous task: to rescue the King's daughter and retrieve the Ball of Light.
The journey ahead will be tough, but it is your destiny. Three Sages await your arrival, each willing to reward you with mystical items of great power
Gather these three items, let your wits be about you as you gain experience, weapons and armor as you battle your way through Alefgard. Rest if you must!
Search out the Dragon Lord's lair and face your destiny, in the role playing epic, Dragon Quest.

name: Dreamworld Dread
summary: Your nightmares relentlessly return every time you close your eyes. Learn new skills, level them up, and never lose them, or else succumb to the darkness in this thrilling roguelite deckbuilder.

name: Drawing with Nat: Dream Diary
summary:
Drawing with Nat: Dream Diary is a Yume Nikki styled exploration game featuring Nat!
Explore various dream locations to collect "Inspiration" which can be used to create drawings and also collect "Forms" which can grant you different abilities and change Nat's appearance.

name: Draw and Go!
summary: Draw and create players to defeat the enemy team!

name: Draw and Color
summary: Draw, paint, choose your painting tools, and progress with Draw and Color!

name: Dream Town Story
summary:
Tired of tedious town simulators taking up your time? Develop dream dwellings down to the last brick and construct cityscapes crawling as far as the eye can see in this stimulating simulation game! Compete with other towns in the rankings, or take it easy and go at your own pace.

Build houses to have people move into your town, then add shops and lots of other facilities, making it a vibrant, lovely place to live. Stores like the bike shop or car dealer will sell vehicles to your residents, allowing them to travel further and visit more places. Acquire more areas as your town grows, discover new facilities to build, help the residents find new jobs, plan the town down to the last detail to make sure it's convenient for everyone... There is just so much to do!

name: Dr. Mario DX
summary:
This hack transforms Dr. Mario Game Boy game into a Game Boy Color game.

Enjoy the Game Boy classic now in full color with a very cool new feature: character selection! That’s it! Dr. Luigi, Dr. Daisy and Dr. Wario join the virus battle! Choose your favorite doctor to play as, each one with their own sprite, palettes.

It also has a couple of slight QoL tweaks to the original game code.

name: Dross
summary: Dross is an FPS Roguelike set in a derelict facility infested with alien bugs. Travel a procedurally generated world, get powerful weapons and equipment, and upgrade your gear to survive. Fight the Dross, discover and destroy the infestation, and uncover the secrets of this mysterious installation.

name: Dragon Quest X: All In One Package - Versions 1-7
summary: A new all-in-one package including versions 1 to 7 of Dragon Quest X Online.

name: Drive Hard
summary: A fun and addictive driving experience

name: Dreamin' Cat
summary:
Dreamin' Cat - a little platformer game about how a cat is trying to get rid of nightmares, get some food and find a way home.

Use arrow keys to move, Z to jump. Use headphones for a better experience.

The game was made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 47.

name: DragonBox Elements
summary:
Save Euclid's Island from Osgard
The goal of the game is simple - build an army to defeat the evil dragon, Osgard. Behind each level are the properties of shapes, with each move you are interacting with geometric proofs.

Build Your Army
To help you defeat Osgard and win the game, you must build an army. Your army is full of cleverly hidden shapes that only appear once you have successfully completed the proof.

Who is Euclid? What are his Elements?
DragonBox Elements takes its inspiration from “Elements”, one of the most influential works in the history of mathematics. Written by the Greek mathematician Euclid, "Elements" describes the foundations of geometry using a singular and coherent framework. Its 13 volumes have served as a reference textbook for over 23 centuries, and DragonBox Elements makes it possible for players to master its essential axioms and theorems after just a couple of hours playing!

name: DragonBox Algebra 5+
summary:
So Easy a 5-Year-Old Can Do It
It's never too early to start learning algebra. You can easily grasp basic algebraic concepts and operations over ten chapters of the game. An instant feedback mechanism helps you understand what you're doing wrong to gain a sound understanding of algebra.

How does it work?
Over the course of the game, the cards with drawings are slowly replaced with variables and numbers. Little by little, you learn the operations needed to isolate "X" on one side of the game board.

name: DragonBox Algebra 12+
summary:
Build a Greater Understanding of Algebra
With more levels and more advanced equations Algebra 12+ moves beyond its critically acclaimed predecessor, Algebra 5+.

More Levels & Harder Equations
Algebra 5+ gave us the basics, now comes the hard part. In Algebra 12+ you deep dive into advanced algebraic concepts.

Covered in the App: Addition, Division, Multiplication, Parentheses, Positive/Negative Signs, Addition of Fractions (Common Denominator), Collection of Like Terms, factorization, Substitution.

name: Drawing Carnival
summary:
Unleash your inner artist and create gorgeous paintings made in different art styles!

Grab your neon markers, spray paints, stick-on diamonds or glitter powder and use them to create amazing masterpieces!

Divide your favorite portrait or any painting into four parts. Choose what you're going to paint with, decide which colors you're going to use, create a perfect image and put the painting in a frame to sell it!

name: Draw & Color Maze: Paint Labyrinth Puzzle
summary: An exciting puzzle game in which you and a snail will have to go to a mysterious labyrinth and paint it with magic paint!

name: Drum Legend
summary: Drum Legend is a music rhythm game with multiple drumming gameplay options. In the 'Drum Maestro' mode,you can simulate a band drummer ,learn a variety of drumming skills, and play your favorite music.In the 'Rhythm Rush' mode, challenge yourself with more difficult tracks, aim for higher scores.

name: Dream of the Star Haven
summary:
Dream of the Star Haven is a 1st person “giant leap” platformer with elements of exploration puzzling and light combat - a magical odyssey through islands in the sky where you soar gracefully and eventually even bend gravity itself to your will, giving you the power to literally turn the dreamlike world upside-down.

Explore awe-inspiring floating islands with gravity-defying agility. Discover the stars scattered across the islands using your magical scanner to reveal hidden celestial secrets.

In this captivating land, you're invited into a serene journey where you to traverse the floating archipelago in search of secrets, to liberate that which has been unjustly taken.

The game introduces a mesmerizing combination of a mighty triple-leap ability and a magical scanner, both essential tools for navigating the world.

Discover the stars scattered across the islands using the magical scanner helps you on your main quest, while other side quests and secret collectibles are more elusive. As you progress through each realm, you uncover mysteries of a lost era.

Immerse yourself in a unique blend of soothing exploration, graceful platforming, and a dreamy atmosphere. Savor the expansive vistas and uncover all that's hidden among the floating islands. With its emphasis on relaxation, exploration, and light combat and puzzle solving, the game provides an oasis of tranquility and is the perfect game-between-games when you need a break from big, noisy and chaotic gameplay.

Cruise through the low-stakes core of the game, or challenge yourself with the more difficult collectathon of secret challenges!

Embrace the joy of a harmonious journey as you leap toward the stars and reach toward a higher Dream of the Star Haven

name: Dread Protocol
summary: Embark on a thrilling 3rd-person space adventure. Engage in merciless combat, wield a vast arsenal, and explore procedurally generated environments. Take down the Federation, one station at a time.

name: Dracula's Castle
summary: Duke Nukem gets shot down by a Science experiment gone wrong near Dracula's Castle - get in and make the bastards pay for rising your flight insurance premium yet again.

name: Dragon Front Rising
summary: Challenge players online or solo with Conquest mode in this immersive collectible card-battler. Dragon Front Rising mixes high fantasy with World War II on a 4x4 grid battlefield that is alive with rampaging giants, intimidating war-machines, and soaring projectiles.

name: Drmwrldgrl
summary:
Emmett is a regular girl, she lives a regular life and doesn't have many complaints.
Nova is a demon made from ash and bone.
One day they meet.

name: Dreamhaven
summary: Unlock the doors to your wildest dreams with Dreamhaven! Designed by an extraordinary team of junior developers aged 8-14, players will travel, through the imaginations and dreams of the next generation. Interact with AI power npc's that can create open ended conversations.

name: Dreampunk: Virtual Unreality
summary: With EnsureLife's new DR-34MM headset, you will never want to go back. Featuring bleeding edge graphics, crazy action and ear-destroying sound, the unreal world has never felt so real before.

name: Dr. P
summary: Dr. P was developed as part of a project to overcome panic disorder, and you can use VR to face and overcome various situations.

name: Dr. Stone Battle Craft
summary:
A war breaks out between the "Kingdom of Science" and the "Might Empire"!
Collect materials through battles, explore the world, create various items, and defeat your opponents!

name: Drowned Lake
summary: Dredge up the secrets hidden beneath Drowned Lake in this horror fishing adventure. Investigate the dark waters to fish out the truth. Catch evidence. Do not get caught yourself.

name: Dreamshot Fantasia
summary: Dive into a fantastical adventure that combines strategic tile-matching puzzle gameplay with authentic 80s anime charm!

name: Drop Command
summary: The year is 2647. War rages 150 light years from Earth. Pilot Mechs, Tanks, Infantry and Aircraft in combined arms combat on many worlds across the star cluster. Play as a lone wolf, or rise in rank to manage and lead entire battalions into combat throughout a procedural campaign.

name: Drums Rock: Simple Plan Music Pack
summary:
Unleash the power of music with our Simple Plan Music Pack! Experience our latest exclusive bundle featuring an epic collection of songs from iconic bands like Simple Plan. Dive into Simple Plan Music Pack and upgrade your gameplay now!

Content of the Bundle:
- "Welcome to My Life" - Simple Plan
- "Shut Up!" - Simple Plan
- "Crazy" - Simple Plan
- "Time to Say Goodbye" - Simple Plan

name: Drakheir
summary:
An evil dragon has emerged, plunging the world into chaos. But have no fear, a valiant hero is needed, and that hero could be YOU! Dive into a mystical journey as Drakheir calls upon you!
In this exciting adventure, your hands become powerful weapons – forget those controllers, as you wield magic with your very fingertips! Embark on a mission to rescue the world, and conquer adversaries in an epic quest. Explore enchanting realms, master magical skills, and rise to the occasion through countless challenges and adventures.

name: Dream Sketcher: The Lost Opera
summary: This DLC includes 1 new script The Lost Opera, 1 new investigator "Mercenary" Diana, and 30 new cards.

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero
summary: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero takes the legendary gameplay of the Budokai Tenkaichi series and raises it to whole new levels. Make yours the destructive power of the strongest fighters ever to appear in Dragon Ball!

name: Dragon Shelter
summary: Dragon Shelter is a farm sim set in a fantasy world. Take on the role of a hero who will revive the long-lost friendship between humans and dragons. Take care of wondrous creatures, explore the magical world, and restore destroyed biomes!

name: Drunk as I Like: Gensokyo Drinking Attitude
Driving Homeicide
summary: Driving Home(icide) is a focused and humorous single-player driving experience as you, the self-driving AI, must deliver your increasingly inebriated and distracting owner for their night on the town. Survive the increasingly difficult levels as your owner ramps up their 'help' and deliver them home in once piece.

name: Dreamblood
summary: An episodic WAD for the 2020 Doom 64 remaster by HeadshotTAS featuring large, dynamic maps and challenging combat. Its first episode received one of the 2023 Cacowards.

name: Drift 'n' Burn 365
summary: Citizens of the future: start your engines and scream down tracks suspended high above earth's toxic ground. Choose your course, choose your car, and race towards victory with your head in the clouds. Hit your brakes on the corners to drift and earn nitro boosts, then burn by your opponents to collect the car of the day!

name: Drift 'n' Burn 2: My Racer
summary: Drift 'n' Burn racing returns to the skies for a fully customizable battle every day! Build your own custom track to save and send to your friends. Choose a setting, add every curve and bend, then up the ante with loops, banks, and jumps! Play the Daily Challenge and unlock custom parts to enhance the look and performance of your car. Earn more powerful weapons to blow your opponents sky high in Battle mode, and drift into turns to earn nitro boosts so you can blast by your rivals. Satisfy your need for speed when you play today - and tomorrow!

name: Drift 'n' Burn 3: World Tour
summary: Ready? Set? Race across the world in a bid to collect 100 cars in 100 days! Each day is a new race in one of 20 cities around the globe. Choose your track and speed to the finish against 4 opponents, drifting around corners and hitting the nitro to feel the burn.

name: Draco D
summary: Draco D, a casual dragon arcade game where players soar through enchanting levels, unleashing unique breath weapons and collecting magical power-ups to conquer foes. Maneuver through perilous obstacles, defeat monsters for rewards, and aim for high scores in this exhilarating quest.

name: Dreams of Saturn
summary: Dreams of Saturn is a Shenmue Xmas fan game from George Kitchen. The game features around 10-15 hours worth of content in the form of a short Shenmue story, taking place before and after the events of the original Shenmue, along with a wide variety of mini-games, achievements and more.

name: Dream Island: A Skyward Journey
summary: Master tricky jumps, outwit prowling lions, and conquer a challenging world across two distinct islands!

name: Dragon Court
summary: Dragon Court was a fantasy-themed browser RPG in a medieval setting, which players navigated through simple text descriptions and visuals. The game distinguished itself by its turn-based combat and the imposed daily limit on turns. Adventures involved battling a variety of creatures, with each victory earning them resources and experience to bring them one step closer to reaching the dragon.

name: Drift Shooter
summary: Drift Shooter is an arcade game. Players control a graphic with a car control feel and collect multiple types of weapons in the scene. By combining and using such skills, they can attack waves of enemies.

name: Dragon Ball Terraria
summary: Dragon Ball Terraria is a mod that adds several aspects from the Dragon Ball series to Terraria, including transformations, items, bosses, and a new ki system.

name: Dr. Black Jack
summary: Dr. Black Jack is a computer game featured in the Microsoft Entertainment Pack for Windows. It is based on the popular card game Blackjack (aka Pontoon, 21 etc.). The minimum bet is 10 points per deal.

name: Dr Ludwig and the Devil
summary:
Join esteemed mad scientist Dr Ludwig as he faces the greatest challenge of his nefarious career: making a deal with the Devil and coming out on top.

Research demonology! Read legal documents! Face off against the world's least effective torch and pitchfork-wielding mob! All this and more!

name: Dragon City X Shitei
summary: An erotic game about a man who is taken to a fantasy world full of women.

name: Dragon Eyes
summary: Dragon Eyes is a "space opera" kind of story, focusing on a young girl named Ines, who lives on the planet Miu of the Phi Sun. She grew up together with a space agent named Klind, to whom she refers as "brother". One day, her superior from the planet Garudoria informs her that Klind has disappeared during one of his missions and might be in danger. Ines travels to Garudoria to find additional information, and soon becomes involved in a vast space conflict... Dragon Eyes plays like a traditional Japanese adventure, with commands such as Examine, Talk, Think, and Move appearing on every screen. Choosing one of those commands usually leads into a sub-menu of objects. There is also limited usage of items, which is sometimes required in order to advance in the game.

name: Dross Adventure
summary: It is the current era, in our current galaxy. We hear the dull sound of space, we perceive beams of light in the distance that draw constellations on a dark spatial background. Being conscious witnesses of the magnitude of our planet and what we really are in comparison with the rest of the universe, but we only find one more overwhelming sensation, and that is that somewhere , Dr. Cojona has something prepared for the world

name: Dragon's Lair
summary:
A homebrew port of the Coleco Adam Dragon's Lair game to the Colecovision

All the action of the arcade game in your living room! This special adaptation brings home all the excitement of the legendary arcade game and gives you even more control over the action! Lead Dirk the Daring on his quest to rescue beautiful Princess Daphne, who's been imprisoned in a crystal ball by the evil dragon. To complete this noble mission, you'll need courage and quick reflexes! Fend off supernatural forces with your sword or use your wits to escape. Swing on a rope over fiery chasms. Fight fierce battles with the dreaded Phantom Knight and cunning rat guards. Find a way to survive and you'll take on the most deadly foe of all, the diabolical dragon himself!

name: Dream Tube
summary:
// Double click on choices in menus to progress. //

Are you comfortable? Okay, I'm going to begin the procedure now. Please count back from ten, you may feel some discomfort.

A Domino game by Sorrowful Maiden and Australian Dave

Sell your dreams to a corporation for extra money.

name: Drakomon
summary: Drakomon is a mobile-exclusive, Pokemon-like, creature collection JPRG from GAMEDEV Sarl originally released in 2017. Set in the 3D world of Dragonia, battle, catch, train, and evolve unique Drakomon creatures.

name: Dragon Ball Super: Card Game - Fusion World
summary:
Welcome to DRAGON BALL SUPER CARD GAME FUSION WORLD, where you can battle using the warriors from DRAGON BALL!
Make super-powered attacks using Battle Card combos, and accelerate the battle by awakening your Leader Card!

name: Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince - Mighty Meat Platter
Dreamslayer
summary: Dreamslayer is an epic fantasy first-person hack’n’zap swarm arena game with retro styling. Defend your world from a Demon invasion from beyond the stars.

name: Drop It
summary: Drop It: Stack a delectable fruit platter! Combine fruits strategically for higher scores, but beware of the limited space. How many fruits can you fit before it spills out over the edge? Retry for a fresh shot at the High Score! Ready to taste victory? Drop in now and see how high you can stack!

name: Drac is Back
summary: Spreadsheet RPG in which you hunt down the famous Count and other creatures of the night in Dracula's Castle.

name: Driveland
summary: In a peaceful world bathed in beautiful sunsets, find your place among the bad boys. Engage in missions and enjoy a vast selection of cars among your friends. However, don't forget to relax, have fun, and forge your path into adventure.

name: Dragon Fate: Cards and Minigames
summary: Dive into a medieval card game of strategy and nostalgia. Build decks, harness elements, and master Mini Games to defeat Elemental Dragons. A blend of skill, luck, and strategy awaits!

name: Drop Racing
summary: The main goal is to play as fast as you can, and the first player to drop all the pieces of the track wins. With space, sci-fi and motorsport aesthetics.

name: DraconG
summary: VR Dragon Rhythm Adventure! Glide through rhythmic skies, chase targets, conquer castles, lead armies, and hatch dragon eggs. Immerse in breathtaking VR landscapes. Master the beat, claim victory!

name: DreaMon World
summary: DreaMon World is a modern virtual pet, RPG, adventure. Enter a realm filled with mysterious creatures called DreaMon. Nurture, train, and evolve your very own DreaMon friend, all while embarking on a journey to find your way home!

name: DriveSafely
summary: Side-scrolling points mini-game.

name: Drone Perspective
summary: Real-time dynamic tactics with the strong focus on squad positioning and collaboration. Connect to the warzone from your home PC and orchestrate modern military operations from the Drone Perspective.

name: Drim
summary: Drim is a short 2D top-down horror exploration RPG rooted in horror that lingers and dark drama, offering half an hour to an hour of gameplay.

name: Dream Medicine
summary:
A small "vent art" game about the world.

Drag anywhere from 1 to 3 ingredients into the bottle to tailor the Dream Medicine to each person.

name: Dream Sketcher: Book of Silence
summary: This DLC includes 1 new script Book of Silence, 1 new investigator "Hound" Leonie, and 30 new cards.

name: Drift Master Simulator 2024: Driving Sim
summary: Where Precision Meets Velocity, Customize Your Ride, Conquer the Roads, and Become the Ultimate Driving Maestro!

name: Drone Delivery Simulator
summary: Take to the skies in "Drone Delivery Simulator," a thrilling single-player game where you start as a humble pizza delivery pilot and rise to master a variety of complex delivery missions.

name: Droste Effect
summary: Explore the peculiar tale of Droste Effect, a captivating 2D puzzle game. Confront the mysterious past of your new home with Alexandra, uncover secrets, and manage your sanity in an intense adventure. Rediscover the power of memories as you dive into a past that will reshape your present.

name: Dreams
summary: A soothing spot the difference game. Each play will result in a difference experience with new differences being shown.

name: Drift Odyssey
summary: Strap in and get drifting around the awesome space city of Driftopia! There are 6 cars to unlock and upgrade to get you even more sideways!

name: Drealegy
summary: Hack and slash demons in the dream world to gain energy and talk to people IRL! Capture hearts smooth talking! Make your Rock band! Explore Rougvania Castle with a mindblowing mix perspective while harvesting energy to become a Rock Star!

name: Dragon Quest II: Luminaries of the Legendary Line
summary: The second entry of Japan's favorite RPG makes it's way to your smartphone!

name: Drift Runners
summary:
Great skiddy flash driving game.
Race round tracks, defeating opponents to unlock further tracks.
But that’s just the beginning. This game is about getting high scores. Anyone can win a race, but can you do it in style?
Get points for hitting things, destroying things, and skidding. Drift through groups of objects for big score multipliers (and lots of fun).
Collect coins to upgrade your vehicle in the shop.
The game keeps track of your best times and total scores etc. You build up your high score by totalling all your scores on each level.

name: Drifted
summary: A paper airplane ventures into a vast world of darkness. DRIFTED (working title) is a narrative driven platformer.

name: Drop Mahjong Tiles
summary:
Drop Mahjong Tiles is a puzzle game on PC.

The actual mahjong score will be the score. The falling mahjong tiles (hai) are completely random, and like mahjong, there are only four identical tiles. It is not a competitive style and there is no time limit, so you can enjoy it at your own pace while thinking carefully.

Dreadsite Survival

DRAGON BALL FighterZ is born from what makes the DRAGON BALL series so loved and famous: endless spectacular fights with its all-powerful fighters.

name: Dragonkin: The Banished

summary: Its a remaster from the original game enhanced and re-mastered in HD, alongside full Trophy and Achievements support, replacing all the original ost and adding Budokai Tenkaichi series soundtrack.

Based on real events, the game tells the story of one of the largest workers' villages called Amaury Village, which was flooded by the waters of the artificial lake Paranoá.

Immerse in rich lore, landscapes, and battles against darkness. Unleash the Dragona within and rise in this dark fantasy adventure. Bartan's fate awaits.

DrawBall includes over 30 in built levels and a level editor so you can create and export your own levels and even import levels made by others!

The swift drop of piece challenges your breadth of attention and quick reflexes, demanding a sharp mind for effective handling. The game contributes to the development of spatial and language intelligence as well.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 3 - Collector's Edition
summary: The European "Collector's Edition" version of Budokai 3 was released in Fall 2005. Months before, the hype began to build that it would include not only the option to select the Japanese vocal track for the characters in the game, but that the Japanese version's extras would also be available for unlocking. The Platinum Version is identical to the Collector's Edition. The "Baba Crystal Ball Movies" are also available on this version after extensive game play. Several forums have posted the process needed to gain these capsules, which can be bought in the capsule store. However, the content of the movies are simply the original Japanese introduction to Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 2. One clip is the intro with vocal accompaniment while the second clip is the instrumental version of the intro

name: Dream Sports Platform

Progress through levels, shape your character, and unlock rewards that bridge the gap between virtual triumphs and real-world football services.

name: Dragon x Dragon
summary:
The second RPG of the Dragon series!
The long-awaited second installment of the popular Dragon Team Project "Dragon Tower" has appeared. " Dragon x Dragon" is a full-scale training RPG. The stage is a virtual world with the image of medieval Northern Europe, and it is a story that a boy (Willow), a dragon messenger family, grows up with his dragon (Kermes) in order to defeat the dark dragon Genesis, which has thrown the world in chaos. The protagonist's childhood friend and pharmacist apprentice girl (Narin) will cooperate with the growth of the dragon. You can play infinitely in the field dungeon with the automatic generation method.
Features and rules of "Dragon x Dragon"
"Dragon x Dragon" consists of three elements: battle, preparation, and training. The level in this game means the experience value (strength correction in battle) for each dungeon exploration. If you lose the battle or return, the level will return from 1. In addition, by "nurturing" the dragon (Kermes) with a medicine made by "conconsulation", it will increase its status (HP, speed, attack, defense) and gradually grow stronger and stronger.

name: Dragon x Dragon DX
summary: You can enjoy "Dragon x Dragon" with brilliant graphics and sound unique to the 5x series.

name: Dragon x Dragon: Complete Version
summary: Finally, a complete version with all the initial concepts of "Dragon x Dragon" is now available. In the full version, in addition to beautiful graphics, we realized the addition of a new mini-game floor, the upgrade of the combat system such as the increase of normal attacks that have been one type until now to 3 types by training, and the addition of "smartness" to the training status. I did. You can enjoy the world of "Dragon x Dragon" more deeply through the fun of advancing the adventure while solving the mystery and the active battle scene.

Popular nurturing RPG has become a top and bottom volume app and power up!
The stage is the world 20 years after the previous work "Dragon x Dragon". The main character is Adek, a 15-year-old daughter born to Willow and Narin, who were boys in the first installment. The adventure begins when Adek, along with his dragon "Lily", leaves for the ruins in search of his missing father and Kermes.

name: Dragon x Dragon 2 Complete Version
summary: In addition to beautiful graphics, the mini-game floor is further enhanced, and the original version of the distribution in other carriers includes scenarios, episodes, productions, and emotional expressions cut for the convenience of capacity, and the details are enriched. There is. Strengthening the production of the battle system, and while inheriting the "nurturing limit system" which is a feature of the Dragon X Dragon 2 original version (50KB version), it is also possible to "grow by experience". The appearance of the new character Nahot tribe who gives items, and other elements after clearing the temple are also fully packed. You can enjoy the world of "dragon x dragon" more deeply through the fun of advancing the adventure while solving the mystery and the active battle scene. " In "Dragon x Dragon 2 Complete Version", the final boss character "2nd form" will appear, which did not appear in the original version.

It is the first fighting game to feature full 3D battles similar to the Budokai Tenkaichi series. Fighters can traverse the levels free-roaming in large spaces and can fight on ground, in the air and underwater. The game features spoken dialogue from a majority of main characters while in battle, and characters show facial expressions when they strike an opponent or take damage. Although limited, the players have some freedom to explore the planet Earth as it exists in the Dragon Ball universe along with a handful of other locations.

name: Drone Adventure
summary: Drone, Guns, Open World, GPL3

name: Dream Frontier
summary:
Basil, Lavender, and Poppy are psychic friends on a quest to heal the divide between the normal world and the Dream Frontier. In this early adventure they travel to a small mountain village, meet strange characters, and solve the mystery of the Light from Prism Peak.

Dream Frontier is a turn-based role playing game inspired by Earthbound and 90’s SquareSoft RPGs. Players control a party of three characters, explore a colorful overworld, talk with characters in directed cutscenes, and engage with enemies in a simple combat system.
Encounters!

Encounter gameplay sticks to the basics of the genre with a few twists. Health is a “rolling counter” that doesn’t change instantly, giving the player time to act during a turn before it is drained. Each character has their own specialization and abilities that encourage varied play styles along with a unique Encore. The Encore system lets the characters build energy over an encounter and unleash a large psychic power.

name: Dr. Gloom’s Lab
summary: Embark on a heart-pounding horror survival shooting experience. Unravel the mysteries as Jaxon Blair in Dr. Gloom's sinister lab. With its immersive atmosphere, pulse-pounding first-person action and twisted narrative, this solo-developed masterpiece keeps you on the edge until the end.

name: Droid Wars

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Future Saga: Chapter 1

Try not to damage your 4x4 Drone on Endless Tough tracks.

3D Drone Flight Simulator game is not the most ordinary flight simulator around normally you get to fly with different planes in these kinds of games.. Fly your drone around a big city. Make use of the simple but very effective controls. This spy drone driving will also give a new tide to all flying simulators or airplane simulator. Enemies took a control on your army air base camp in these types of drone games.
