summary: Dreamians: Card Battle is a Roguelike Deckbuilder with creatures that can evolve and change the course of battles unexpectedly. Play with one of the 3 main characters and face epic battles using over a hundred cards to save the dream world.

name: Dragon's Chronicles
summary: This game is for maniacs who are no longer satisfied with the conventional difficulty level.

name: Dragon Buurrp!
summary:
From the olden days, the Great Dragons needed three things.
Treasures, princesses and, above all else… a super awesome tower!
Led by instinct, our newborn baby dragon set out to find a perfect tower for himself.
But the vile monsters of the tower dungeon were anticipating the dragon’s arrival…
Join our cuddly baby dragon for an adventure to conquer the tower!

name: Dredge: The Iron Rig
summary: Gather, craft and deliver your way through the mysteries of The Iron Rig, revisiting areas from Dredge to investigate ancient disturbances stirring in the deep. Assist the Ironhaven Corporation in constructing facilities that unlock items, gadgets and more, but what are they truly here for?

name: Draconic Resurgence
summary: Dragonic Resurgence is a metroidvania where you have to explore different locations, collect upgrades and fight different bosses.

name: Dream Land
summary: On an unknown planet, harnessing all resources, conquering formidable foes, choose your own destiny.

name: DragonMirrored with Hyoga & Magma
summary: The two dragons, the main characters, move symmetrically during the puzzle as if they are mirror images of each other. Over 300 puzzles appear in the game. As the game progresses, various gimmicks appear one after another.

name: Drifto: Infinite Touge
summary: No campaign, no cutscenes, just beautifully simple scenery and a whole lot of tyre smoke. How far can you get?

name: Druid
summary: Games created by people with disabilities that can be played by people with disabilities. ARPG like RTS. No double-clicking, no right-clicking, no wheel, just one click. In the Town, click on the right border to move the map. You can select multiple characters by dragging them.

name: Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake
summary: DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake will continue the classic RPG trilogy’s narrative, offering players two adventures to undertake in DRAGON QUEST I and DRAGON QUEST II.

name: Dream City
summary: It is a casual jumping game full of festive atmosphere, with a warm and cute Christmas themed screen design.

name: Dreams of Sand
summary: Solve block-based puzzles, manipulate time, wander through Reverie's dreams in the sand - relive and choose how they recount their life's memories just so.

name: Drifter
summary: Drifter is an immersive, dialogue-driven first person experience with psychedelically dazzling lo-fi environments and effects. Interact via branching dialogue and explore surreal environments in this compacted, narrative-led adventure.

name: Dragon Age II: Ultimate Edition
summary: You are Hawke, a refugee seeking to escape the darkspawn-plagued land of Ferelden and become Champion of Kirkwall. Rise to power and fight epic battles while making decisions that determine the course of civilization.

name: Dream Gen
summary: Build your dreams in this polyrhythm designer. Dream Gen is all about crafting relaxing or chaotic melodies, which can be played out for hours on end.

name: Dragon Ball Xenoverse: Movie Costume Pack
summary:
Extend your experience in the unique universe of Dragon Ball Xenoverse with Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F' Costumes.
-Whis Symbol Gi
-Whis Symbol Battle Suit
-SSGSS Goku Wig

name: Drums Rock: Pantera x Disturbed Music Pack
summary:
Tracklist of this bundle:
"Down with the Sickness" - Disturbed
"Ten Thousand Fists" - Disturbed
"Walk" - Pantera
"5 Minutes Alone" - Pantera

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Ultimate Edition
summary:
DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO takes the legendary gameplay of the Budokai Tenkaichi series and raises it to whole new levels. Learn and master an incredible roster of playable characters, each with signature abilities, transformations, and techniques. Unleash the fighting spirit within you and take the fight to arenas that crumble and react to your power as the battle rages on.
The Ultimate Edition includes:

DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO base game disc
Collectible lenticular card with Ultimate Edition upgrade pack voucher
Season Pass - 3 Packs including Dragon Ball Super: SUPER HERO and Dragon Ball DAIMA content that contains more than 20 playable characters.
Season Pass Bonus - Summon Shenron and 3 Days Early Access to the 3 DLC Packs
3 Days Early Access
Ultimate Upgrade Pack - including the following in-game items:
Goku (Super) Costume with Power Pole
Emote Voice Set
2 player card backgrounds
1 customization item that increases a character's fighting ability
Ultimate Edition Bonus - Summon Super Shenron

name: Drill Dozer: Shifting 101
summary: Promotional flash game for Game Freak's forgotten GBA platformer, which doubles as a tutorial for the game's shifting mechanic.

name: Drums of War
summary:
In Drums of War you play the role of a hero-leader. As the campaigns unfold the size of your armies can increase by up to 16 varied units. By participating in battles, all of the units become more experienced while naturally getting stronger. Players have the ability to hire new recruits, buy potions and distribute artifacts obtained in battles between fights. Each unit can be outfitted with one artifact and two potions. In addition to common units the player's army can include up to three unique heroes.

Almost every environment object is interactive – one can chop down a tree, set it on fire, or even turn it into an ally using magic. Each unit has its own action points which can be spent for any action – movements, attacks, spells or active skills. The player can randomly move units during his turn.

The in-game campaign editor lets you create custom campaigns, as a series of linked battles, with story text and customized rewards. You can save these campaigns a single file in order to easily share them.

With each unit the player has to make important tactical and strategic decisions. There is no need to remember a great number of each units properties or make complicated calculations – the player should rely on their personal assessment of the current situation. For most of the actions only one mouse click is enough – directing your army is easy and comfortable!

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Season Pass 2
summary:
Deepen your DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT experience by grabbing Season Pass 2 which includes 3 additional story arcs!

Season Pass 2 Bonus:
• Sea Monster Soup cooking item

name: Drone Racing Genesis
summary:
SEGA Amusements presents you with a brand-new entertainment concept with Drone Racing Genesis. A unique and thrilling racing experience for visitors at FEC’s and arcades. Drone Racing is a rapidly growing sport and a worldwide phenomenon.

The game play is fun and exciting! With the casual and core player in mind, this game is easy to grasp but hard to master. The four race locations are visually stunning and highly immersive. To get a podium finish players must race to the finish line, collect ‘battery charge’ to give their drone a boost and zoom past their rivals.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Legendary Edition
summary:
The Legendary Edition includes:
• Full game
• Season Pass (2 original episodes and a new story arc)
• Season Pass 2 (3 new story arcs)
• 2 Cooking Items that give your character temporary and permanent Stat boosts
• Tao Pai Pai Pillar

Relive the story of Goku and other Z Fighters in DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT! Beyond the epic battles, experience life in the DRAGON BALL Z world as you fight, fish, eat, and train with Goku, Gohan, Vegeta and others. Explore the new areas and adventures as you advance through the story and form powerful bonds with other heroes from the DRAGON BALL Z universe.

• Experience the story of DRAGON BALL Z from epic events to light-hearted side quests, including never-before-seen story moments that answer some burning questions of DRAGON BALL lore for the first time!

• Play through iconic DRAGON BALL Z battles on a scale unlike any other. Fight across vast battlefields with destructible environments and experience epic boss battles against the most iconic foes (Raditz, Frieza, Cell, etc.). Increase your power level through RPG mechanics and rise to the challenge!

• Don’t just fight as Z Fighters. Live like them! Fish, fly, eat, train, and battle your way through the DRAGON BALL Z sagas, making friends and building relationships with a massive cast of DRAGON BALL characters.

name: Dream Warrior
summary: Dream Warrior is a streamlined, retro RPG modeled after the 8-bit classics, but without the filler. Except in this game you are not a great hero. No, you are the town drunk.

name: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy Of Tenkaichi
summary: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy Of Tenkaichi (DBZ: TLOT) is a mod that uses the videogame Dragon Ball Z Budokai Tenkaichi 3 as it's base, created by the youtuber TioMedusin. It includes new characters, transformations, skins, techniques, and stages that can be classic, from Dragon Ball, Z and GT, or new, from Super. New latin spanish voicelines and texts, menus, descriptions for characters, subtitles, and renders are also included here as some extra details. There's also new missions for Ultimate Battle mode. The most notable change it's that now there are more detailed and epic damaged skins, when you recover from an strong attack you will have your clothes very destroyed with almost all characters.

name: Dragon's Dogma II: Dragon's Dogma Music & Sound Collection - Custom Sounds
summary: Change some in-game music and sound effects to those of the original Dragon's Dogma.

name: Drop Pockets
summary: The billiards roguelike. Strategic, physics based combat against Pool Sharks who don't play by the rules. Pocket your balls and clear out your opposition in this chaotic game of pool!

name: Draconia Saga
summary:
The Business and Happiness Manager from the Land of Fire, Kumamon, visits Draconia! The cute bear meets adorable pets, bringing a colorful array of surprises! Travel across the Arcadia continent with Kumamon, collect various specialties, and exchange gifts with him!

In a world where pets and humans live in harmony, you can freely capture various pets, form teams, and explore this fantasy continent with other Dragon Hunters, facing all kinds of challenges.

name: Dreamland Solitaire Bundle
summary: In this bundle you can find all three parts of the magical and exciting solitaire game Dreamland Solitaire!

name: Dragons: The Helmet of the Forkai
summary: Dragons: The Helmet of the Forkai is an adventure game where you play as the little dragon Koni and explore the world of the floating islands!

name: Dras'lia
summary: An RPG with enhanced combat dynamics! QTE, group actions, and more to come! Master the eight classes, and combine powers by equipping two classes simultaneously in combat! Change freely and fine-tune your strategy!

name: Dragon Warrior
summary: In this game, you're transported into a world of challenging puzzles, set against a tranquil blue backdrop.

name: Dream World Adventure
summary: This is a cute and casual Roguelike game. Experience a thrilling journey in the dream world! Those seemingly cute little monsters are actually murderous. Use different weapon props to eliminate groups of enemies and survive.

name: Drunken Dragon
summary: Welcome to the fantasy tavern simulator where you manage resources, cook meals, and serve unique customers. Unlock recipes, upgrade your inn, and keep your tavern clean.

name: Dragon Heartburn
summary: That pizza at lunch was a mistake... Dragon Heartburn is a mix of a top-down shooter and a puzzle game. The dragon gets heartburn in the middle of the workday and needs to get to the infirmary without harming his co-workers!

name: Drums Rock: Green Day - 'Holiday'
summary: Get the track 'Holiday' from Green Day! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 2'.

name: Drums Rock: Disturbed - 'Stricken'
summary: Get the track 'Stricken' from Disturbed! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 2'.

summary: Get the track 'American Idiot' from Green Day! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 2'.

summary: Get the track 'The American Dream Is Killing Me' from Green Day! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 2'.

summary: Get the track 'I'm Gonna Be (500 Miles)' from The Proclaimers! This track is part of the 'Legendary Mix Vol. 2'.

name: Drums Rock: Disturbed - 'Down with the Sickness'
summary: Get the track 'Down with the Sickness' from Disturbed! This track is part of the 'Pantera x Disturbed Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Pantera - '5 Minutes Alone'
summary: Get the track '5 Minutes Alone' from Pantera! This track is part of the 'Pantera x Disturbed Music Pack'.

summary: Get the track 'Ten Thousand Fists' from Disturbed! This track is part of the 'Pantera x Disturbed Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Pantera - 'Walk'
summary: Get the track 'Walk' from Pantera! This track is part of the 'Pantera x Disturbed Music Pack'.

name: Drone Pilot: Extreme Flight Simulator
summary: A realistic drone simulator that will challenge your reaction and alertness skills - welcome to extreme drone racing!

name: Dreamland Arcade
summary: Steven has dreamed up arcade games for all his friends in Dreamland Arcade.

name: DreamyPoems
summary: "Dream Poem" is a casual elimination game, born out of Chinese poetry culture. Like many traditional games, you only need to select the correct words according to the graphics to enjoy the fun of elimination. You don't need a background of cultural knowledge or to learn Chinese characters.

name: Drunken Rogue
summary: The rowdy adventures of drunk-as-a-skunk Rogue Lita and Vampire of Demise Endo! Stagger around traps and stumble through demon assaults. Make your way to the dungeon's deepest depths—rumored to contain the most precious of booze!

name: Dreamtone
summary: Dreamtone is a traditional RPG, set in a whimsical pastiche of the American 1980s!

name: Dr. Bloodshot
summary: Dr. Bloodshot is a short survival horror game. It's set in an old mansion filled with monsters that the player has to avoid (either by running away or by hiding in cabinets). The objective is to reach the well secured laboratory of Dr. Bloodshot, which can be done by sabotaging various power stations across the mansion.

name: Drone 'em All
summary: Drone 'em All is a cartoonish arcade rogue-like with a pinch of satire. Fly your drone, kill nasty Zorks and free the invaded country of Braveland. Upgrade drones, eliminate mini bosses and explore the dramatic stories of local residents.

name: Dragon Daughter
summary: Aurora is a famous healer who lives in a place known as the boathouse and hides a dangerous past that comes back to haunt her. As the last of her kind, Aurora is being hunted and now so is her daughter Alma. To survive, she will need to master her powers and fight for those she loves.

name: Drop Cooking
summary: Drop Foods into the Pot and Cook the Dishes! In this exciting game, drop foods into the pot and create delicious dishes! When the necessary foods for a recipe come into contact, they attach together, and when all the required foods are combined, the dish is complete.

name: Drive Out
summary: Drive out is a horror game for up to four players in online co-op. As a member of a Ghost Exorcism Agency, accept commissions and, together with friends, travel to various locations to investigate, find ghosts, and exorcise them.

name: DreamWorld
summary: The Infinite Sandbox MMO. For Builders, By Builders. Explore an infinite world with all your friends on one server. Build unbelievable structures using advanced building tools like volumetric selection and copy/paste. Battle bosses and mobs, farm, craft and more in DreamWorld.

name: Dropped into the Modern World: Surviving the Red-Light District
summary: After an attack by a monster, the sorceress Daiya suddenly gets teleported to modern-world Kabukicho! Without a home and all alone, she gets offered shelter by a person named XiaoHong. With their help, Daiya is able to start a new life, but can she return to her home world…?

name: Drift 'N' Thrift
summary: Drift 'N' Thrift is an arcade game where you drift away from police while collecting gold and coins.

name: Driver's Dread!
summary: Help Draculaura get her driver's license.

name: Dragon Forge
summary: Unleash the deadly force of the dragon! Fight archers with bow and arrow, and mages with powerful magic! Earn upgrades and bring entire castles crashing to the ground! With awesome 3D, Hi-Def graphics, and killer goth-rock soundtrack. Dare you unleash the dragon!

name: Dragon Clicker
summary: Every click changes the color of your dragon, collect drops every 3 hours!

name: DreamCatcher
summary: A remake of One Dreamy Night as a more straightforward Yume Nikki fangame. Made for Dream Diary Jam 8

name: Dreaming Network
summary:
A traditional Yume Nikki fangame where you play as a robot stuck in an abandoned facility, left to wander through digital worlds.

Created for Dream Diary Jam 8

name: Dragon Kingdom
summary: Explore math skills as you battle sinister storm clouds with dragons Luna and Ash!

name: Dragon Quest XI: Echoes of an Elusive Age S - Ultimate Edition
Dragon Quest VIII: Journey of the Cursed King - Mobile Remaster
Dr Dokkoy
summary:
I escaped from the spaceship and returned to the earth.
Apparently, some experiments seem to have been done here.

name: Dredge: Complete Edition
summary: Dredge is a critically acclaimed single-player fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. Dredge: Complete Edition nets together the base game and its three DLC packs.

name: Dragon Quest Fushigi no Dungeon MOBILE
summary: It is a mobile phone app game, and versions were distributed for i-mode, EZweb, and Yahoo! Mobile. Like Dragon Quest: Young Yangus to Fushigi no Dungeon, the protagonist is Yangus as a young boy, but the content is completely different.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Legend of Z RPG
summary: A fan-made Dragon Ball Z RPG Maker 2003 fan game that takes place from Saiyan-Buu Saga with some 'GT' and 'Super' content afterward.

name: Dragon Ball Gekishin Squadra
summary: “This brand‑new title is a battle arena game that will divide players into teams of four and have them fight it out! You can take part in exhilarating battles where you overwhelm your opponents and enjoy amazing teamwork with your allies!

name: Dreamlike Love with Seira
summary: Enjoy the memories with a beautiful maid in your dreams and heal your fatigue in reality.

name: Drömmar
summary: Drömmar is a map based on images from Astar's dreams related to doom.

name: Droplet
summary: A platform game where you control Droplets.

name: Dredge: Expansion Bundle
summary: Dredge is a single-player fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. The Dredge: Expansion Bundle nets together two expansion packs: The Pale Reach and The Iron Rig.

name: Drags Tavern
summary: A 2D Bullet hell MMO with open world to level up and dungeon to complete, A lot of loot to be Achived

name: Dragon Court: Revived
summary: Dragon Court was originally a game released around 1997 as a Java Applet, but became abandonware around 2017. By using Internet Archive's Wayback Machine, much of the game was salvaged, and through the use of cheerpj framework, it was brought back to life for modern browsers.

name: Dreamlike Love with Seira
summary: Enjoy the memories with a beautiful maid in your dreams and heal your fatigue in reality.

name: Driving Is Hard
summary: Help Jeff to drive in his bathtub car in Driving Is Hard, a precision-based driving adventure game.

name: Dragon Spirits 2
summary: In this modern urban-themed RPG, you can collect nearly a hundred different dragon spirits, experiment with skill setups, assemble teams, and devise strategies to build your dragon spirit squad. Adventure through the virtual spaces in Metapolis, and uncover the conspiracy behind it all.

name: Drift Master Simulator 2024: Driving Sim - Premium Edition
Drift Master Simulator
summary: Prepare to dominate the drift scene in Drift Master Simulator! Embark on your journey as a street drifter, where you'll begin by selecting your first car from iconic options in the USA, Japan, or Germany. With hard work, dedication, and skillful drifting, ascend through the ranks to claim your place as a top drifter. Feel the adrenaline as you master the art of controlled slides and perfect your technique on challenging tracks.

name: Drag Racing Professionals: Dirt Mechanic Simulator
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of adrenaline, speed, and drag racing mechanics on the quarter-mile with "Drag Racing Professionals: Dirt Mechanic Simulator." Become a master of drag racing, working in the atmosphere of gritty tracks and thrilling competitions.

name: Dream Enkoure
summary: A not so simple platformer where you go from left to right.

name: DreamShock
summary: Blast through nightmares, come dreams or reality!

name: Drift Master Simulator 2024: Rich Racer DLC
Drone Simulator VR
summary: Delivers a realistic VR drone flying experience for both beginners and seasoned pilots. The simulation features accurate flight dynamics, with three control modes and flight modes like Tripod, Position, and Sport. Players can explore various maps, tackle challenges, take photos with adjustable camera settings, and find hidden collectibles. Time trials of varying difficulty allow players to test their skills.

name: Dragon's Brew
summary: Dragon's Brew is a board game cafe simulator! Serve customers while fulfilling takeaway orders and delivery requests and build up your reputation in the vibrant seaside town of Pebblebrook. Source and grow your own ingredients, craft a variety of seasonal recipes, and expand your board game collection. Discover and unlock 100+ board games, each with its own effects and bonuses. Pair them with specific menu items to trigger unique effects and create powerful synergies that enhance your cafe’s operations and profits.

name: Dreamland Farm
summary: After living in a big city your dreams come true – today you start your new life on a peaceful pixel farm!

name: Dream in the Shell
summary:
When a black sphere appears on Earth, countless people become trapped in endless dreams. The protagonist's wife is among them, compelling him to venture into the dangerous sphere to save her.

'Dream in the Shell' is a story adventure game that explores surreal worlds where dreams, memories, and the subconscious blend. Explore mysterious spaces through unique interactions and uncover the truth.

name: Dreams of Joy Departed
summary: A surreal RPG. A tragedy with turn based combat and a hidden morality system.

name: Dread Tomb
summary: Dread Tomb is a multiplayer cooperative horror game based on Chinese folk rumors. You will face a rugged random map environment and terrain construction, adventure in various harsh random weather conditions, and discover a variety of thrilling mechanisms and mysterious monsters waiting for you.

name: Drop Duchy
summary: Build your duchy piece by piece in this refreshing hybrid rogue-lite game. Use block-dropping mechanics to collect resources, recruit troops to fight against belligerent armies, and let every block shape your realm, leading your path to victory!

name: Dragon Takers
summary: "Rise, those who resist the dragons—"

name: Dragon Front: Adventures
summary: A turn-based, deckbuilding roguelike where you take charge of a legendary Champion and build your forces by collecting units, spells, supplies and relics. Explore unique combinations to overwhelm the opposition.

name: Drive Thru Miami
summary: A simulation of running and expanding a drive-thru shop where players take orders, prepare various beverages and foods, manage supplies, and serve customers efficiently.

name: Drown the Bride
summary: Drown the Bride is a point 'n click adventure visual novel game about a young actress who must save her friend from going forward with a bad marriage before it's too late.

name: Drone Attack: Pig Irruption
summary: Drone Attack: Pig Irruption is a fast-paced, action-packed mobile game where players control drones to fend off a mischievous invasion of pigs. Utilize a variety of drones, including the powerful new Combat Mosquito, to strategically destroy waves of pigs. With exciting new features like soul absorption mechanics, quick bomb access, and a revamped interface, this game offers intense fun for those who enjoy tactical challenges and destruction. Join the battle, crush the pig invasion, and watch sunflowers grow where enemies fall!

name: Dr. Priori’s Time Escape
summary: Welcome back to the Curiosity Shop of Dr. A. Priori. Explore the building and unlock rooms full of mysteries. Use time bubbles to change the environment and solve puzzles. Unravel the mystery! Play this first-person puzzle escape room game solo or co-op with up to 4 players.

name: Droian
summary: Meet I.A.N, the Interplanetary Android Navigator, and humanity's last hope. With a heart of steel and unwavering determination, I.A.N is on a mission to navigate the treacherous depths of an distant isolated moon. Armed with advanced technology and a noble purpose, this extraordinary android will guide you through the haunting realms of DROIAN, all while reminding us that the fight to save humanity is a journey we all share.

name: Dreamstate
summary: Dreamstate, can you survive your worst nightmare? In a point-and-click sit-and-survival psychological horror game, you fight off your nightmares throughout multiple nights to make it to the end of the week, with each night getting more challenging.

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO takes the legendary gameplay of the Budokai Tenkaichi series and raises it to whole new levels. Learn and master an incredible roster of playable characters, each with signature abilities, transformations, and techniques. Unleash the fighting spirit within you and take the fight to arenas that crumble and react to your power as the battle rages on.

The Deluxe Edition includes:

• Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO
• Season Pass - 3 Packs including Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero and Dragon Ball Daima content that contains more than 20 playable characters
• Season Pass Bonus - Summon Shenron and 3 Days Early Access to the 3 DLC Packs

name: Dreamless
summary: In a remote provincial town, teenagers mysteriously disappear every 25 years. You're a high school student about to turn 18... But what if you become the next victim?

name: Droom
summary: Droom is a very early 3D escape game originally released by Higo Yoshiyuki in June 2002.

name: Dreadborne Dungeon
summary: Dreadborne Dungeon is a pixel art, retro shooter inspired by old school games like Doom and Heretic, as well as mechanics taken from Souls Like games and dungeon crawlers. Explore dark dungeons, fight enemies and survive in a retro-styled world. Die, draw conclusions and don't give up! Good Luck!

name: Dragon Spirits in Fight
summary: DragonSpiritsINFight is an idle card-building game, serving as a spin-off to Dragon Spirits: Academy Adventures. It boasts a simple interface resembling a regular program and features practical functions like a Pomodoro timer, making it the perfect way to unwind during work breaks.

name: Drosera: Lady Bad End no Hatsukoi
Dreamworks Dragons: Wild Skies
summary: Think you've got what it takes to be a rider of Berk? Put your skills to the test and blaze your own path as a dragon trainer. Explore the island, train wild dragons, and take flight in awesome aerial challenges! Ride the dragons you love from the movies: Gronckle, Deadly Nadder, Monstrous Nightmare, Hideous Zippleback, and Night Fury! Plus, watch for new dragon species from the series. Every time a new dragon appears in the show, you'll be able to train it in the game!

name: Drive Ahead! Carcade
summary:
In Drive Ahead! Carcade, you win by knocking your opponents on the head in cars with just one hit, it’s that simple!

Experience a brand new evolution of the Drive Ahead! world, filled with real time multiplayer chaos and crazy unforgettable moments where anything can happen.

name: DROD: Smitemaster's Selection Expansions 1+2
summary:
Smitemaster's Selections are level expansion packs for DROD. These Caravel-produced level collections add to the official story of DROD with quality writing and voice acting. You will have about a hundred new and unique puzzles to solve in each Smitemaster's Selection bundle.

Expansions 1+2 contain these episodes:

Perfection
The Choice

Finding the First Truth
Flood Warning

name: DROD: Smitemaster's Selection Expansion 13 - Treacle Stew
summary:
Smitemaster's Selections are level expansion packs for DROD. These Caravel-produced level collections add to the official story of DROD with quality writing and voice acting. You will have about a hundred new and unique puzzles to solve in each Smitemaster's Selection bundle.

Expansion 13 contains the episode Treacle Stew.

name: Dreadway
summary: A co-op horror about surviving a nuclear apocalypse as a small group of people on a train, scavenging for various scrap to upgrade the train.

name: Dragon Age: The Veilguard - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Obtain a variety of weapons and armor, including curiosities from a forgotten era with the Deluxe Edition. You’ll receive weapon and armor sets for the Warrior, Mage, and Rogue classes as well as armor sets and weapons for each of your 7 companions. That’s 3 armor sets for Rook, 6 weapons for Rook, 7 companion armor sets, and 7 companion weapons – saving Thedas never looked so good.

• 6 Weapon Appearances For Rook. Cosmetic Only.
• 1 Warrior Armor Set Appearance For Rook. Cosmetic Only.
• 1 Mage Armor Set Appearance For Rook. Cosmetic Only.
• 1 Rogue Armor Set Appearance For Rook. Cosmetic Only.
• 7 Weapon & 7 Armor Set Appearances For Companions. Cosmetic Only.

Enter the world of Thedas, a vibrant land of wilderness, treacherous labyrinths, and glittering cities – steeped in conflict and magics. Now, a pair of corrupt ancient gods have broken free from centuries of darkness and are hellbent on destroying the world.

Unite the Veilguard and defy the gods in Dragon Age: The Veilguard.

SAVE A BATTERED WORLD
Enter Thedas, a vibrant world of rugged wilderness, treacherous labyrinths and glittering cities. The world is teetering on a knife’s edge while corrupt gods unleash havoc across the continent. Nations war and factions splinter. Who will you trust? From the Arlathan Forest to the back alleys of Minrathous, this is a broken world. Your actions will affect the fate of Thedas forever.

UNITE THE VEILGUARD
Unite a team of seven companions, each with rich lives and deep backstories. These are characters to befriend, and even fall in love with. Among them, an assassin, a necromancer, a detective, each and all bringing their own expertise and unique abilities to the fight. You are never alone, decide who to take into battle and together face down demons, dragons and corrupt gods.

BECOME THE LEADER OTHERS BELIEVE IN
Select from different races and combat classes, customize your appearance, choose your character’s backstory and begin your journey as Rook, Dragon Age’s newest hero. The choice is yours. On your adventures, you’ll gain new abilities and discover unique, powerful artifacts to enhance your own combat style. Brace yourself, there are tough decisions to be made, allies to inspire, and a fight that needs every sword, staff and bow you can muster.

name: Dr. Robotnik's Badnik Quarrel
summary:
Dr. Robotnik's Badnik Quarrel is an ARENA BRAWLER in which up to eight teams battle against each other with characters from the Sonic The Hedgehog series. Each team is given four 'emeralds' that represent badniks that will fight in an arena during each round.

You must win rounds to score points for your team, which are used to purchase upgrades or randomize your badniks so that they have higher strength or health stats, and sometimes gain special fighting abilities that give them a distinct advantage over other monsters in the arena. There are also special mini games between rounds where players on each team must fight each other.

name: Dreamcore95 Idle
summary: Dreamcore inspired incremental game with vaporwave aesthetics

name: Dragon Pet
summary: On the snowy peaks of an ancient mountain you have found a magic dragon egg. All you have to do is to keep it at proper temperature, an it might hatch into a virtual baby pet with whom you can spend wonderful adventures by playing, training and taking care of your cute pet. Train a dragon and become creator of your own saga. Care for him and he will become your best, magic friend or simply ignore him and he will eventually run away, get sick or even die.

name: Drums Rock: Undertale - 'Megalovania'
summary:
Get the track 'Megalovania' from the Undertale game! This track is part of the Undertale DLC.

To gain access to the exclusive Undertale Scene and Skins, you must have the songs MEGALOVANIA and Hopes And Dreams.
Both songs are available through the Undertale DLC Bundle.

summary:

Both songs are available through the Undertale DLC Bundle.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Cell To Kogeki Da
summary: Conversion of the Sega System 32 arcade original Dragon Ball Z: V.R.V.S.. No prototype has surfaced.

name: Draw li
summary: Draw, connect, and master the art of physics in 40 thrilling levels!

name: Dread Days
summary: Become a rebel Webrunner and explore the hazardous, futuristic metropolis of Gorod 01 in search of solution to an unstoppable spider swarm. Walk on walls, manipulate electricity and survive against the deadly Party and its cyborg abominations.

name: Drone World Tour: Flight Simulator
summary: Take part in extreme drone racing and fly around the world in a new realistic drone simulator!

name: Drakengard
summary:
In the mobile version of the PS2 game Drakengard, you control prince Caim, along with the Red Dragon, in a struggle against the imperial forces. Each of the three locations consists of two sequences: side-scrolling fighting with Caim alone, followed by a flight sequence on the back of the dragon. On the ground, Caim's moves include sword combos with a finishing blow, blocking, jumping, a dash attack and a dragon attack. To launch a dragon attack, you have to fill your magic meter with finishing blows. Once complete, you can summon the Red Dragon to attack all enemies on the screen, except for the bosses. Each ground level is followed by a duel against a boss.

During the flight sequences, you control the dragon carrying Caim. You have to take out all incoming enemies and projectiles with fireballs and destructive spells or use the escape move for tricky situations. The game also incorporates some RPG elements: you gain experience by defeating enemies. These points can be used to level up, rendering attacks more powerful and expanding the maximum amount of health. Additional experience points are based on a time bonus and the stage score.

Although the story of the original game is only vaguely mentioned, all missions have an introduction explaining your mission and the setting. There is a high score list and you can upload your score to an online ranking board.

name: Draw N Guess Multiplayer
summary: The objective of Draw N Guess multiplayer game is, one player has to draw the word and the other players should guess the word and vice-versa. A turn based drawing and guessing game mode is also available which helps to express your artistic skills.

name: Drive On Lucy
summary: A simple atmospheric walking (driving) simulator, done in 7 days for LSDJAM 2023. WASD to move, SHIFT to speed up, and that's about it. Go link up some beacons along an abandoned road. Get those asbestos-filtered cigs.

name: Dreamspace
summary: Dreamspace is an atmospheric game about dreams. Explore surreal locations and meet different NPCs. The game contains 17 unique dreams and takes about 30 minutes to complete. The game was made for LSDJam 2023 in 3 months.

name: Dragon Ball Sparking! Zero: Season Pass
summary:
The DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO Season Pass includes 3 DLC Packs for a total of more than 20 playable characters from the Dragon Ball SUPER: SUPER HERO movie and the Dragon Ball DAIMA.

As a Season Pass Bonus, you can summon Shenron to obtain items such as costumes or zeni. Additionally, the Season Pass Bonus also includes 3 days early access to the 3 DLC Packs.

name: Dragon Ball Sparking Zero!: Ultimate Upgrade Pack
summary:
The DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO Ultimate Upgrade Pack includes the following items:
• Goku (Super) Costume with Power Pole
• Emote Voice Set
• 2 player card backgrounds
• 1 customization item that increases a character's fighting ability

name: Drunk Alien
summary: Help this drunk alien find his way back to his spaceship in this challenging adventure!

name: Dread in Deep Voyage
summary: You are a Scuba Machinist, working for the largest Aquatic Theme Park in the world. It is your job to perform maintenance on a long abandoned attraction known as 'Deep Voyage'. Who knows what lurks down there...?

name: Dragon of Calon Valley
summary:
You get a new job in your grandparents old town, they left you their house, and you're meeting beautiful women at every turn...Nothing could possibly go wrong...right?

Except, it does. Sudden painful, debilitating headaches and getting stabbed in the chest by a would-be assassin are hardly a "normal" first couple of days on the job. All the while, your necklace which you've had since your childhood, seems to be acting strangely...

Discover who tried to murder you and stop them from hurting anyone else while navigating relationships with beautiful women who are more than meets the eye.

name: Dragon's Lair II: Time Warp
summary:
Dragon's Lair II: Time Warp, the followup to Don Bluth's arcade classic Dragon's Lair, can now be enjoyed on your PC. This fully arcade authentic version includes all of the original scenes you've come to enjoy, and even the unreleased Director's Cut ending not seen in the arcades. Other bonuses include a full watch feature to sit back and enjoy Don Bluth's stunning animation.

Princess Daphne has been spirited away to a wrinkle in time by the Evil Wizard Mordroc who plans to force her into marriage. Only you, Dirk the Daring, can save her.

Transported by a bumbling old time machine, you begin the rescue mission. But you must hurry, for once the Casket of Doom has opened, Mordroc will place the Death Ring upon Daphne's finger in marriage and she will be lost forever in the Time Warp!

Bonuses Include:
Full Watch Game
Deleted Scene - Pirate Ship Animatic

name: Drug Story: The First Chapters
summary: Follow the story of a young boy who discovers one day that his older brother, Zack, is a drug dealer. He will try to convince him to stop this illegal activity, but it will turn into a big journey filled with battle against criminals. Defeat the Boss of the gang to save your brother, and the town.

name: Drop It! Jelly Man
summary: There's only one reason the Jelly Man goes into the deep end. He just needs a beer. Please join him on his dizzying adventure! To survive, you must fall into the water. Continue down. It won't be visible. Still, don't give up and take the courageous plunge!

name: Dreamland Farm: Stone Fence and Tiles
Drivers of the Apocalypse
summary: Drivers of the Apocalypse is a high-octane action-driving combat game set in a vast, treacherous wasteland. You step into the shoes of Artemis, a junior mercenary working for Thunder Strike Force. Your mission? Stop deadly convoys, defeat powerful bosses, and survive.

name: Druta-Cinta
summary: Druta-Cinta is a relaxing and replayable game to play in your free time that doesn't require your full attention. Time is controlled by the player, and the speed of obstacles matches the player, so take your time in here.

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Collector's Edition
summary:
Shake the earth. Break the heavens. Make yours the destructive power of the strongest fighters ever to appear in DRAGON BALL!
Box contents:
Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero
Metallic Bookmark
Dragon Ball:Sparking! Zero Exclusive Diorama 264 x 174 mm
Digital Content

name: Dragon's Dogma II: Lenticular Edition
summary: Dragon's Dogma is a single player, narrative driven action-RPG that challenges players to choose their own experience – from the appearance of their Arisen, their vocation, their party, how to approach different situations and more.

name: Dracula X: Nocturne In the Moonlight - Ultimate
summary: A mod which enhances the originally Japan-only game with some new features (like fixed sprites and transparency, the inclusion of a hard mode) along with content from other versions, especially the PlayStation version.

name: Draconic Date
summary: By invoking the old Dragon Law, you managed to get your dragon girlfriend out for a date. What will you discover in that old abandoned castle, and what bounds will you forge with Iryl?

name: Dragon Ball Super Divers
summary: Dragon Ball Super Divers is a Japanese arcade game developed by Dimps as the seventh Dragon Ball Z: Data Carddass game.

name: Dreaming Seal Simulator
summary: Dreaming Seal Simulator is a retro-style arcade game where you play as a seal of dreams and you have to calm down each kid that has a bad dream until the in-game time of 6AM - every 500 points can advance you towards that time.

name: Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas: Collector's Edition - Rhyme Time
Dr. Cog
summary: Dr. Cog is a deck-building roguelike game using gears. Operate the memory restoration machine, turn gears, discover and enhance them, and build synergies. Complete the memory restoration within the time limit, recover the client's lost memories, and reach the final chapter.

name: Dragonea
summary:
Dragonea is a free online text-based dragon breeding simulation game. Players take on the role of breeders responsible for caring for virtual dragons, from their hatching to their maturity.

The game offers six dragon species, each with unique characteristics. Players begin by choosing the species, name, and gender of their first dragon, then manage its growth by ensuring its well-being through various activities and interactions.

Dragons can also be bred together to create new species.

name: Dream Home Simulator
summary: Explore a beautifully crafted modern apartment in Dream Home Simulator. Relax and walk through a detailed, fully furnished space, offering a glimpse of your dream home in a peaceful, casual experience.

name: Dream Bar Simulator
summary: Become the Owner of Your Own Dream Bar! Create unique cocktails. Manage bar resources, buy alcohol and consumables. Expand and customize your bar, buy furniture and interior items, create the most comfortable atmosphere for your clients. Hire unique employees.Reach the top of the bar industry.

name: Drive Thru Simulator
summary: Drive Thru is a simulation game that immerses you in the exciting world of fast food restaurant management. Take customer orders, prepare their meals, process payments, and expand your restaurant!

name: Driving Simulator
summary: This game is set in a city of around 18 square kilometers in which the objective is to run people over and cause as much chaos as you can.

name: Drunk Builder Simulator
summary: A construction simulator where one of the players plays the role of a foreman who has to catch drunk players. And the rest of the drunk players have to run, hide and search for alcohol on the construction site to survive.

name: Dreams of Saturn 2.0
summary:
Inspired by Shenmue, this brand-new edition of Dreams of Saturn features an entirely new chapter that takes Ryo to Yokosuka Harbor for another fun-filled Christmas story! Packed with SEGA references and Easter eggs, including the legendary Segata Sanshiro, and follow the tale of Santa Maeno as he embarks on a mission to save Christmas for the residents of Yokosuka!

This release includes both Dreams of Saturn 1 and 2.0 as one full game, allowing you to select a starting point depending on if you are playing the entire game fresh or for the first time, or already experienced Dreams of Saturn 1 and wanted to jump straight ahead to the 2nd chapter.

name: Dream League Soccer 2024
summary: Dream League Soccer 2024 puts you in the heart of the action with a fresh look and brand new features! Build your dream team from over 4,000 FIFPro licensed players and take to the field against the world’s best soccer clubs! Rise through 8 divisions whilst enjoying full 3D motion-captured player moves, immersive in-game commentary, team customisations and much more. The beautiful game has never been so good!

name: Dreeg
summary: Dreeg is a dimension shifting platforming adventure game where you move between 3 parallel dimensions at will to solve puzzles and take on robotic enemies. Customize Dreeg's armor to gain power and unlock new abilities and upgrades for your energy weapon system as you take on the psychotic Xel'xan.

name: Drift.io
summary: Drift.io is a free-to-play, multiplayer racing game that runs in your browser.

name: Drive Me Crazy
summary: "Drive me crazy" is a game inspired by the urban legend "Yua Mikami's wedding and retirement event." You play as her fiancé, qiangzi, in this interactive adventure. During the game, you will be asked one question: "With Yua Mikami by your side, would you still have a change of heart?"

name: Drizzlepath: Picturae
summary: Have you ever wandered inside images? Images that blow your soul away? In Drizzlepath: Picturae, you embark on a journey of gorgeous landscapes. While some of these landscapes melt your heart, some will give you the chills.

name: Droplets
summary: Send the droplets spiralling into high score zones to unlock further challenges.

name: Dragons vs. Balloons TD
summary: Defend your kingdom with powerful dragons and crush waves of balloons

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Future Saga: Chapter 2
summary: The second chapter in the FUTURE SAGA series depicts an unprecedented alteration of history! Includes new Playable Characters, new Extra Missions, Parallel Quests, Additional Moves, and Costumes!

name: Dragon Ball Z Life
summary: Dragon Ball Z Life is a Web RPG game, that is, an idle roleplaying game for browser, you play through the browser of your choice on the platform you want

name: Dream Team Supreme
summary: Pilot a giant robot against a horde of monsters in this co-op roguelike deckbuilder. Attempt each proc-gen run alone or with a friend. Draw from and build up 2 decks at the same time, plan the sequence of each turn, and plug in the best mods. You'll need a big brain, or two, to prevent the invasion!

name: Dragonsweeper
summary: A minesweeper game that requires observation by mixing roguelike elements with the classic gameplay.

name: Dragon Ruins II
summary: An indie dungeon crawler inspired by late 80s and early 90s CRPGs.

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Hero of Justice Pack
summary:
DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO HERO OF JUSTICE Pack contains the following contents from the Dragon Ball SUPER: SUPER HERO movie.

- 11 Playable Characters:
• Gohan, Superhero
• Gohan, Superhero Super Saiyan
• Ultimate Gohan, Superhero
• Gohan Beast
• Piccolo, Superhero
• Piccolo, Potential Unleashed
• Orange Piccolo
• Orange Piccolo, Giant Form
• Gamma 1
• Gamma 2
• Cell Max

- New Costume:
• Piccolo, Superhero
This is the costume Piccolo wears when infiltrating the Red Ribbon Army base in Dragon Ball SUPER: SUPER HERO.

- 3 Bonus Battles

Experience the intense battles from the Dragon Ball SUPER: SUPER HERO movie in custom battles, including the fierce fight between Piccolo and Gamma 2, the epic showdown between Gohan and Gamma 1, and the thrilling battle where Gohan and Piccolo face off against Cell Max.

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Dragon Ball Daima: Character Pack 1
summary:
New warriors from the Dragon Ball DAIMA anime series join the battle!

- 8 Playable Characters:
• Goku (Mini), Super Saiyan
• Vegeta (Mini)
• Vegeta (Mini), Super Saiyan
• Vegeta (Mini), Super Saiyan 2
• Vegeta (Mini), Super Saiyan 3
• Glorio
• Panzy
• Majin Kuu

‐ Goku (Mini) Technique-changing Outfit
• New costume for Goku (Mini) that changes his moves

Get the Dragon Ball DAIMA: Character Pack 1 and enjoy new battles!

*Goku (Mini) Technique-changing Outfit is different from Pre-Order Pack Goku (Mini).
*Ownership of Pre-Order Pack Goku (Mini) is not required.
*Equipping the Goku (Mini) Technique-changing Outfit costume on Goku (Mini) will not alter his appearance.
*Equipping the Goku (Mini) Technique-changing Outfit costume on Goku (Mini) will transform his Ultimate Blast into Aura Impact.

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Dragon Ball Daima: Character Pack 2
summary:
New warriors from the Dragon Ball DAIMA anime series join the battle!

- 6 Playable Characters:
• Goku (Mini), Super Saiyan 4
• Goku (DAIMA), Super Saiyan 4
• Vegeta (DAIMA), Super Saiyan 3
• Majin Duu
• Third Eye Gomah
• Giant Gomah

Get the Dragon Ball DAIMA: Character Pack 2 and enjoy new battles!

name: Dragon Fighter
summary: An unauthorized PC port of Dragon Quest that was released by the Taiwanese Jingxun Magazine under the name "Kingformation Co." This version is said to be developed and translated from scratch by two university students and given to Jingxun for distribution in their magazine.

name: Dragon Fighter II
summary: An unauthorized port of Dragon Quest 2 for the PC by Kingformation Co.

name: Dragon Fighter III
summary: An unauthorized port of Dragon Quest 3 for PC.

name: Draw a Perfect Circle
summary: A game that tests your circle drawing skills. Try to draw a perfect circle and see how close you can get.

name: Dragontwin
summary: Dragontwin is an upcoming open-world RPG/Strategy game in which the player shapes their own destiny as a Dragontwin, a legendary mortal soulbound to a powerful dragon.

name: Driftwave
summary: Ambient Bounce-em-up Action!

name: DreamEscape
summary: DreamEscape is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame where you get into Max's mind and explore his dreams and find out about him and his life.

name: Drumguy
summary: Become a drummer on your quest for glory in this thrilling rhythm action game ! Explore BOP CITY and make your way to ROCKSTAR Studios. Fight back against mobs of unhinged fans and fearsome enemies, while synchronizing every hits to the beat !

name: Drone Sector
summary: Drone Sector is a futuristic gunship game. Provide close air support by firing variety of weapons at the enemies and guide your allied troops via commands. Keep your troops alive, complete objectives, collect resources and recruit engineers. Research better weaponry for the gunship and the troops.

name: Dream Cage
summary: Robert battles early Alzheimer's and nightly sleep paralysis. Each night reveals fragments of his past. Uncover the truth and help him solve the mysteries haunting his mind.

name: Dragon Ball Sparking Zero: Pre-order Pack
summary:
The Pre-Order Pack includes the following content for DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO:
- Exclusive new playable character:
• Goku (Mini)
- Early unlock of the following six characters:
• Gogeta
• Gogeta, Super Saiyan
• Gogeta, Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan
• Broly
• Broly, Super Saiyan
• Broly, Super Saiyan (Full Power)

*Goku (Mini) voice over language is Japanese only.

name: Dragon Realms
summary: Be the dragon! Customise, upgrade, and dominate a vast fantasy world. Destroy castles, battle foes, gather treasure, and rule Dragon Realms!

name: DrillHead
summary: Drill through the deeps of the Earth and fight against King Moles, Evil Skulls, Weird Tourists and more!

name: Drinking in the Hot Spring!
summary: In this humor-filled human drama, you take on the role of the leader of a hot spring drinking club, spending enjoyable moments with a diverse group of members from different ages and backgrounds. As you bond with them, you’ll support them through their worries and troubles, sometimes with a little help from alcohol, and help to heal their hearts.

name: Drop That Cat
summary: Connect small cute kittens to big cats.

name: Dragon and Phoenix
summary: This is an independent game with unique gameplay! I hope you can experience endless fun from it! This is definitely worth it! Hope everyone likes it!

name: Drop 'n' Fill!
summary: A simple puzzle game? Well, this is a groovy puzzle game. Fill a board with blocks to make a complete line, remove them, and rinse and repeat. Great plays will be rewarded with increasingly evolving music, and you'll soon start to groove with the very blocks you're placing down!?

name: Dream League Soccer 2025
summary: Dream League Soccer 2025 puts you in the heart of the soccer action with a fresh look and brand new features! Collect your dream team from over 4,000 FIFPRO licensed soccer players and take to the field against the world’s best soccer clubs! Rise through 8 divisions whilst enjoying full 3D motion-captured player moves, immersive in-game commentary, team customizations and much more. The beautiful game has never been so good!

name: Dreamy Syrup
summary: "Sato Ama," whom you met by chance at university, is an ardent fan of the virtual idol "Amaha Shiroppu" just like you! The two hit it off and go out together, talk about their favorite idols, and gradually become closer. However... "I almost got found out." A certain comment made by Amaha Shiroppu during a stream raises a question: "Could it be that Amaha Shiroppu is... Sato Ama?" Will you witness the virtual idol "Amaha Shiroppu" being found out? A thrilling love comedy where "dreams" and "reality" intersect!

name: Dragon Ball Z: Mission to Namek
summary: In this fighting game the player takes control of three of the Z warriors as they take on the Ginyu Force on Planet Namek. The Ginyu Force is destroying 5 locations on Namek and to stop them the player must fight them one at a time using his 3 warriors. In battle, the player chooses either to attack or defend until the enemy is defeated or until the player chooses to leave the battle. The player can also have his warriors train to learn 1 of 5 techniques that they can use in battle for more damage. Once a character learns all 5 techniques he becomes a super saiyan. After all 5 Ginyu Force members are defeated the player must defeat the final boss, Frieza, to win the game.

name: Dreams of Another
summary: Dreams of Another is a third-person exploration-action game built around the philosophical theme, “No Creation Without Destruction.” Rather than destroying objects by shooting—as in traditional shooting games—here, your shots materialize and create the world. This unconventional mechanic offers a gameplay experience that challenges the norms of the genre and invites players into a whole new dimension.

name: Drome van Slange Bundle
summary: The clashing of 2 opposing worlds! This super combo of a bundle whisks you away to ethereal, mystical realm on the one side and then plunges you into a violent, bloody game of death and survival on the other end, making for a satisfyingly complimentary game duo.

name: Drift Survivor 2
summary: A roguelite vehicular combat game where you unleash bullets amidst chaotic drifts and high-speed chases. In each unpredictable battle, you must also manage energy consumption, choose different weapons, upgrade your vehicle, and ultimately defeat the powerful AI legion.

name: Driveloop: Survivors
summary: Driveloop is a fast-paced driving roguelike shooter. Drift, blast and ram your way through waves of steampunk enemies. Upgrade your vehicle with powerful weapons, recruit unique crew members and survive intense battles as you build the ultimate combat machine. Can you survive the chaos?

name: Dreamless Girl
summary:
Welcome to this game that combines visual novel and side-scrolling bullet hell shooter elements.

During the day, you will experience the protagonist's school life from her perspective. At night, you will become a secret operative, piloting the Dreambreaker through various dreamscapes. To find her missing sister, the protagonist, Mu Deng, dives into different dreams every night, searching for the clues her sister left behind. Along the way, she encounters various companions and gradually uncovers the secrets behind her sister's disappearance.

name: Dreamless Girl: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Welcome to this game that combines visual novel and side-scrolling bullet hell shooter elements.

During the day, you will experience the protagonist's school life from her perspective. At night, you will become a secret operative, piloting the Dreambreaker through various dreamscapes. To find her missing sister, the protagonist, Mu Deng, dives into different dreams every night, searching for the clues her sister left behind. Along the way, she encounters various companions and gradually uncovers the secrets behind her sister's disappearance.

Deluxe Edition includes character skinpackage "Rose-hued Uniforms" , includes one skin each for characters Mu Deng, Plague Nun, and ZZ. These skins unlock automatically after completing specific levels.

name: Driftwave
summary: A race game

name: Dropship: United Peace Force
summary:
Dropship is an action game set in the year 2050. Terrorist attacks have increased severely, which is why big nations of the world decided to form the UPF, "United Peace Force", replacing the UN and NATO. It is an anti-terror army, operating world-wide.

But there is another globally operating group: A massively militarised drug syndicate. When an attack on a peace convoy in Columbia is linked to this cartel, the UPF starts investigation. A central base and training camp of the drug cartel is believed to be located somewhere in Libya. The UPF opens up a base in this country and starts looking for the criminals.

The player is a recently recruited soldier and pilot of the UPF. During the campaign, which lasts for 20 rather long missions, he can travel and fight on foot, in tanks and various other ground vehicles, but most of the time he will be piloting a dropship, either of the attack, defender or transport class. Dropships can operate in hover and flight mode, and carry a large amount of weapons and cargo.

name: Drop 4
summary: A Classic Game with a twist, where you must get 4 in a row by removing chips and using special chips like bombs and ice tokens to beat your opponent.

name: Dreadzone
summary: Dreadzone is a survival game set in a deadly quarantine zone. Scavenge for resources, craft tools, build shelter, and survive against dangerous animals, zombies, mutants, and other survivors. Explore the zone where desperation drives everyone to do whatever it takes to survive.

name: Dragon Expedition
summary: This is a fantasy adventure action game that blends Eastern and Western elements. Players will become dragon slaying warriors and embark on a long journey, freely wandering between multiple main storylines. Acquire various skills, and challenge the ultimate boss.

name: Dragon Puncher
summary: Dragon Puncher is a single-player arcade-style action game designed to be a training tool for Street Fighter and 2D fighting game enthusiasts, and a well-rounded short game. About 15-20 minutes in length, players typically perform 50-75 dragon punch moves per play-through.

name: Dream Life in the Country Side
summary: A laid-back farming simulator where you play as Lisa, a dedicated farmer by day and a passionate partner of Honoka at night. Work the land, raise animals, and cultivate your relationship. Unlock special scenes as your bond and farm flourish.

name: Dreamwalker
summary:
Dreamwalker is a top-down story RPG game with deckbuilding combat.

Embark on a journey through dreams and nightmares in Dreamwalker, a 2D top-down RPG set in a mesmerizing pixel art world. You are a wandering traveler, drawn to a small village shrouded in mystery and cursed by an ancient evil.

name: Dream Heights
summary: "Dream Heights" is a mobile game developed by Zynga where players build their own skyscraper by adding different floors with stores, restaurants, apartments, and more, where the goal is to create a thriving tower by managing your residents and businesses within it; it allows players to customise their tower, connect with friends, and even outbuild famous landmarks like the Statue of Liberty.

name: Drapline
summary: "DRAPLINE" is a roguelite training game where you raise a dragon girl who eats anything and train her to become the strongest in one year. Feed her a variety of things to increase her abilities, combine various skills to build your own strategy, and defeat the impending catastrophe!

name: Dragon Attack Mythologies: A Night Wolf Revenge
summary: Jump, dodge, and fight against anyone who crosses your path in search of revenge. Explore 8 challenging worlds filled with danger and classic arcade action.

name: Dragon Knight
summary: Dragon Knight is a RPG in which you play as the worst knight in the kingdom sent on the classic quest- Take the magic sword, save the monster, slay the girl—err, no, was it…

name: Dreamspring
summary: Dreamspring is a dark fantasy styled, open world souls-like game. Explore a dying kingdom and it's different realms in first person action combat, styled in a mix of retro and vaporwave aesthetics.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Pack
summary:
The DAIMA: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Pack includes the following content:
• DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Part 1 (July-Sep 2025)
• DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Part 2 (Jan-Mar 2026)
• DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Pack Bonus
- Items: Ultimate Meat Feast, Mega Sacred Water, Purple Dino Horn, and Awakening Water

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Part 1
summary: Part 1 of an additional story set in the world of the Dragon Ball DAIMA anime series: DAIMA: Adventure Through The Demon Realm.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Part 2
summary: Part 2 of an additional story set in the world of the Dragon Ball DAIMA anime series: DAIMA: Adventure Through The Demon Realm.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Bonus Pack
summary:
The DAIMA: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Pack Bonus includes the following items:
- Ultimate Meat Feast
- Mega Sacred Water
- Purple Dino Horn
- Awakening Water

These items enhance character attributes.

name: Dr Goo
summary: Dr Goo Dr Goo is the first in a series of three 2D platform game. The player controls a Dr Goo - green, intelligent slime thing on a mission to get five medicine boxes in each level in order to save 'lil Jimmy's life. On the way he has to negotiate multiple hazards including rolling barrels and shark infested waters.

name: Dream Place
summary: A serene and mysterious world to explore. Build your perfect sanctuary solo or with friends (up to 5 players). Two game modes, deep customization, and hidden secrets await in Dream Place.

name: Dragon Song Tavern
summary: Ready to run a tavern with a Dragon companion? On this charming island, you can live out your tavern-keeping dreams. Along the way, you'll meet all kinds of guests, Encounter unicorns, battle Giant Elementals, and embrace adventures! Begin your journey as the Dragon Song calls!

name: Draconis 8
summary: Draconis 8 is a trading card game that meets the balance and strategy of a tile-laying board game. Each pack includes a terrain card and a complete, balanced eight-card deck for one player — featuring one powerful dragon and seven champions ready for battle.

name: Droning On
summary: Help Gizmo through increasingly complex mazes using Python code as you learn programming concepts, dodge hazards, and manage resources across campaign, puzzle, and endless game modes.

name: Dreams of Literature: Noir
summary: Enter Sayori's mind and follow the dreams she has during the week of the DDLC. Can you guess which day this chapter takes place?

name: Dreamless Girl: Deluxe Edtion Plus
summary:
Welcome to this game that combines visual novel and side-scrolling bullet hell shooter elements.

During the day, you will experience the protagonist's school life from her perspective. At night, you will become a secret operative, piloting the Dreambreaker through various dreamscapes. To find her missing sister, the protagonist, Mu Deng, dives into different dreams every night, searching for the clues her sister left behind. Along the way, she encounters various companions and gradually uncovers the secrets behind her sister's disappearance.

Deluxe Edition includes character skinpackage "Rose-hued Uniforms"&"Sweet Strike" , includes two skins each for characters Mu Deng, Plague Nun, and ZZ. These skins unlock automatically after completing specific levels.

name: Dr.Mememe want to sleep
summary: The genius Hakase “Mememe”, who wants to sleep all the time, invented “Kawaii Sheep”, which induces sleep with its mysterious healing properties. This is an exponentially kawaii sheep-carrying game in which Hakase puts the whole world to sleep.

name: Dr. Kamasutra 2
summary: The famous master of tantric sexual knowledge has returned! Dr. Kamasutra is ready to show you the way to your full enlightenment again! Let him teach and train you to know everything about lust and vices of the amorous play! Prove your knowledge about sexual records and stimulating confessions! Bring your brain to tremble as much as your body vibes during the act of love. Learn facts, rumours and unknown details about sex in all varieties! Dr. Kamasutra will do everything that you turn out to be a true sex god! Trust the master and get taught about everything our love guru calls his knowledge. Stir up your blood and be ready for the return of Dr. Kamasutra!

name: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2025
summary: Lead your college basketball team in Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2025. Recruit stars, coach for success, and make key decisions that will lead your team to the tournament. Navigate recruiting, the transfer portal and NIL options to build a winner. The ultimate coaching simulation game!

name: Drawn To You
summary:
Painting a picture of love, but with a palette precariously limited by language.

A short interactive poem which placed second in the Valentwine's Game Jam. It has music and sound, so I strongly recommend having the volume on.

name: Drehmal: Apotheosis
summary: Drehmal: APOTHEOSIS is a massive, one of a kind Minecraft survival/adventure map with a heavy emphasis on exploration. Originally released in 2020 by Keeko & Rift as Drehmal: PRIMORDIAL, the APOTHEOSIS update has been in development for more than 3 years with support from a team of more than 15 incredibly talented developers. APOTHEOSIS transforms Drehmal into a fully realized experience. The update introduces a complete main story and plot alongside tons of vanilla-friendly gameplay mechanics to make Drehmal a highly ambitious, one-of-a-kind Minecraft experience.

name: DreadHaven: The Last Colony
summary: Dreadhaven: The Last Colony is a minimalist turn-based city-building strategy game set in a hostile, post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead. Your mission is to expand, fortify, and withstand relentless waves of the undead.

name: Dredge: Blackstone Key
summary:
The mysterious workshop on Blackstone Isle is locked tight. Inside are otherworldly creations, products of cruel machinations by the previous occupants. Now they lie idle and abandoned.

With this key you can put them to some use.

name: Dreamy Room
summary:
Dreamy Room is more than a game --- it’s a satisfying heartfelt journey that reminds us of the beauty in life’s quiet, ordinary moments.

With every box you open, you’ll uncover personal belongings and carefully find the perfect spot for each item. As you unpack, you'll reveal the story of a life, room by room, year by year, piecing together tender memories and heartfelt milestones.

name: Dragon Tale 4: The Raven Plot - Collector's Edition
Drop Dimensions
summary: Drop is an endless runner with short enough sessions for quick casual plays and enough features and unlockables to fill more hardcore sessions. Smash your way through walls and dodge traps to survive! RPG-Lite features (leveling), quests, collectibles, achievements, leaderboards and more!

name: Dream Ball
summary: Arcade game where players must reach the end of a level while controlling their characters by rotating a giant trackball.

name: Dreamscape Highschool: After Stories
summary: This story takes place where "Dreamscape Highschool" left off.

name: Drum Revolution
summary: Drum Revolution - the future of learning drums! Simply connect your E-Drumkit or midi pad to your PC or Mac and control a platformer game while learning and practicing to play the drums.

name: Dreams of Aether
summary: A collection of dozens of Aether-flavored microgames! Dive into the Dreams of Aether, where everyone is trapped in a never-ending nightmare! Meet some of the strangest characters Aether has to offer!

name: Drag x Drive
summary: Drag x Drive (pronounced “Drag and Drive”) challenges players to use the mouse controls with both Joy-Con 2 at the same time to intuitively steer, speed up, perform tricks and make plays such as dunks.

name: Drownlight
summary: Drownlight is a city-building survival simulator set in a flooded world. Build and expand your city around a lighthouse, manage resources, and make moral decisions that shape the fate of the survivors. Secrets lurk in the raging waters, and if the lighthouse goes out, the city may be lost forever.

name: Dread Chess
summary: Philosophical story about God of Madness and a self-playing chess that can be played only once.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Pong
summary: This game functions as a simple game of pong with Goku and Captain Ginyu serving as the 2 paddles and a dragon ball serving as the ball. The first player to reach 10 points wins the game.

name: Dr. Plague
summary: In a world ravaged by plague, a lone plague doctor embarks on a journey to stop both the disease and a sinister order of knights controlling it. Dr. Plague is a stealth-adventure game that combines puzzle-solving, platforming, and ambient soundtracks.

name: Dream Management Company
summary: Guard every trapped soul. Step into the realm of dreams, and clear away the nightmares. DreamControl Inc—wishing you pleasant dreams!

name: Dragon Nest Classic
summary:
Dragon Nest imposes FPS game control that uses WASD and Mouse so it brings fast view change and character movement more than other action games.
Also Dragon Nest arranges a character at left side of screen that make players can see character's movement and opponents attack action more easily.

name: Draw-Play
summary:
Draw-Play is very simple, all you have to do is get to the flag, easy right? well the catch is you must draw your own level with the mouse to get to it while avoiding all obstacles.
20 Challenging levels. Can you get through them all?

name: Drug Schedule
summary: Build your empire! Cook and make illegal drugs, expand your cartel, and outsmart rivals and law enforcement. Play solo or team up in co-op to dominate the underworld! Your empire, your rules. Rise to power! Don't get high on your own dope!

name: Dragon's Dog Mother
summary: A hilarious medieval fantasy adventure with an epic world that will immerse you. Strange and diverse monsters let you build a unique team, while the funny yet profound storyline will make you laugh and ponder.

name: Drag Racing 3D: Streets 2
summary: The racing simulator created on game engine with a realistic physics and wide customization options. Create a unique car, installing new parts and tuning up car characteristics. Compete with other players in various tournaments on colorful race tracks. Prove that you are worthy to be a champion!

name: Dragrave Marauders
summary: A classic JRPG style semi-open world game that let's you explore how you want. Choose from many classes, collect loot, complete quests, defeat foes and meet new allies along the way! "Frequent" updates to so you can come back once in a while to experience new content!

name: Drama Queens
summary: JAE-WOO JEON, a naive freshman, happened to step into the p&m theatre club. Little did he know it was a club full of flirting campus queens. Will Jae-Woo be able to safely go through his bumpy campus life?

name: Dread It
summary: Use your arsenal of traps to protect yourself as you exorcise the victims of the malevolent Pillar.

name: Dreamline 404
summary: Thank you for calling the Dreamline Service Center. We are dedicated to providing you with the highest quality dream services. How may I assist you today?

name: Dream Rhythm
summary: "Dream Rhythm" is an addictive rhythm game. Simple operation, beautiful songs, bring you a dreamy flow experience.

name: Dream & Sugar
summary: Welcome to Dream & Sugar, a wholesome visual novel exploring relationships, love, and the transition to adulthood. Navigate relationships with unique dialogue and branching endings in this cozy LGBTQ+ friendly otome game!

name: Drift Desert Race
summary: Drift Desert Race - A wild and chaotic game where you will embark on an 8-hour non-stop journey across an endless desert, all to discover the answer to the ultimate question: "What is the meaning of life?"

name: Drift On Snow
summary: Who doesn't look forward to winter as much as we do?

name: Driving Around
summary: Drive through serene landscapes to the sound of relaxing lo-fi. Choose to explore a vast open world or follow an endless road, with no rush, no limits. With stunning graphics, simple controls, and a calm atmosphere, this is the perfect game to relax and enjoy the journey.

name: DropDisk
summary: DropDisk is a F2P Idle Clicking Game for collecting Floppy Disks. Click to gain XP, battle to gain more XP, the more XP the higher your level, the higher your level the better your Disk drops to collect and trade!

name: Driving Life
summary: Driving Life is a hardcore driving survival game set in rural America. Earn money by driving manual cars, vans, and trucks, transport tourists, pay rent, buy fuel, and survive on a tight budget. Every dollar counts - spend wisely or go broke!

name: Dr. Suun
summary: Dr. Suun is a thrilling horror experience that combines intense chases with mind-bending puzzles. Players step into the shoes of James, a man drawn into the mystery of an abandoned hospital with a haunting past. As he uncovers its secrets, the lines between reality and nightmare begin to blur.

name: Dream Garden
summary: An easygoing simulation game about creating tiny garden dioramas. Use a wide selection of plants, decorations and tools to build and nurture the garden retreat of your dreams.

name: Dreadmoor
summary: DREADMOOR is a Lovecraftian fishing adventure set in a post-nuclear apocalypse world. Sell your yield, upgrade your boat, build equipment and battle monsters lurking in water and on land. Explore forgotten lands and discover ancient secrets.

name: Drymouth
summary: Drymouth is a homebrew puzzle game for the game boy color. What you do is follow the numbers above and to the left of the field to see which blocks you should punch out. When all the blocks are correctly punched out, the pattern will form a picture.

name: Dream Prison
summary: "Dream Prison" is a 3D horror escape game similar to Exit 8. Find the anomalous rooms and escape the cult church.

name: Drill Space
summary: A survival mining game where gravity shapes your journey. Explore a vibrant, randomly generated solar system, mine for resources, upgrade your ship, and defend against alien invasions.

name: Draw Breaker
summary: The future of the world is at stake! Professor Blockowski and his block army are on a campaign to make the world square. Your mission will require quick reflexes and fast thinking to foil Professor Blockowski’s evil schemes and keep the world safe and round.

name: Drink it Bitter
summary: Drink it Bitter is a short visual novel developed for the Spaghetti Invasion GameJam. It draws you into a suspended world, where a simple cup of coffee can turn out to be more bitter than you’d expect. Here, your decisions might leave you with an undefined aftertaste, as though reality itself were an echo answering unasked questions. Perhaps you’ll find a faint note of hope… or maybe just a void at the bottom of it all.

name: Dream Slayers
summary:
Enter the twisted realms of Dream Slayers, a thrilling extraction RPG where reality and nightmare collide. In this dark fantasy world, players become elite warriors known as Dream Slayers, tasked with venturing into surreal dreamscapes to hunt fearsome creatures, reclaim lost relics, and escape before the dream consumes them.

Armed with a diverse arsenal of medieval-themed weapons—swords, axes, bows, and arcane tools—you must strategize every encounter. Each run offers new dangers and unexpected rewards as you navigate treacherous environments, solve cryptic puzzles, and face off against powerful bosses that embody the deepest fears of humanity.

Team up with friends or venture solo, balancing risk versus reward in high-stakes extractions. Will you grab the treasure and escape in time, or be trapped in an endless nightmare?

name: Dragimon Dungeons
summary: Prepare to challenge your friends in this mix of Dice, Monsters, and Strategy! Best your opponent by building your own mix of Monsters and Dice. Then, expand your path to fight your Rival's monsters using abilities to boost your own Monsters! The first to knock out their opponent's Gem Master wins!

name: Dragon Roomates
summary: A romantic slice of life visual novel about polyamorous relationships ... and dragons!

name: Drasle Family: Pochi & Bochi
summary: All 50 rounds of the original Nuts & Milk have been changed. Based on the character “Pochi” from Dragon Slayer IV (aka Legacy of the Wizard) for the Famicom (NES). Starts out fairly easy but will start to get challenging in later rounds.

name: Drakerider
summary:
Kill or be killed. Experience the perils of adventure with your ferocious sidekick in this brand-new smartphone RPG!

Led by Akifumi Kaneko, the game is developed by WITCHCRAFT Inc., famous for their work on various anime and other RPGs. This title maintains the high quality and integrity for which they are known.

name: Dreams on a Pillow
summary: Dreams on a Pillow is a pseudo-3D stealth adventure game inspired by a historical Palestinian folk tale set during the ethnic cleansing that was the 1948 Nakba.

name: Drone Simulator: Smash Zombies
summary: Pilot a heavily armed drone to obliterate relentless zombie hordes in this intense action-strategy game. Defend your base, upgrade your arsenal, and experience the ultimate undead-smashing thrill.

name: Dream Zoo
summary: Dream Zoo by Zynga is their first zoo themed game where players can collect, breed, and care for the world’s most amazing animals in their very own zoo.

name: Dream PetHouse
summary: Do you love animals? Then here's your chance to create the biggest, happiest home for hundreds of irresistibly cute pets in Dream PetHouse by Zynga! Collect the world's cutest animals and care for them in your own unique tree, staffed by Chipper and his group of adorable chipmunk friends!

name: DreadOut 3
summary: DreadOut 3 is a third-person horror adventure inspired by Asian - Indonesian urban legend. Follow Linda’s journey as Keepers of the Dark into an interdimensional rabbit hole to find the source of unseen power threatening the balance of light and darkness.

name: Drone Dash
