summary: Race, boost, and soar through physics-driven tracks in this fast-paced 2D drone racing game. Master precision flying, compete on global leaderboards, and push your skills to the limit!

name: Dr. Woo's Twisted Clone Shop
summary: Pixel Farm wanted to build a mobile game division. We created a department of talented mutants and made Dr. Woo’s Twisted Clone Shop. It's a puzzle/matching game in which you attempt to clone various animals, anything from a gold fish to a unicorn. Work your way through over a dozen genetic experiments, but watch out for mutations and other stuffs.

name: Drive and Unwind
summary: Drive And Unwind — Your Gentle Companion for Work and Study Drive And Unwind is a light and soothing tool featuring 2D parallax backgrounds, vehicle and weather options, five music genres, and a Pomodoro timer — perfect for relaxing during work or study.

name: Dress-Up With Helene
summary:
Helene Marylin becomes your dress-up doll in this fun little Dress-up game!
Mix and match with over 120 different articles of clothing and accessories!

name: Dreamwalker: Dream A Little Dream Act I
summary: It begins in the world of Yaweth, a peaceful world combined massive lands and small oceans. We look upon the two rivalling nations, Kindred and Courtwood, both north and south of another.

name: Dragon Slayer
summary: The Dragon Slayers are hunting once again and you have answered the call. Dragon Slayer is a visually spectacular, magic-based combat game that is brought to you by the studio that brought you Blood & Glory and Blood & Glory: Legend.

name: Dream Eaters.exe
summary: Trapped in a secret sleep experiment, you and your friends must survive terrifying nightmares, completing tasks to wake up before it's too late. Play solo or in co-op, but beware—the experiments are never the same, and something watches from the dark.

name: Dreams: VR
summary:
This major update introduced virtual reality to Dreams. Media Molecule released a new collection of short games called "Inside the Box", which included an art gallery, motion-controlled maze puzzles, a speedrun shooter and a puzzle platformer.

Users could design their own creations using a Playstation VR headset and optional Playstation Move controllers. Most dreams could be played in VR, even if they weren't created in it.

name: Dreams: Dragons, Dungeons & Templates
summary:
This update to Dreams included a new game and an overhaul of the creation experience. Media Molecule released "Ancient Dangers: A Bat's Tale", a dungeon-crawling action game featuring orcs and new PlayStation trophies. It couldn't be played in VR, but was one of the few Dreams creations that supported local co-op.

Templates were released that allowed people to quickly created themed dreams. These included mini golf courses, speedrun challenges, 2D platformers, shmups, and a fully featured toolkit to modify their dungeon-crawling game into something new.

name: DragonLoop
summary: The heroine who lost her memory was trapped in a five-day loop. Connect with your partners to travel through a world with strange time changes, continue to become stronger, retrieve memories, and understand the truth. The game is a time loop Metroidvania.

name: Dracula: End of Days
summary: This is a visual novel-style game. The story follows a father gradually turning into a vampire in a frozen zombie apocalypse, who must wield supernatural power to protect his daughter—yet each hunt erodes his remaining humanity. How can this vampiric father uphold his vow to 'never harm humans'?

name: Drag Race / Desert Fox
summary:
"Drag Race" is a side-view racing game in which up to four players try to shift gears of their drag racing cars at the right moment to reach the finish first.

"Desert Fox" is a top-down tank battle game where tanks are situated on both sides of a road. Traffic on the road serves as dynamic obstacles.

name: Dragons Reef
summary: Start sailing adventure by defending the Dragons Reef land from pirates, manage unique artifacts, customize character magic skills, watch out for underwater creatures, admire the beautiful foreign nature, get own dragon, collect loot. Top-down action RPG, tower defense and cartoon ships naval combat

name: Dreams of Amelia
summary: Amelia is very lonely. Working a corporate job leaves you with few chances of getting a boyfriend. And hey, Amelia has her "needs" too! But everything changed when she bought an old book, on the local flea market... with a demon inside! YOU are that demon. Make Dreams of Amelia come true!

name: Dr. Panda Restaurant 2
summary:
Make the pizza of your dreams, a pasta dish to rave about, or a soup so spicy your customers will breathe fire! Sweet or salty? Spicy or bitter? It’s up to you!

Kids can take charge in their own kitchen in Dr. Panda’s Restaurant 2! Future fine chefs have the freedom to choose what they want to prepare and exactly how they’d like to prepare it! Chop, grate, blend, fry and more with over 20 ingredients and create the perfect (or perfectly disgusting!) dish! Feed them to your customers and pay attention to how they react--it’ll be different every time! In Dr. Panda’s Restaurant 2 you can be a master chef, so get cooking!

name: Dragon Slayer I
summary: Dragon Slayer I is a Game Boy conversion of the Dragon Slayer, an action RPG designed by Yoshio Kiya and developed by Nihon Falcom. The title helped to pioneer the action RPG genre in Japan and spawned many sequels that would spin-off into their own franchises over time.

name: DreamBreaker
summary: Dream Breaker is a turn-based deck-building game with roguelike. Your mission in to seal the Demon Lord again and again. Collect scattered memories in your adventures and search for the truth of the dream world......

name: Dragon Spot
summary: Who loves dragons?! This is a meditative strategy game about building dragon islands without timers or stress. Just build and watch as the residents raise their toothy pets.

name: Drakefall
summary: Explore the World of Drakefall in this roguelike deckbuilder. Build your deck, discover powerful items, and journey through swamps and mountain peaks with a familiar playstyle.

name: Drill to Hell: Clicked Too Deep
summary: A clicker where you dig deeper and deeper into mines beneath the surface! Collect gems and automate your mining with the resources obtained. Will you reach the heart of the earth?

name: Dr. Parking 4
summary:
Dr. Parking is back in the sequel to the biggest mobile parking simulation game of all time!
Dr. Parking 4 starts a new era of parking simulation gameplay with super stunning graphics, challenging multi-stage levels and real-time online multiplayer.

name: Dreamnest
summary: Build cozy settlements in dreams! Solve relaxing puzzles by placing buildings on whimsical and surreal platforms. Explore unique worlds, immerse yourself in strangers' dreams, and enjoy the charm of hand-drawn visuals.

name: Draggin'
summary: Capture Draggins by draggin' the mouse in this casual arcade roguelite! Click-and-drag to cast spells on enemies and get your fill of wave battlin', achievement huntin', upgrade unlockin', rinse-and-repeatin'!

name: Dreadline: Net Quota
summary: Dreadline: Net Quota is a chaotic co-op game for up to 6 players set on dangerous seas. Catch fish with different rods or spearfishing, keep your boat afloat as systems fail, and survive unpredictable encounters without drowning as everything falls apart.

name: Dreamy Hill
summary: Village you can only dream of

name: Dream Spectra
summary: Dream Spectra is a romance/horror visual novel about trying to hang out with your crush and escape your migraines, styled with surreal 90s 3D rendered environments.

name: Dry Bones
summary: A mysterious momentum based platformer! Easy to learn hard to master mechanics like wallrunning swinging and even riding a on magical broom! Exchange your head for weird powerups and collect all Skeleton Coins!

name: Dragon Nest: Rebirth of Legend
summary: Dragon Nest: Rebirth of Legend is an action MMO mobile game officially authorized and remade from the classic online game Dragon Nest. It inherits the features of non-locking combat and thrilling real-time PK battles, along with four major classes, satisfying combo-based combat, cool mounts, a cute pet system, a trading system, a guild social system, and other classic content. Additionally, the game includes the original storyline, with iconic bosses such as the Minotaur, Hellhound, Sea Dragon, and Scorpion Lion reappearing, taking you back to the familiar and exciting world of the Altaria continent.

name: Drawn Tale
summary: After taking a life, a boy is killed and awakens in a twisted, nightmarish Purgatory. Explore a world of horror, solve eerie puzzles, evade lurking monsters, and fight to keep your soul intact before it’s devoured by the Void.

name: DreadMist
summary: DreadMist is an open-world role-playing roleplaying sandbox simulation. With the incredible mechanical depth of this fantasy sandbox, you can begin as a lowly beggar and advance to numerous people skilled in crafting, trade, farming, thievery, combat, and many other activities.

name: Dreamless Kingdom
summary: A narrative-driven exploration game where you collect hidden objects and help restore villagers' dreams.

name: Dream Night
summary: You wake up from a nightmare. You can't count how many times you've had a nightmare this month. But this time, after waking up, you find some strange phenomena in your house. You want to go out to see, but the door is locked...

name: Dragons Frolic!
summary: Dragons Frolic! is a cozy and relaxing idle game with a cute racing platformer on top! Buy or breed dragons, sell them for profit or send them into races. Discover new dragon types and color variants. Unlock new race tracks or decorations. Enjoy cute dragons frolicking around you!

name: Draw World
summary: A new kind of real-time RPG fused with card game mechanics! Join the hero Cade on an epic journey to save the world from an unknown threat. Team up with unique allies, and collect powerful cards and badges to build your ultimate deck.

name: Dream Abyss: Survivors
summary: A stylish roguelike action RPG set in a dreamworld! Join Lily on a mysterious journey to save her sister trapped in a nightmare. Hunt down endless waves of nightmare creatures, clear stages, and conquer the abyss with powerful skills and beautiful characters!

name: Dragon Castle
summary: Arcade Time & Fun and Calculator Time & Fun versions of Dragon Castle. This version plays like the original Tabletop version, but are built without colors.

name: Dragon Ball: Pilaf no Gyakushuu
summary: The first Dragon Ball video game. The gameplay consists of the player controlling Goku on the Flying Nimbus, moving left and right to defend himself from enemy missiles.

name: Dreamscape Island
summary: Dreamscape Island is a cozy game that combines simple survival elements, exploring mysterious islands, fixing ruined villages, and helping those greedy unicorns. Yes... We have unicorns and they care only about money.

name: Dream Runner
summary: On the eve of their big ceremony, Soma and Nigel are ripped from one another by an unexpected disaster. Now, Soma has to learn to overcome his toughest challenges on his own. Master new abilities, overcome platforming challenges, and solve puzzles as you work to reunite with your best friend!

name: Dragon Lands
summary: Dragon Lands is an incremental game about creature collection, farming, crafting and automation! Gather and manage resources, expand your lands and upgrade your skills. Collect Dragons to automate your production. Join in this adventure and explore a vibrant world!

name: Drifters & Demons
summary: As the leader of a small settlement in a demon-infested wilderness, you will have to shelter survivors and protect them with a variety of guns and abilities. Build homes, turrets, weapons, and traps, and when you're ready to face the horde, take out your guns and sound the klaxon!

name: Drywall Eating Simulator
summary: Drywall Eating Simulator is a physics-based 3D adventure game where you are pushed to the limits of human (or nonhuman) tolerance by the people you encounter in our world, and the only pressure release that you have is in the name of the game (eating drywall)

name: Dream Boundary
summary: Craft your deck before venturing forth. Strategically navigate the map, strengthen your abilities with talents and relics, and confront relentless enemies as you journey toward the unexplored frontiers of the Dream Boundary.

name: Dracs After Dusk
summary: "Dracs After Dusk" is an arcade, top-down shooter. Blast through bloodsuckers as the sharp shootin’ sheriff of a wild west town. Battle the deadliest bosses, claim weapons from the Armory to fuel your leaderboard topping run. It's an old school quarter muncher but luckily you have unlimited credits!

name: Dreadbone
summary: Dreadbone is a real-time strategy and puzzle game where you’re no hero, you’re the one pulling the strings from the shadows. Shape the terrain, trap enemies with roots, and control ancient relics to protect a fragile explorer on a cursed island. One wrong move, and he’s gone. Act precisely.

name: Dreamcards
summary: Build your deck during the day and at night fight the monster that haunts your dreams. Will you be able to escape the nightmare in this roguelike deckbuilder that combines strategy, occultism and psychology?

name: Drone: Modern Warfare
summary: "Drone: Modern Warfare" is a tactical simulation shooting game where players control various types of drones to execute reconnaissance and strike missions.The game realistically simulating the use of drones and AI technology in modern warfare, delivering an intense and thrilling combat experience.

name: Drillmaster 9000
summary: Dig, collect resources, upgrade your drill and multitool, go deep underground and find a powerful shiny object.

name: Dreamship Sugarcube
summary: This is a gamejam work developed by a team of four people within ten days. It is a third-person 3D space adventure game. Its core gameplay involves simulating jumping and flying under the gravitational force of planets.

name: Dracamar
summary: Join Caliu, Foc, and Espurna on a journey full of adventures in the magical island world of Dracamar. Run, jump, and fight to free the Okis. Collect all the Moki-balls to rebuild the bridges and reconnect the islands. Get ready to fight the evil King Crad and save the world with your friends!

name: Drill Beat
summary: Drill Beat is a puzzle-rhythm game where you control an animated bit that moves to the beat. Navigate through its puzzling landscape, and collect golden cogs to progress. Explore deeper into this mysterious mechanical world and uncover what lies at the bottom.

name: Drone Warfare: Global Ops
summary: At the forefront of aerial combat and at the heart of modern warfare, Drone Warfare: Global Ops places you in the cockpit of a TB2 unmanned aerial vehicle. This game offers a realistic and thrilling combat experience that only a drone pilot can truly experience.

name: Dragon March
summary: Dragon March is a modern and challenging spin on the classic game of Snake. Guide Cereal, The Metal Dragon, through levels full of obstacles while rescuing other Metal Dragons along your path. As your line increases, so does the danger. Bumping into almost anything causes a game over. Reach the exit and you win the level!

name: Dragon Jump
summary:
Evil dragons are flying over the kingdom. You play as a knight armed with a lance, and your goal is to defend the dungeon from attacking dragons.

Step on the dragons to jump higher and higher, till you defeat the devil bosses!

name: Dreamcore
summary: Dreamcore Retro is a short and relaxing low poly indie game based on lucid dreaming and liminal spaces to concern about endangered species and other problems from the future society. The game mainly consists in exploring the dreamy surroundings of these psychedelic and minimalistic worlds.

name: Dragon Riddler
summary: A turn-based puzzle adventure with a simple concept: Find dragon's lair → defeat dragon → grab treasure → upgrade → next. But with words.

name: Drill Up
summary: Tap to jump from circle to circle to go up and don’t let the lava catch you. It may sound like an easy task, but various rotating circles of different size, type and speed become a real challenge! Collect gems to unlock new characters. Sharpen the drills and let’s drill up!

name: Draw & Guess Multiplayer
summary:
Draw and Guess Online is the funniest, the most colorful and creative game.
You can draw and guess in real time with thousands of the other players online.

Gaming in real time makes Draw and Guess Online such a cheerful and dynamic game.
Everyone loves to play charades with his friends, now you have an opportunity to play this wonderful game on your mobile phone anywhere and at any time with the players all around the world!
We have prepared for you a lot of interesting words of various complexity.

The meaning of the Game Draw and Guess is to guess a word, that was offered to an artist. The artist, in his turn, tries to be either clear or fast while drawing a picture, which is associated with that word.

name: Dragon Slayer and The Leaf Town
summary: The sacred dragon that protected the village died. After that, his son, the dragon, gradually became crooked and began to deviate. Then, he drank alcohol and completely destroyed the village. Unable to bear it any longer, the village chief asked a traveler to kill the dragon...

name: Dragon Sprouts
summary: Create and customize your very own Dragon Sanctuary! Reclaim a world lost to ancient corruption and restore it to life. Build, decorate, and upgrade your sanctuary as you cleanse the land and bring the last of the dragons home to hatch.

name: Dragon Detective: A Friend From the Shadows
summary: A thrilling detective mystery adventure set in a historical fantasy world. As a dragon detective, use your six senses to find evidence and hunt down the culprit.

name: Dreamland
summary: A group of young people decides to find out why they are seeing mysterious symbols. As they unravel the mystery, they travel through other worlds that are indistinguishable from those seen in dreams. One can only hope that this will not turn into a nightmare for them...

name: Drawn to Power
summary: A tactical deckbuilding game where you fight enemies, unlock cards, and build your deck before each battle—discard cards to generate energy and control the flow of every fight.

name: Dread Not
summary: Avoid your watery grave in this asymmetrical co-op horror game where you and a friend take the roles of a submarine Pilot and Mechanic. Work together to repair the ship, solve puzzles, avoid a deadly creature, and make it back to the surface before time runs out! It's time to Sync or Swim.

name: Dreadtome
summary: Enter a corrupt and hostile library with the task of extracting forbidden knowledge from its tomes. Triumph over the entities that linger within, in this short Action-Adventure FPS made by a team of third-year university students.

name: Drop Point
summary: Open-world survival PvPvE game that caters to a variety of playstyles. Whether you're a farmer, a fearless bandit, or a resourceful survivor, the game's sandbox environment gives you the freedom to forge your own path. It's a blend of open-world exploration, survival, RPG, military-sim, action, looters, shooters, and farming elements

name: Drones of Destruction
summary: A fast-paced drone warfare gamePilot advanced drones, hunt enemies, and dominate the skies in intense battles. Play online or offline, with AI opponents in both modes. Master your weapons, outmaneuver rivals, and claim supremacy in this action-packed experience!

name: Dream Hollow
summary: A cozy-horror adventure game where choices matter. Manage your resources each day to delve deeper into an eerie storybook forest. Gather items, aid the frightened denizens, and make it back to your cottage before your RESOLVE runs out.

name: Dreamlocked
summary: A psychological horror game that centers on exploration, puzzle-solving, and terrifying entity encounters

name: Drunkn Bar Fight 2
summary: Drunkn Bar Fight 2 isn’t just about fighting it’s a playground for hilarious chaos! Turn a chill evening into total mayhem and see how far you can push the limits of drunken fun. With better graphics, interactive environments, and endless ways to cause trouble, it’s the ultimate VR party game.

name: Drill Bird
summary: Drill Bird is a cozy-yet-tense digging platformer where every trip underground counts. Fallen from the sky, you search for powerful ores to hatch your egg. Bring them home, upgrade abilities, grow stronger, and unravel a story about survival, care, and purpose. Exploring, returning, and growing.

name: Drums Rock: Who-ya Extended - 'Vivid Vice'
summary: Get the track 'VIVID VICE' from Who-ya Extended! This track is part of the 'Anime Mix Vol I'.

name: Drums Rock: TK from Ling tosite sigure - 'Unravel'
summary: Get the track 'unravel' from TK from Ling tosite sigure! This track is part of the 'Anime Mix Vol I'.

name: Drums Rock: Yoko Takahashi - 'The Cruel Angel's Thesis'
summary: Get the track 'The Cruel Angel's Thesis' from Yoko Takahashi! This track is part of the 'Anime Mix Vol I'.

name: Drums Rock: Kana-Boon - 'Silhouette'
summary: Get the track 'Silhouette' from KANA-BOON! This track is part of the 'Anime Mix Vol I'.

name: Dreamrealms Resurgence
summary: Dreamrealms Resurgence: A casual shooter meets farm sim! Grow crops, customize skill combos, and mow down endless monster hordes!

name: Drakula's Ascension
summary: Prove your ability to reach your true potential and enjoy retro platforming and combat with a potential cost of starting from the bottom all over again in Drakula's Ascension! Overcome the demons keeping you down, all for your freedom and the view at the top of your castle that once was yours.

name: Draftycar 2
summary: Let chaos reign. Join the ultimate high-speed chess match at 200 MPH. DRAFTYCAR 2 is a multiplayer stockcar racer. Battle with up to 43 opponents. Easy to learn, impossible to master—it's pure, brainy, bumper-to-bumper madness. One wrong move and you'll be in the middle of a sheet metal blender.

name: Dread Flats
summary: This is a first-person Chinese horror game, players will go to a murder building, uncover the truth of the murder, find the missing people. Players will experience an intense sense of claustrophobia and horror, carefully designed scary points, a 1990s Chinese atmosphere, and mysterious, eerie, and twisted unknown entities.

name: Dream Diary
summary: A short adventure game created from a real dream.

name: Driver's Eyes
summary: Driver's Eyes is a 1991 3D driving simulation arcade game developed and published in Japan by Namco.

name: Dream Hospital
summary:
Step into the fun world of Dream Hospital, where you will turn a small clinic into a busy, top-notch medical center! As a hospital tycoon leader, you'll navigate the complexities of hospital management, expand your facilities, and deliver exceptional care to every patient.

Ready to lead your medical clinic to success, Doctor? Start building your medical empire today!

name: Dragon Ball Z: Shin Budokai Another Road Revisited
summary:
Previously known as double npact, this mod is a competitive version of shin budokai another road. Some things possible in the game: Ultimate during combo with all characters, connect strings with ki blasts (more hit stun), no armor on S moves, faster KBCs (ki blast cancels) for all characters, fixed "false" stuns, and more.

The mod is currently handled by Sloth.

Sloth is: The top player for competitive shin budokai, one of the admins in the discord server, and helps players improve.

name: Dreamrealm's Tower of Despair
summary:
Dreamrealm's Tower of Despair is a first person RPG whose action happens inside a haunted tower where dungeon-crawler mechanics meet a light but disturbing horror ambience. The story revolves around a knight of light that embarks onto a quest to fight an evil vampire that deceives his followers into blood rituals and sacrifices for his own gain.

Throughout the tower, you'll have to gather more and more clues and lore pieces to build evidence against this hellish envoy. Moreso, important heirlooms of your creed will be found at some point to give you advantage against Malgrym's acolytes, and even against himself.

At times, you'll get hints about what's happening from the victims themselves, even more their riddles or level puzzles will take you further in progression. Using your Journal and the ability to search for hidden clues will be your utmost aid throughout this tower.

The light horror ambience is combined with combat scenes to immerse you in this parallel world from within the Dreamrealm Universe where the Light takes its toll against the corrupted nightmares affecting the veil of sleep.

name: Dream Fallen
summary: Dream fallen is a remake of a game launched 13 years ago, beside of the remake it also bring a continuation for the plot changing few aspects of the game like gameplay and puzzles. The game pass in a well know village and the goal is to solve all the tasks and stay alive to tell it.

name: Drizzle
summary: In Drizzle, drift off on a cozy journey to fulfill an old frog's wish. Reel in a host of unique fish in a variety of inspiring aquatic locales, help out and befriend an adorable cast of froggy friends, and maybe, just maybe... find something incredible.

name: Dragon Conqueror
summary: The dragons are long gone. The Dragon Hunt Frenzy made sure of it. But Rayleigh, the disciple of the Sword Saint, is still trapped in the past. Just as she was about to abandon her search for the truth, she finally discovers information about the appearance of the Black Dragon.

name: Dreadcore: Locked Unit
summary: A first-person psychological horror game focused on exploration, puzzle-solving, and environmental storytelling. Discover the tragic story of Unit 199, where a fragmented consciousness still haunts the place.

name: Draugar
summary: Fight through unyielding hordes of ancient Nordic undeads. Set during WW2, you and up to 3 other survivors must hold the line against the Draugar.

name: Dragonfly
summary: Before becoming Pilotwings, it was called Dragonfly and was a 3D shooter involving a dragonfly-like machine instead of a simulator.

name: Drill Rift
summary: Build and manage a remote drill outpost in this turn-based strategy game. Upgrade strategic machinery and level up your dwarfs so they succeed. Balance resource management, strategic upgrades, and the mental toll of the rift. Because the deeper you drill, the louder the whispers grow.

name: Dragons and Elves
summary: This is a very traditional turn based strategy game. If you enjoy constantly fighting monsters, collecting guidebooks, experiencing and cultivating various characters, and enjoying the thrill of character growth, then please give this game a try .....

name: Dreamscapes: The Sandman - Collector's Edition
summary: Save Laura from her nightmares and help her wake up in this hidden object puzzle adventure. Collector’s Edition extras include 15 additional locations, concept art, wallpapers, screensavers and original soundtrack.

name: Dragon Rancher
summary: A dragon ranching sim where you find, hatch, raise, and care for your dragons while building a home in a ruined world. Breed dragons, explore the land, and grow your ranch in this cozy creature care adventure.

name: Dream Mayday
summary: You are "Dream Supporters" — protectors of dreams. Working together from two perspectives — dream and reality — you must ensure the peaceful sleep of residents through cooperative gameplay. Don’t miss any signs of disturbance, and team up to deliver a perfect night's rest by 9:00 AM!

name: Draw Shooter
summary: Draw your bullet

name: Dragon Ruins II: Aftermath
summary: A standalone expansion for a dungeon crawler for tired people.

name: Drone District
summary: Drone District is an adrenaline-charged FPV arcade experience that mashes up the flow of Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater with the freedom of Burnout Paradise—but with drones. Master flight tricks, grind power lines, launch off rooftops, chain mid-air stunts, and explore an open world.

name: Dream Of
summary:
A brand-new type of awakening!
End and wake up alongside your favorite character!

name: Dreaming in Cherry Blossoms, I Fall in Love With You
summary: Set in a small town where reality and daydreams softly blur, this visual novel invites you on a quiet, emotional journey. As the scenery slowly changes, you embark on a journey to face the feelings you once forgot— searching for something that surely existed, somewhere in the past.

name: Dr. Mario Mania
summary: Dr. Mario Mania is an unofficial fan-game based of the Dr. Mario series, bringing new features and improvements to the classic formula!

name: Dream Tower
summary: This is a hyper-casual idle game for office workers, where players collect maritime materials and treasure chests for lucky draws. Focused on material collection, it's simple and perfect for relaxing at work.

name: Dreeg
summary: Dreeg is a multi-dimensional Metroidvania adventure. Shift between three parallel dimensions to explore, solve puzzles, and battle fierce enemies. Upgrade your Pulsar Suit and Forge to unlock unique abilities. Unravel the mysteries, avenge your fallen companion, and save the multiverse.

name: DreamPuzzle
summary: VR jigsaw Game. Step into the enchanting world of Dream Puzzle, where your creativity and puzzle-solving skills bring 3D objects to life! In this immersive VR experience, you'll encounter floating puzzle pieces drifting through the air, waiting for you to assemble them into stunning 3D forms.

name: Dragged Deep
summary: Explore a hidden sewer beneath the forest in this tense survival horror game. Play solo or with friends, solve puzzles, stay quiet, and escape a maze of shifting tunnels while a deadly predator hunts you by sound. One wrong move—and you're not getting out.

name: Draconis Race
summary: Adds a race of half dragons.

name: Dress-Up With Helene: Deluxe!
summary:
Helene Marylin becomes your dress-up doll in this cute little Dress-up game!
Mix and match with 300+ different articles of clothing and accessories!

name: Drunken Wolf
summary: During a hangover, the wolf always hunts anime girls. No one can escape from the wolf. Wolf simulator with innovative VFX drunkenness effect. Eat all anime girls.

name: Draw Sword
summary: Draw Sword is a physics-based drawing game. You control a stickman by drawing lines to move and attack. Use smart thinking and timing to beat your opponent — every line is a fun sword fight!

name: Droppy Ball
summary: Drop, combine, and explode your way to massive scores in Droppy Ball! Merge colorful spheres, unleash satisfying chain reactions, and chase the ultimate combo in this addictive physics puzzler.

name: Draw Sword
summary: Draw Sword combines the elements of Chinese fairy and meat pigeon to create a rogue like game with the theme of Chinese fairy. The choice of rewards is very important, and the reflection on the arrangement of skills and weapon also needs serious consideration.

name: Drinking Song
summary: 3D grass-cutting game: Players need to control their characters to avoid continuously respawning monsters. After the monsters respawn, they will chase the player. Upon contact, the player will lose health until they die. Players can craft equipment using materials to enhance their survival abilities

name: Drinking Medieval
summary: You are a simple peasant living in medieval times, working for your feudal lord. One day, you discover the recipe for brewing beer. This changes your life - improve your brewing skills, unlock new sales channels, and expand your product across growing territories.

name: Drink Factory Simulator
summary: Build your own drink factory, discover recipes, improve production, and fulfill customer orders to grow your beverage empire! Drink Factory Simulator is a fun simulation game that combines creativity and strategy.

name: Druggiemon: Lost Edition
summary: The Lost Edition is an arbitrary placement in the Druggiemon franchise timeline, it’s more of a paradoxical prequel/sequel as in the beginning and the end combined, as well as a “timeline that should not exist” so you have to beat the game to destroy it. And the lore ties in with Druggiemon’s main story either way for the God Druggiemon and Anti-God (legendary Druggiemon are called Divine Druggiemon)

name: Dreampainters
summary: Put your creativity to the test in this first-person puzzle game! Discover the surreal world of an artist's dreams and use a paintbrush to unfold its mysteries with striking colors. Or grab a friend to paint your dreams together in two-player co-op mode!

name: Driftline Peaks
summary: Driftline Peaks is a retro-style touge racer where speed and control collide on winding mountain roads. With arcade inspired physics and a low poly PS1 aesthetic, it captures the thrill of downhill sprints and uphill climbs, balancing tight cornering and controlled slides.

name: Dragon Assault
summary: Take control of a powerful dragon, navigating through dangerous terrains, shooting down monsters, and defeating waves of incoming enemies. Collect energy to enhance the dragon's abilities, challenge increasingly difficult levels, and ultimately conquer all foes to achieve victory.

name: Dragon Knights Chronicle
summary: Nintendo Switch Exclusive! An unprecedented alliance of the Demon Lord's daughter, vampires, elves and knights! A fantasy strategy SRPG where bonds matter!

name: Drow Space Shooter
summary: You are the new hot shot space Cadet fresh out of the Terran Space Force academy in the year 2247 when the alien invasion of the solar system begins. Fly your spaceship through planetary landscapes firing advanced technology weapons and managing ship subsystems to defeat waves of enemies.

name: Dr Voss' Escape Room
summary: Dr. Voss' Escape Room is a relaxing multiplayer puzzle game for up to 4 friends. Explore a mysterious lab, solve challenging puzzles, and uncover secrets to create the immortality potion. Perfect for those who love teamwork, creativity, and a chill escape room experience!

name: Dragons Reef VR
summary: Start an exciting sailing adventure in virtual reality. Steer the ship, shoot cannons, transport goods, develop the skills of your captain. Use special skills and magical artifacts to defend the land of the dragon reef from pirates. VR, dragons, pirates, sea battles, fantasy, family friendly game

name: Dreams of a Ghost
summary: Follow the story of Mil, a young girl who’s lost touch with her childhood friend, Vin, and meets her in a dream. The story follows her reconnecting with herself and her friends through the dream world, and maybe in real life…?

name: Dr. Mario World: Version 2.0.0
summary:
Changelog:

- Added a new mode, Skill Summit.
- New packs and doctor referrals are now available for purchase.
- Made other minor adjustments.

name: DreamWoods 2
summary: DreamWoods 2 is a puzzle game where you guide a little girl through grid-based levels filled with different blocks. Match blocks to clear obstacles, use bombs to blast your way through, and outsmart a mischievous witch to reach the exit door. Between levels, collect points to decorate your magical garden and progress along a winding path toward the witch’s castle.

name: Dragon Cave
summary: Dragon Cave is an online adoptables game. Collect eggs, raise them to adulthood, and then breed them to create interesting lineages.

name: Dressing Room
summary:
You are left alone to manage an old clothing store and deal with the customers...

It’s closing time at the local clothing store, and you’re the last one on duty. You must do your tasks: Clean the store, tidy the racks, and keep an eye on the dressing rooms... Something is going on in there...

name: Dream of Things
summary: Dream of Things is an adventure puzzle game packed with mystery. You had died in a bathtub and acquired the ability to talk to inanimate things. You need to enter their dreams to help them fulfill their wishes and figure out what happened.

name: Droiyan Online
summary: Droiyan Online is a fantasy MMORPG developed by Mgame. The current service area is Korea and China.

name: Dragonnet Havoc
summary: A game about building a team to fight and defend the town. Prepare at daytime and fight at night in a mix between a tower defense, real-time strategy and creature collection game.

name: Dread Meridian
summary: Dread Meridian is a survival horror adventure for VR. Play as Daniela on a desperate search for her lost sister on an frozen island spiraling into madness. Scavenge for resources, solve cryptic puzzles and battle unimaginable creatures while unraveling the mystery of her disappearance.

name: Drawdl.io
summary: Drawdl.io is a free to play pictionary style game with a variety of drawing game modes. Draw, and then guess the words before the time runs out to earn points!

name: Dragon's Chronicles: Ankoku Daimaou to Hokuto no Tsurugi
summary: Command two armies and resolve the continental turmoil in this traditional, robust, and highly authentic simultaneous turn-based strategy.

name: Drugs & Gambling
summary: What Would Your Mother Think!

name: Dragon Snack
summary: Golden Dragon Trail

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Day One Edition
summary:
Relive the Dragon Ball story by time traveling and protecting historic moments in the Dragon Ball universe
Next-gen visuals bring the Dragon Ball anime experience to life
New characters and boss fights
Brand new hub city more than 7X the size of the original game with 300 players online at the same time
More in depth character creation system and battle adjustments

name: Drod RPG 2
summary:
DROD RPG 2 is a 2D puzzle adventure dungeon crawl with resource management, RPG, and move optimization elements. This sequel to "DROD RPG" features an all new three-chapter campaign with adjustable difficulty settings, plus new graphics, music, game elements, quality-of-life features, and an upgraded level editor with vastly expanded scripting support.

This is a "Magic Tower" game like Tower of the Sorcerer, Desktop Dungeons, and Tactical Nexus.

DROD RPG 2 combines DROD's puzzle elements, strategy, worldbuilding, and story backdrop with player stats, weapons and armor, one-on-one monster duels, items, custom power-ups and treasure.

As a puzzle/logic game, level layouts, items, enemy encounters, and treasures are all hand-crafted to bring you a series of engaging, well thought-out puzzles that are a joy to solve. Navigate through series of interlocking rooms, looking for the exit on each level. Spend hit points and resources wisely to power up and advance. Decide which pre-placed monsters to fight along the way. Battles resolve deterministically according to a clear set of rules. Get rewards from defeating enemies now or come back later when you're more powerful and can take less damage.

name: Drunk but Not Wasted Knight
summary: A tipsy tale of questionable choices, suspiciously charming strangers, and conversations that unravel faster than your sobriety. What begins as a harmless chat in the alley might end with truffle mushrooms, a missing crown, or waking up in someone else's dungeon. You've been warned.

name: Drone Smuggler
summary: DRONE SMUGGLER is an old-school, top-down space shooter with ship customization, randomly generated levels & obstacles to navigate/destroy, and thematic sounds that seek to capture some of the magic of classic video game music & effects. Battle shadespace hazards and fight for the HIGH SCORE!

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse - Day One Edition
summary: Dragon Ball Xenoverse is the first installment of the Xenoverse series and the Dragon Ball game developed by Dimps. It is the first fighting game to feature full 3D battles similar to the Budokai Tenkaichi series. Fighters can traverse the levels free-roaming in large spaces and can fight on ground, in the air and underwater. The game features spoken dialogue from a majority of main characters while in battle, and characters show facial expressions when they strike an opponent or take damage. Although limited, the players have some freedom to explore the planet Earth as it exists in the Dragon Ball universe along with a handful of other locations.

name: Draftula
summary: Every 100 years, Count Draftula returns to wreck havoc on this Mortal World. He remains in power until a hero of mankind strong enough to defeat him shows up to topple his reign. But before that, Draftula has to build his castle first.

name: Dream Strikers
summary: Dream Strikers is a high-mobility 3D action fighting game set in a cyber-fantasy world. Choose to become a Hunter of conviction or fall into darkness as a Nightmare. Execute fast-paced combos, dodge skillfully, and finish with ultimate moves in a clash of belief and obsession.

name: Dreamcatcher 2003
summary: A unique psychological horror game featuring strange characters, many different types of gameplay, lots of monsters, and a full narrative (No chapters) that is sure to be the greatest game you have ever played ever

name: Drift Cart
summary: "Drift Cart" is a drift cart racing game that supports both multiplayer and single-player modes. Featuring 15 maps, the game requires players to reach the finish line without crossing boundaries or colliding to clear a level.

name: Dragon Ball Fierce Fighting
summary: A fan game based on Dragon Ball, made in Flash.

name: Dressmaker
summary:
Dressmaker is a cozy game inspired by real dressmaking.

Become a dressmaker, choose dress designs, cut out fabric and sew them all together to satisfy (or sabotage!) customers.

name: Dream Walker
summary: Play as an acolyte of Morpheus. Enter into peoples' dreams. Help soothe their dreams, or devastate them as you shepherd this small village.

name: Drift Highway: Retro Console Edition
summary: Race down an endless retro highway, weaving through traffic to the sound of liquid drum & bass. Breathe in the neon dusk, relax, and let the engine's roar blend with the music.

name: Drive Thru
summary: A fast paced time management cooking game where you run a drive thru. Manage your kitchen, be precise and serve your customers fast! Don't drop the food or burn the fries!

name: Drake And The Wizards
summary: You are Drake, a little dragon who will embark on your adventure in order to defeat the bad black magician who turned your friends into stone ! Complete the levels and fight enemies. On your way, catch the treasures and objects that will give you power.

name: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2026
summary: Start as a coordinator and rise to head coach in Draft Day Sports: College Football 26! Build playbooks, recruit stars, manage team cohesion, and outsmart adaptive AI. Create your dynasty with unmatched depth and strategy.

name: Dragon Ball Sparking Zero: Shallot (Dragon Ball Legends)
summary: Shallot from the mobile game DRAGON BALL LEGENDS joins the battle!

name: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined
summary: DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined is a modern remake of DRAGON QUEST VII, which originally launched on PlayStation in 2000. In this new reimagined version of the game, the core concept of the original title remains, but the battle mechanics, graphics and story have all been updated and improved, providing players with a more streamlined and focused experience. In particular, the graphics in the game were completely overhauled from the original, using real-life doll figures for the characters and monsters that were scanned into the game to create stunning hand-crafted visuals. This definitive version of the game is perfect for fans who want to revisit the beloved story or newcomers who are diving into the world for the first time.

name: Dry Hard: Laundry Simulator
summary: Run your own dry cleaning shop in a charming, cozy small town. Wash, dry, and press clothes to perfection, serve quirky customers, invest in new machines and upgrades for faster service, and stay organized to carefully complete each order. Mend rips, remove stains, and more.

name: Dream On
summary: Dream On is a very short, atmospheric walking simulator (5-10 minutes) about making a wish. Walk through a symbolic dreamscape, explore your thoughts and feelings, and make a quiet, meaningful choice at the end of the journey.

name: Dragon Quest VII: Reimagined - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Purchase DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined early and receive a costume for your Hero along with other helpful items.

[Early Bird Bonus]
・Trodain Togs (appearance changing costume for your Hero)
・Seed of Proficiency x3

*These items will only be available to customers who purchase the game by 23:59 on 4 March 2026.
*The "Seed of Proficiency" is an item that can be obtained by progressing in the game.
*These bonus items can be received from the "Claim Special Rewards" menu in-game.

[Purchase Bonus]
・Blue Slime Shield
*This bonus item can be received from the "Claim Special Rewards" menu in-game.

[Contents]
・DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined base game
・DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined "Additional DLC Sets"
Additional DLC - The Road of Regal Wretches
Additional DLC - Luminary's Livery
Additional DLC - Jam-Packed Swag Bag
・48 hours of early access
・White Wolf Costume (Appearance changing costume for Ruff)

name: Drink Stand Tycoon
summary: Drink Stand Tycoon is a casual business management tycoon game. Whether you're looking to relax and manage stats or destroy the competition, Drink Stand Tycoon offers an approachable yet detailed experience both new and old tycoon fans will enjoy!

name: Dragon-Slaying War God
summary: This officially licensed Legend of Mir game features the classic Iron Triangle class system, three classes with free transfers, and hero team-ups, offering a brand-new combat experience! BOSSes lurk everywhere, with legendary gear exploding everywhere; Shabak sieges and exciting PKs! This game perfectly recreates the classic Legend of Mir gameplay.

name: Dragon Quest Smash/Grow
summary: Dragon Quest Smash/Grow is an intuitive and exhilarating roguelite RPG where players smash their way through hordes of monsters to gain strength and then finish them off with Dragon Quest’s signature Coup de Grâce attacks. Players can choose between random Blessings skills to enhance their character growth and battle strategy, allowing them to match an ever-changing tactical situation.

name: DreamPusher
summary: Easy operation with just a tap! It's a medal pusher game like in an arcade! The maximum number of JP payouts is 99999, which is a threat!

name: DreamBig 3
summary: DreamBig 3 is the continuation of the "DreamBig" puzzle game series.DreamBig 3 is an adult game with 2 play modes: a Puzzle Mode and a Story Mode

name: Drag Deal
summary: Drag Deal is a multiplayer game where you can play with your friends or other players online! It is a Casual game with minigames and customize your model.

name: Draw the Road
summary: Each of us wants to do what he wants. Why don't you start right now?

name: Dream Knight
summary: Welcome to "Dream Knight", this is a highly playable ACT+Rougelike game. You will play 4 heroes with different playstyles, experience bloody battles, and grow stronger in countless reincarnations. 6 major levels/massive skill branches/huge weapon system, enjoy the fantasy world!

name: Dreadful Night at School
summary: A thriller set in the corridors of a high school during a sleepover. Experience a dark story where an ordinary sleepover turns into a fight for survival. Find the murderer before everyone loses their life!

name: Dreaming
summary: This game is a game where you defeat enemies who attack you in a dreamlike space. You can enjoy relaxing music and a mysterious atmosphere. Defeat enemies quickly with dynamic actions in a total of 10 maps. There is a shocking story hidden at the end.

name: Dress the Duel
summary: "Dress the Duel," is a roguelike deckbuilding game where your cards are your wardrobe and your outfit is your arsenal!Build a versatile wardrobe, disrobe strategically, layer outfits for powerful effects, and Dress the Duel!

name: Drug Business
summary: Drug Business is a single player simulation game. Plunge headlong into the gangland and experience the thrill of knowing that you're beyond the law. Develop your business: grow and sell your goods, improve your possession.

name: Drift Showcase
summary: Awesome side-scrolling drifting experience. Showcase your skill, impress the crowd and gather more fans, earn credits, buy cars and tune your ride. Enjoy the awesome graphics and custom vehicle physics.

name: Dragon Maiden: Blossoms of the Past
summary: Dragon Maiden is a 2D pixel-art mystery adventure. As Wang Xie, you're trapped in a time loop on the day of the Mountain God Ceremony. Relive the 22 hours before midnight, uncover the truth behind the village's destruction, and break free from the cycle.

name: Drop Duchy: The Tribe
summary: The Tribe is the first DLC for Drop Duchy, introducing a brand new playable faction inspired by mystical druids and ancient monuments. Explore a different approach to the game that invites you to rethink your strategies across every mode, with a focus on smart tile placement, exploration mechanic and combos synergies.

name: Dragons of 1066
summary: Dragons of 1066 is a classic turn-based fantasy board game for 2-4 players in online or local play. Gather your friends and fight The War for Mythic Europe in real-time or asynchronous battle. Plan your strategy, recruit your armies, then risk it all in a throw of the dice for victory.

name: Dreaming
summary: "Dreaming" is a short episodic minimalistic first person story, of a man's journey to the Dreamingland. He is determined to find the girl who calls to him. Are you ready to go through the horizon and find the impossible world, the place where reality and dreams are intertwined?

name: Drug Dealer: Schedule I
summary:
In Drug Dealer: Schedule I, you’re not just pushing product—you’re building an empire. Start small, flipping low-grade supply in back alleys, then climb your way up to managing labs, controlling distribution, and running the streets like a pro.

Expand your network, recruit a crew you can trust (or at least afford), and outsmart rivals and law enforcement. Every decision counts: one smart move can make you a fortune, one mistake can take it all away.

Refine your supply chain, dominate your territory, and keep your reputation sharp. This isn’t about chaos—it’s about strategy, growth, and staying one step ahead.

Hustle smart. Grow fast. Own everything.

name: Dreaming About You
summary: Dive into Dreaming About You, a poignant drama visual novel that explores the intense connection between two schoolgirls during a summer holiday filled with unexpected passion. Experience a raw and emotional LGBTQ+ romance set in the idyllic backdrop of a rural village, where their lives intertwine in ways neither could have imagined.

name: DrakkenRidge
summary:
You are a Hunter, a Novice of the Mage Order, an ancestral organization tasked with policing the usage of magic, particularly during the First Kingdoms’ War. You will explore the world of DrakkenRidge and save the kingdom from a dark conspiracy.
The world of DrakkenRidge is composed of 5 islands, and many dungeons.

name: Dream Trials
summary: Somehow, someway you achieved a complete balance between life and death. The universe has taken notice and now you must undergo the Dream Trials.

name: DragonRoad
summary: This is an open world game on 3D, Also a mission centered survival battle game. It includes role-playing, tactical strategy, experience upgrade.It has Dozens scenes and combat tasks, allowing players to complete tasks and receive rewards. It support multi people cooperation on network.

name: Dropcore
summary: Dropcore is a 2D online arena game where players use knockback, not damage, to eliminate opponents. Master gravity, dodge bullets, and blast rivals off the stage in chaotic maps. Choose your class, grab a weapon, and outplay your friends in fast-paced physics brawls.

name: Drifter Star: Evolution
summary: From a stardust speck to a galaxy-devouring titan. In this unique cosmic evolution game, experience the full life cycle from asteroid to galaxy. Each consumption brings growth; each evolution requires choice. The universe's ultimate secrets await your discovery.

name: Draw to Smash: Logic Puzzle
summary:
Passionate about brain teasers? Want to challenge your logical skills? Then take a look at Draw To Smash — a logic puzzle game in which you should draw a line, scribbles, figures or doodles to smash all the bad eggs.

Draw To Smash is an amusing logic game that will test your IQ and raise your intellectual abilities to a new level. Plan every step, estimate a possible outcome and build tactical strategies. Solve logical puzzles, pass interesting levels and open bonus levels.

Сollect golden keys — use them to open the treasure chest. Gold coins and skill stars will be inside. These stars will help you to increase your rating in the game. The more you play, the more stars you have and the higher your rating is. Train your brain and pass the way from a beginner to a guru in the world of teasers and physics games.

Joyful music and fun voices will cheer everyone up, and emotional faces won't leave anyone indifferent. You will never get bored with this game: it is constantly updated with interesting levels, characters and accessories for them.

Take a break from the hustle and bustle of everyday life — have fun and enjoy.

name: Drift Gang
summary: Drift with up to 8 friends in a fun and physics-based cart game! Drift, bump, and overtake on competitive tracks or just relax and drive on chill maps. Whether you're here to win or to have fun, Crazy Cart offers a smooth and exciting driving experience!

name: Dr. Kyanta
summary: A puzzle game spinoff of Ultra Fight Da! Kyanta 2. As Dr. Kyanta or Masako, move around the grid to break colored blocks across the board, or go head-to-head against another player or the CPU, and be the first to obtain 5 stars to claim victory.

name: Dream City
summary: A Metroidvania-like decryption game. Players come to a mysterious building with rich and interesting interactive props. Players need to learn to use these props to overcome difficulties and leave the building

name: Dragon Pow!
summary: The world is under siege, but you have an ace up your sleeve—a mighty dragon! Ride through epic battles, devour enemy attacks, and turn the tide by spitting explosive damage.

name: Drop: Save the Forest
summary: In Drop: Save the Forest, use the power of water to solve environmental puzzles, extinguish wildfires, and save biomes inspired by the Dolomites. ️ Combine elements like wind, fire, and plants in a lively pixel art adventure.

name: Drive Me Broke
summary: Build your dream car! The cops are always on your back, so stay on good terms with them... Also, be prepared to do any job that requires money.

name: DreamHero
summary: DreamHero is an overhead action-adventure game focusing on hero capture and diverse combat. Players can turn defeated enemies into controllable heroes, experiencing single-player stories, Roguelike, 1V1, 5V5, 20-player battle royales, and cooperative dungeons, blending strategy and operational fun.

name: Dragon Survival
summary: Stranded on a mysterious island with a baby dragon, survive and grow stronger. Gather resources, build your base, and overcome trials left behind by ancient explorers. An open-world survival RPG blending exploration, crafting, combat, and dragon growth.

name: Dragon Age: The Veilguard - Rook's Weapons Appearance Offer
summary: Rise as Rook in Dragon Age: The Veilguard. This offer includes Rook’s Weapon Appearance Set for all players who own the game.

name: Drone Wars
summary: Pilot armed drones in immersive FPV, coordinate tactical assaults, and conquer dynamic vertical arenas in this fast‑paced eSports FPS.

name: Dreiframe
summary: Dive into the decaying machine world of DREIFRAME, a pixel-art metroidvania packed with challenge. As a Frame, a sword-wielding robot, fight brutal enemies, exploit their weaknesses, unlock powerful but risky abilities, and uncover the land’s story through exploration and combat.

name: Drawn to Drift
summary: A competitive space racing game. Drift on player built tracks for the best times and claim your rank on the global leaderboards.

name: Drawquarium
summary: Draw your own fish and unlock new ways to decorate your aquarium. If you feed them well, they will gain a metallic shimmer as they age. Will you be the one to raise a golden fish in this relaxing sandbox experience?

name: Dream Eater
summary: Dream Eater is a turn-based RPG about exploring a dark land that dreams no more. Recruit new party members, slay monsters, manage resources, and craft items as you journey to Originaught Castle in search of answers. Can you help them dream again?

name: Drone-Locked
summary: In this First Person Shooter, take on a dangerous mission in infiltration and battling Autonomous Drones. Will you uncover the conspiracy?

name: Dream Cat Paradise
summary: Dream Cat, the feline of dream exists everywhere in the world. Even in your pocket! Are you ready to find these cute little cats from your everyday items.

name: Dragon Quest X: Jikuu no Mayoigo-tachi Online
summary: Dragon Quest X: Jikuu no Mayoigotachi Online is the seventh major expansion for Dragon Quest X, known as Version 8. It adds a new story, characters, and content as part of the ongoing Dragon Quest X experience, but requires prior access to earlier Dragon Quest X Online content (or the All-In-One version covering versions 1–7) to play.

name: Drowning Ashes
summary: The Ashes ignite once more, and the floodwaters rise to drown an accursed kingdom. Explore the ruins of the Capital, recruit wild monsters, and find a way to end the ruinous Cycle in this turn-based monster collector from the makers of Guile & Glory: Firstborn.

name: Dragon Crystal
summary:
A roguelike "dungeon" crawler that leads you through 30 levels on your quest to find a way to return to your own world.

You're caught in a fantastic world of unearthly beauty and deadly demons. You'll pass through thirty worlds in search of the Magic Goblet. There's no way out of this musical nightmare...until you find it.

Master System version of Dragon Crystal features updated graphics and a new soundtrack.

name: Dragon Crystal II
summary: Dragon Crystal II is a sequel to Dragon Crystal and released on Sega's Sonic Cafe service for mobile phones.

name: DreamEcho
summary: Dream Echo is an RogueLite ARPG game where players can explore the world of Dreams and acquire various Concepts to engage in nearly completely free-form combination battles. Additionally, you can gather Memories upon waking, allowing you to bring some Concepts into your next dream adventure...

name: Drunkard Simulator
summary: Drink. Stumble. Cause chaos. Drunkard Simulator lets you turn your neighborhood into a boozy playground of impulsive stunts and slapstick mayhem.

name: Dragonsbane Sword Brawdia High!
summary: This is the enhanced edition of the short, puzzle-like SRPG 「滅竜剣ブラウディア」, originally released as a free game in 2025. It now includes additional content and full English support. Enjoy the small but heartfelt adventures of Sphie, Lyon, and two new adventurers joining the story.

name: Dragon Fall
summary: An action RPG game, real-time combat, use of magic, swords, bombs, harpoons, boomerangs, bows and arrows, and other items scattered throughout the game, 2D graphics with animations and frantic combat, all this together with an epic story focused on dragons and gigantic mythological creatures.

name: DriveWave
summary: Every keystroke powers your car across endless neon highways, from glowing deserts to midnight forests. Collect, customize, and embark on a driving journey, all while boosting your productivity.

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Ultimate Edition Bonus
Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Season Pass Bonus
Dragon Quest VII Reimagined: Jam-Packed Swag Bag
summary:
A set of items that can be used in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined.

An assortment of items to assist your adventure!
Set forth on your journey with these helpful items!

[Contents]
・Slime Sword x1
・Slime Boomerang x1
・Slime Stick x1
・Metal Slime Heart (Grants experience boost) x1
・Gold Golem Heart (Grants gold boost) x1
・Medicinal Herb x9
・Single Phial x3
・Seed of Strength x1
・Seed of Resilience x1
・Seed of Life x1

name: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined: Luminary's Livery
summary:
Dress up as the characters from DRAGON QUEST XI: Echoes of an Elusive Age with this costume set!
Put these outfits on from time to time for a nice change of pace!

[Contents]
・Luminary's Livery (Appearance changing costume for your Hero)
・Spiky Sidekick's Costume (Appearance changing costume for Kiefer)
・Red Sisterly Smock (Appearance changing costume for Maribel)
・Green Sisterly Smock (Appearance change costume for Maribel)
・Fully Fabulous Finery (Appearance change costume for Ruff)
・Warrior Princess Wardrobe (Appearance change costume for Aishe)
・Auld Rogue's Outfit (Appearance change costume for Sir Mervyn)

name: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined: The Road of Regal Wretches
summary:
Challenge legendary demon kings from the DRAGON QUEST series’ Erdrick Trilogy in the Battle Arena! Defeat them to earn valuable rewards, including “Erdrick’s Sword”!

[Monsters you can fight in The Road of Regal Wretches]
・The Original Demon
・Master of Destruction
・The Lord of Darkness

name: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined: White Wolf Costume
summary: Appearance changing costume for Ruff

name: Drunkonauts
summary: Drunkonauts is a chaotic multiplayer party game with hilarious physics-based combat, crazy weapons and JETPACKS! Battle friends in local or online matches, use unpredictable movement and wacky attacks to send opponents flying, stay on the map, avoid dangerous hazards and claim victory!

name: Drone Delivery: FPV Simulator
summary: Fly smart, deliver faster.

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 26
summary:
Build your basketball dynasty in Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 26, the deepest and most customizable pro basketball management simulation available. Step into the role of general manager as you draft, trade, and develop players while managing the salary cap and long-term team building.

This year’s version features a refreshed, modern UI for a smoother experience, a new player archetype system to help identify roles and playing styles, smarter AI that adapts and creates unique league storylines, and expanded game presentation updates that bring your vision to life on the court.

Customize your universe with powerful editing tools — create teams, players, logos, and even entire leagues to design the basketball world of your dreams. Whether you want to recreate today’s pro landscape, build your own fictional league, or relive historic eras, DDS: Pro Basketball 26 gives you the tools to do it.

With deep strategy, immersive presentation, and unlimited customization, no other basketball sim delivers a franchise experience like this.

name: Dragon Song Tavern: Festival of the Returning Tides DLC
summary: The Festival of the Returning Tides special DLC is now available for free!

name: Dragon Song Tavern: Pumpkin Masquerade DLC
summary: Dragon Song Tavern: Pumpkin Masquerade! When candlelight flickers, the tavern transforms into a pumpkin party!

name: Dragon Quest I HD-2D Remake
summary: A remake of the first Dragon Quest game in HD-2D, released as part of the Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake bundle.

name: Dragon Quest II HD-2D Remake
summary: A remake of the second Dragon Quest game in HD-2D, released as part of the Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake bundle.

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 26
summary:
Step into the front office and take total control of your favorite football franchise in Draft Day Sports: Pro Football 26. This is the ultimate pro football simulation experience—designed for fans who want the depth, strategy, and freedom that other games overlook.

Build your dynasty from the ground up. Manage every detail of your team’s journey—from drafting the next superstar, negotiating key contracts, and scouting opponents, to setting weekly gameplans and making the tough calls on game day. Smart AI ensures every season feels fresh and competitive, while enhanced presentation brings your franchise to life like never before.

Enjoy expanded customization, refined player progression, and deeper in-game strategy options. Whether you’re a master roster-builder or a sideline strategist, you’ll find countless ways to put your mark on the league.

name: Drownload
summary: You wake up alone in an underwater bunker with no memory of what happened. Guided by Ed, a friendly robot, you explore, solve puzzles, and uncover dark secrets. But when another AI, Ev, reaches out, you must decide who to trust — and what’s really true.

name: Drifties
summary: Arcade racing turned up to eleven!

name: Dragon Quest HD-2D Erdrick Trilogy Collection
summary: Three legendary adventures. One definitive bundle.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Future Saga: Chapter 4
Drug Empire
summary: Drug Empire is a casual simulator game where you grow, synthesize and distribute products to build your underground empire. Manage production, inventory, and distribution network while unlocking new ways to expand your operation!

name: Dream Animal
summary: Listen closely to your inner voice... and discover which animal you are!?

name: Dream
summary: Dream is a 2.5D adventure where Luna explores the dream world while conquering dreamlike mazes by rotating the environments to uncover poem fragments and memories of her late father, seeking the warmth of his lost embrace through non-linear puzzle-solving.

name: Dreadfull Death
summary: You find yourself in the terrifying house of an unknown maniac. You don’t remember how you got here, but you know one thing—you won’t survive here for long. You must escape within a few days, but it won’t be so easy...

name: Dreadarion VR
summary: Experience a VR survival horror where you battle eerie creatures and solve hands-on VR puzzles in immersive dark worlds. Manage resources, upgrade your gear, and face relentless, twisted dangers to escape the nightmare.

name: Dreaded Conquest
summary: Dreaded Conquest is a real-time strategy game of grand-scale control, where you lead sinister forces to spread your influence across a procedurally-generated world. Use your units and skills to conquer cities and crush mortal forces.

name: Dreaded Wunder
summary: Dreaded Wunder is a psychological horror game set in a twisted version of Norwich, Featuring local myths and legends with a hint of Eldritch horror. Navigate the contorted world that lies before you and find a way to escape fate by relying on a mobile phone to survive!

name: Dreadful Defenders
summary: Choose an ancient deity to worship and use its power to defeat the unbelievers. Find Relics with eldritch abilities. Summon dreadful Defenders with unique traits, control the path by placing them, and combine their Benedictions to create otherworldly synergies!

name: Dreadful Delivery
summary: In the dead of night, when the streets are quiet and the neighborhood sleeps, you're on the clock, delivering packages no one else dares to touch. Each delivery is a race against time—and against the dangers lurking in the shadows. But the job pays well… if you can survive the night.

name: Dreadpeak
summary: In 16th-century Japan, a samurai sets out on a path of vengeance after losing his father and village. He engages in intense sword combat within a meticulously crafted world to end the tyrannical rule of the Akamori clan.

name: Dreadveil
summary: Dreadveil is an atmospheric horror shooter where you desperately scavenge for resources while avoiding terrible monsters. Balance scarce resources to solve one of many issues. Make short-term decisions to solve a more pressing problem which will then come back and bite you in the future.

name: Dread of Night
summary: Face the Dread, Survive the Night. An island has seemingly appeared just overnight in the middle of the ocean. Lost and stranded, the player searches for a way out but finds the island inhabited by a violent locals who stop at nothing to kill all outsiders.

name: Dreadline Express
summary: Dreadline Express is a 1st-person, curiosity-driven horror game set aboard the last human train. Unravel mysteries of the enigmatic train, face strange passengers, and shape your path using a unique card-based mechanic that gives you full narrative control. This is no longer our world.

name: Dreadmarrow
summary: Enter the dark, thrilling world of DR3ADMARROW! Recruit a powerful party and plunge into deadly dungeons, intense arenas, and epic raids. Battle fearsome foes, claim legendary loot, and carve your legend in a realm of danger and glory!

name: Drillbound
summary: Drillbound is a short incremental game about mining your way to the planet’s core. Crush layers of rock, gather resources, upgrade your drill, and unlock powerful technologies as you descend into the depths.

name: Dress An Angel
summary: This is a game where you can put clothes on an Angel,

name: Dream:scape Remastered
summary: Explore a surreal dream world built from one man’s memories in this remastered story-rich first-person mystery/adventure.

name: DrunKing
summary: A 3D action-comedy game where you control a drunken old man through chaotic challenges. Drink to score points, use crazy power-ups, discover relics, and customize your character with ridiculous outfits and mustaches. Test your reflexes and balance as the world spins out of control!

name: Dream Dazia
summary: Dream Dazia is a retro inspired 2D RPG where you explore open-world areas in Dazia's own nightmare. As Dazia - you solve puzzles, explore ways to level up, conquer any of the elemental temples in any order. Experience the turn-based combat, hidden secrets, custom bosses, exciting music and more!

name: Drakengard 3: Collector's Edition
summary:
The Drakengard 3 Collector's Edition is a limited-run package released exclusively for the Western market.

It includes:
Drakengard 3 Full Game (with reversible cover art)
Hardcover Prequel Novella
Soundtrack Sampler CD
Double-Sided Poster
Caim's Garb outfit DLC
One's Prequel Stage DLC
Giant Baby Hat DLC
Japanese Voice Pack DLC

name: Dreamstory
summary: Dreamstory is an RPG about a world where Dreams are real.

name: Drunken Cowboys
summary: Drunken Cowboys is a chaotic low-poly party arena shooter where drunken gunslingers clash in wild FFA battles. Spawn in the saloon, pick your drinks, unleash crazy bullet effects, and dive into fast, explosive mayhem with friends. And remember - you’ll have to reload that revolver yourself!

name: Drunken Baron
summary: Drunken Baron is a fast-paced 2D arcade shooter inspired by classic flappy-style games. Keep your plane in the air by tapping the button, fly through chaotic corridors, shoot invading aliens, drop bombs, and survive as long as you can!

name: Dream
summary: In the dream world, where reality dances with imagination, I found myself ensnared in a perplexing labyrinth of the mind. With each step, the scenery morphed, shifting between fantastical landscapes and bizarre distortions of logic. Desperate to break free, I embarked on a quest guided by surreal creatures and cryptic clues. After countless trials, I stumbled upon a glimmering portal, its light promising escape. With a leap of faith, I plunged through, awakening with a jolt as the dream dissolved around me. Yet, as I opened my eyes to the familiar world, a lingering sense of wonder and uncertainty remained, reminding me that perhaps the dream was not entirely over.

name: Dream Wave'84
summary: Leap, Collect, and Conquer in a Sci-Fi Rock Adventure! DreamWave'84 is a short and sweet 3D platforming adventure where exploration takes center stage. Players jump, run, and punch their way through visually distinct levels filled with strategically placed collectibles and exciting challenges.

name: Drone Fire
summary: Drive the drone on the keyboard and destroy the target. Targets also attack the drone in many ways. Weapons of the drone include machine guns and missiles. Each time you destroy the target with a machine gun, another missile is created.

name: Drive
summary: Need for spirit: Drive - a crime adventure in which you play as an illegal racer and try to escape from persecution. Your task is to leave the city before dawn. In this game you can expect a lot of driving a car, some achievements by hidden objects that you can find on map.

name: Drifted
summary: DRIFTED is a 3d horror mystery game, as you explore a mansion looking for your missing friend, you will find many secrets within as you uncover the mystery behind their disappearance. Between locked rooms and fighting monsters, who knows what you will uncover!

name: Dracu-Riot!
summary: Welcome to the Special Administrative Region "Aqua Eden", an artificial island off the coast of Japan where casinos and more are legal.

name: Dragon Gate: Tournament
summary: Compete in short, deadly sprints full of power-ups, dangers and fierce rivalries where only speed and skill mean survival. Are you ready to take the crown?

name: Dragonfly
summary: Rampage around in an armored cybernetic exoskeleton while armed ruffians try to give you high-velocity lead poisoning. Try not to die by making the ruffians die first.

name: Dragon Defense
summary: Dragon Defense is an action-packed, wave-based defense strategy game where you must build, craft, and protect your island from relentless monster invasions.

name: Dream Chaser
summary: Trapped in a strange world, the protagonist explores various dream worlds, escapes from a chaser, and finds the path to return to reality.

name: Dragon Jump
summary: Dragon Jump is a single input, precision platformed where you can either control the dragon yourself or build an AI to compete for you. Oh, and there’s a map editor, so you can design and share your own rage-inducing death traps.

name: Dreams
summary: A meditative incremental experience where you interact with dreams in four phases: discover, expand, enjoy, and release. Each phase offers unique mechanics that go beyond simple clicking, requiring concentration, engagement, and optimization. How many dreams can you weave before dawn?

name: Dream Team
summary: Dream Team is a cooperative precision platformer about making it to the top. Will you climb alone, and be broken by the game - or will you climb with your friends and break your friendship in the process? Only the strongest can get out of this prison.

name: Drone Wars
summary: Drone Wars is the most immersive war game ever made. Experience the horrors of modern combat, where explosive FPV drones stalk you through trenches, forests, and battle-torn cities. No HUD or glowing orbs. Detect enemies with sight, sound, and instinct. Resources are scarce. Death is permanent.

name: Dreamcore: Rabbit Hole
summary: Explore liminal spaces that feel eerily familiar and fire the imagination, like a dream you’ve already visited.

name: Draw in the Tray
summary: "Draw in the Tray" is a casual game.

name: Dragooner
summary: In the future the earth became an annoying place to live, because of the censors and the brain implants. Because of this, all your homies left the planet. It is up to you to go and find your homies and chill like the good days.

name: Dragon Dinner
summary: Cute but chaotic restaurant simulator where you play as a dragon waiter in a fast-paced dining rush. Set tables, serve hungry dragons, deliver the right dishes, and keep the place clean! After each day, customize the layout of the restaurant and learn new abilities to improve.

name: Dribble Bounces Back!
summary: A mobile game about a super ball bashing business bots to bits!

name: Dreadmyst
summary: Dreadmyst is an online fantasy RPG running on its own engine. Customize your stats and abilities as you slaughter the aberrations plaguing a cursed land. Choose from four playable classes, level up, farm gear, run dungeons (PvE), and fight other players (PvP). Tab target combat.

name: Dreams of Saturn 3.0
summary: Dreams of Saturn 3.0 – is an upgraded release of the Shenmue fan game released by George Kitchen last year. This conatins all content of Dos 1.0 and 2.0, allowing you to select a starting point depending on if you are playing the entire game fresh or for the first time, or already experienced Dreams of Saturn and wanted to jump straight ahead to the 2nd chapter.

name: Dragon Jumpers
summary: Jump to survive with up to 4 friends.

name: Drill and Delve
summary: You've been trapped in a mine. You'll need to use your tools to dig your way to the exit in a fully destructible 3D voxel terrain. Manage your oxygen and equipment, and uncover the dark mystery buried deep within the mine.

name: Dread Neighbor
summary: "Dread Neighbor" is a 3D first-person horror game. You are a young woman who moves into a cheap, new apartment to save money. But something is wrong. From the closets, under the bed, through the cracks in the walls—you are being watched. Every corner feels alive with an unseen presence.

name: DreadBound
summary: DreadBound is an atmospheric action roguelike with immersive sim elements. Steal your soul back from a cursed city, hide on roofs, eat bugs, make deals with demons, throw vases at your enemies.

name: Drop and Grow
summary: A short incremental clicker about dropping water to grow plants. Sit back and relax while you grow more and more plants.

name: Dreamer's Canal
summary: Dreamer's Canal is a backpack management Roguelike about buying and selling selling items along the mythical Dreamer's Canal. Explore the fantastical world of the canal with Peb the penguin at your own pace. Make enough profit to thrive in the Dreamer's Canal!

name: Dreadnought Tartarus
summary: Dreadnought Tartarus is a semi-automated strategic simulation game centered around a single, colossal battleship. Take control of the massive warship Tartarus and destroy everything in your path as the battlefield continuously advances！

name: Dragon Khan
summary: Dragon Khan is a third-person action RPG set in the exotic world of Ithannar, where players take on the role of Botu, a hybrid of dragon and human, as he must master ancient martial arts and harness the magic that flows through the land.

name: Drop Duchy: The North
summary: In The North, the second DLC for Drop Duchy, you will fight in battles inspired by warring Vikings. Build new tactics for all game modes, with aggressive new combat and looting mechanics.

name: Dream of Corpse Lady
summary: Cards, battle! Someone woke up the sleeping Corpse Lady... Perhaps, the world needs to pay a price for the awakening... In this game, you will play the role of the awakened Corpse Lady, try various strange construction combinations, discover powerful opponents, and then knock them all down!

name: Dread Fields
summary: Feed the animals, tend the fields, and keep the house clean while living dead girls wander nearby. A slow-burn rural horror.

name: Dragon Cat
summary: A fast-paced 3D side-scrolling arcade game where you glide, dodge, and weave through tight gaps using precise tap-to-fly controls.

name: Dragon Dragon Fire Fire Deluxe
summary: Play as a fire-breathing dragon in this classic arcade platformer! Blast through destructible stages, incinerate your enemies, and chase the high score, solo or alongside a friend.

name: Dronelord Hyperviber
