summary: Complete a reconnaissance mission for the Hypervibers fighting against inhuman hordes in the Dronelord's Domain

name: Drive Together
summary: One car, many drivers! Team up with your friends and share control of the gas, brakes, and steering to reach the finish line through chaotic tracks. Will it be perfect teamwork, or a total disaster? (Playable with 1–4 players)

name: Dragon's Egg: A Gourmet Fantasy
summary: Hire adventurers to collect ingredients from dangerous dungeons, rustle up some mythic cuisine and power up your party! Can you cook and fight your way to greatness, solve the mystery of the tower and snatch the legendary DRAGON’S EGG?

name: Droste Detective
summary: You're stuck in an office corridor with no exit that has a painting of the same corridor on the wall. But then you notice the corridor in the painting is not quite the same. You decide to inspect the painting...

name: Dream Savior
summary: Purge the onslaught of Nightmares and defeat the Dream Bosses! Dream Savior is a cute casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can help build towards your victory against hundreds of monsters that get thrown at you!

name: Dream Walker
summary: "Dream Walker" is an RPG game that combines survival, scavenging for extraction, and turn-based combat. Every time you explore within the dream, you might acquire valuable treasures, but you could also lose everything.

name: Dragon Chase
summary: Control an ancient dragon in an epic escape through the skies! Destroy jets, zeppelins, and warships in a fast-paced shoot 'em up with magical powers, colossal bosses, and a retro techno soundtrack inspired by 80s arcade classics.

name: Dragon Traveler
summary: Dragon Traveler is an isometric strategic RPG blending adventure and hero collection. Summon legendary characters, assemble the ultimate team, and progress through narrative levels and challenging content to save the kingdom.

name: Drunken Hog
summary: Drunken Hog is a story-driven pub management game focused on brewing, running a bar, and narrative depth. It is set in a small open city where you are free to explore, meet locals, and uncover the story at your own pace.

name: Drunk Driving Simulator
summary: In Drunk Driving Simulator you drive down the highway while getting drunk, making driving more difficult as time goes on

name: Droid Must Deliver
summary: Droid Must Deliver is a classical logistics puzzle game where a low-rank delivery droid proves its worth by pushing supply crates through increasingly challenging levels of an empire at war.

name: Drop Duchy: Complete Edition
summary: Drop Duchy: Complete Edition includes all additional content released so far (“The Tribe” and “The North” DLCs) bringing the full strategic experience to console players! In a charming, maquette-inspired medieval world, Drop Duchy blends deckbuilding, puzzle mechanics, and roguelite progression into one seamless, strategic experience.

name: Dragon Spira
summary: Master the board game with Spirit Beasts in a pixel-art fantasy RPG!

name: Driving Rogue
summary: Arcade driving meets roguelike chaos - fast, intense, and ridiculously addictive. In Driving Rogue, every run is a new story: the city keeps changing, and you’ll need pure focus to push your score to the limit. After each race, hit the shop and craft your build for the longest streak possible.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima Edition
summary:
The DAIMA EDITION includes:
• DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT
• DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Pack
- DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Part 1
- DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Part 2
• Pack Bonus: Ultimate Meat Feast, Mega Sacred Water, Purple Dino Horn, and Awakening Water

name: Drop Pop
summary:
Drop Pop is an addictive and relaxing game that is easy to play and hard to stop. Drop colorful balls, connect the same ones, and watch them turn into bigger balls. Every move feels satisfying and rewarding.

Enjoy smooth and calming gameplay with no pressure, no timers, and no stress. Play at your own pace - relax for a few minutes or spend hours having fun and improving your skills.

Think you can do better? In Drop Pop, you can beat high scores and challenge records set by other players. Plan your moves, aim for bigger merges, and climb higher on the leaderboard.

name: Dreamwrought
summary: A first-person action adventure with weighty melee, parries, and ruthless close-quarters fights. You are a vessel for eldritch gods. Explore dream-shaped dungeons, claim strange artifacts, and bargain with the factions below to bend the very fabric of reality around your will.

name: Drop The Cat
summary: This is the ultimate casual puzzle game that perfectly blends bright and colorful cat visuals, addictive block puzzle mechanics, and smart logic puzzle challenges. This easy puzzle game is designed to be both a relaxing, healing game and a stimulating brain game. If you love match puzzles or want a great puzzle you can enjoy anytime, this is the perfect choice.

name: Drive Bros
summary: Drive Bros is a chaotic co‑op driving game where one car is shared by multiple players. Drift, crash, and laugh as teamwork and rivalry collide on a mysterious island. Can your crew reach the PEAK of madness and escape together? Only the best bros survive the ride!

name: Draw King
summary: AI Rates Your Drawing! Will You Get a High Score?!
